不可逾越的鸿沟
bùkě yúyuè de hónggōu 
an impassable chasm; an unbridgeable gulf

Zhèkuài jīnzhuān hěnjù shēngzhí qiánlì，bèi hěnduōrén zhēngxiāng shōucáng。
This gold brick has great potential to increase in value, thus many people want it.
外商都很看重我国商品市场的广阔潜力。
Wàishāng dōu hěn kànzhòng wǒguó shāngpǐn shìchǎng de guǎngkuò qiánlì。
Foreign merchants all value the vast potential of our commodity market.
邮售是一种很有发展潜力的新型销售方式。
Yóushòu shì yìzhǒng hěn yǒu fāzhǎn qiánlì de xīnxíng xiāoshòu fāngshì。
Selling by post is a new type of marketing with high potential.
发掘潜力
fājuéqiánlì
discover hidden potential
要想办法使每个人的潜在力量充分发挥出来。
Yào xiǎngbànfǎ shǐ měigèrén de qiánzài lìliangchōngfèn fāhuī chūlái。
We must find a way to allow everyone to realize their potential.
一股潜在的势力
yì gǔ qiánzài de shìlì
a potential force (of a group of people)
挖潜力。
他出手不凡，看来潜力很大
把潜力充分发挥出来。
我认为他还有潜力。
潜在的能力
人民群众中潜藏着巨大的力量。
The internet business has a large and growing trade.
因特网市场有着巨大的市场增长潜力。
Many businesses with growth potential fail to raise enough funds because they lack investment readiness.
很多具有发展潜力的企业由于投资准备没有做到位，就未能筹集到足够的资金。
She is in a competition designed to find promising country music talents.
她参加了一场比赛，这场比赛旨在发掘有潜力的乡村音乐天才。
He knows how to get the best out of his students.
他懂得如何发挥学生的最大潜力。
to have potential
有潜力
to achieve one\'s potential
发挥潜力
He is a worker of great capabilities.
他在工作上很有潜力。
The talent scout recognized the potential in the young good looking Travis and signed him up straight away.
Hǎo de qiútàn fāxiànle niánqīng shuàiqì fùyǒu qiánlì de Tèwéisī bìng yǔqí zhíjiē qiāndìngle hétong。
好的球探发现了年轻帅气富有潜力的特维斯并与其直接签订了合同。
Virtual reality is seen as an exciting new technology with a lot of potential.
Xūnǐ shìjiè kànqǐlái shì fēicháng xīyǐn rén de xīn jìshù，fāzhǎn qiánlì jùdà。
虚拟世界看起来是非常吸引人的新技术，发展潜力巨大。
It possesses the potential to fall by virtue of its position.
Yīnwèi qí wèizhi，tā jùyǒu xiàluò de qiánlì。
因为其位置，它具有下落的潜力。
I can see great potential in cropping this with wildflowers to cater for the increasing demand.
Wǒ kěyǐ kàndào bǎ zhège hé yěhuā yìqǐ zhòngzhí de jùdà qiánlì，yǐ mǎnzú rìyìzēngzhǎng de xūqiú。
我可以看到把这个和野花一起种植的巨大潜力，以满足日益增长的需求。
He believes in the ultimate perfectibility of man.
Tā xiāngxìn rénlèi zuìzhōng nénggòu fāhuīchū suǒyǒu qiánlì。
他相信人类最终能够发挥出所有潜力。
The reproductive potential of a species is its relative capacity to reproduce itself under optimal conditions.
Yígè wùzhǒng zàishēngchǎn de qiánlì shì tā zài zuì yōu tiáojiàn xià duì zìshēn jìnxíng zàishēngchǎn de xiāngduìnénglì。
一个物种再生产的潜力是它在最优条件下对自身进行再生产的相对能力。
There is upside potential to the September ISM manufacturing index
&amp;ldquo;9 yuèfèn de ISM zhìzàoyè zhǐshù yǒu shàngzhǎng qiánlì。&amp;rdquo;
9月份的ISM制造业指数有上涨潜力。
nuclear-powered submarine
核动力潜艇
Efforts must be directed to stimulating latent creative abilities of rural people.
Bìxū nǔlì qù jīfā nóngcūn rénmín qiánzài de chuàngzàolì。
必须努力去激发农村人民潜在的创造力。
The turbo-generators supplied the submarine with electricity.
Zhèxiē wōlún fādiànjīzǔ wèi qiántǐng tígōng diànlì。
这些涡轮发电机组为潜艇提供电力。
Hotel brochures are designed to present the most attractive aspects of the hotel to the prospective guest.
Jiǔdiàn xiǎocèzǐ de mùdì shì bǎ jiǔdiàn zuì yǒu xīyǐnlì de fāngmiàn chéngxiàn gěi jiǔdiàn de qiánzài kèhù。
酒店小册子的目的是把酒店最有吸引力的方面呈现给酒店的潜在客户。
Without him the dullness of her life crept into her work no matter how she tried to compartmentalize it.
Rúguǒ méiyǒu tā，tā de shēnghuó de chénmèn qìxī jiù huì qiánrù tā de gōngzuò，wúlùn tā rúhé nǔlì fángfàn yě wújìyúshì。
如果没有他，她的生活的沉闷气息就会潜入她的工作，无论她如何努力防范也无济于事。
Sleeper nests of islamic terrorists were capable of launching major attacks in Europe.
Qiánfú de yīsīlán kǒngbùfènzǐ yǒu nénglì zài ōuzhōu fādòng zhòngdà de kǒngbù xíjī。
潜伏的伊斯兰恐怖分子有能力在欧洲发动重大的恐怖袭击。
埃博拉传染病的潜伏期短，死亡率高。
Ābólāchuánrǎnbìng de qiánfúqī duǎn，sǐwánglǜ gāo。
Ebola is can be fatal, and once contracted it takes a short time for the symptoms to show.
Coke\'s damaging effects aren\'t long-term. They happen immediately.
可卡因的毒性并不是长期潜伏的，而是会立即发作的。

qiánfú tèwù

有话摆在桌面上，不要暗中猜疑
个中真伪颇费猜详。
You\'re getting warm.
你快要猜中了。
The password should not be your birthday or phone number, so no one can guess it.
不应以生日或者电话号码作密码，以防别人猜中。
I won a prize because I guessed the right answer.
我猜中了答案，赢得了奖品。
I didn\'t know the answer. It was just a lucky guess.
我不知道答案，只是恰好猜中了。
We won the the prize by guessing his age.
Wǒmen cāizhòng tā de niánlíng，suǒyǐ yíngdéle lǐwù。
我们猜中他的年龄，所以赢得了礼物。
She can hit it on the nose!
Tā kěyǐ qiàhǎo cāizhòng。
她可以恰好猜中。
To answer this we must indulge in some plausible speculation.
Wèile huídá zhège， wǒmen bìxū chénnìyú yìxiē sìshì\'érfēi de cāicè zhīzhōng。
为了回答这个，我们必须沉溺于一些似是而非的猜测之中。
He guessed the right number of beans in the jar and won the prize.
Tā cāiduìle guànzhōng dòuzi de shùliàng，cóng\'ér yíngdéle jiǎngjīn。
他猜对了罐中豆子的数量，从而赢得了奖金。
Scientists supposed that large dinosaurs lived in swamps.
Kēxuéjiāmen cāicè dàxíng kǒnglóng shēnghuó zài zhǎozé zhōng。
科学家们猜测大型恐龙生活在沼泽中。
不要随便猜疑。
Búyào suíbiàn cāiyí。
Don\'t let your suspicions get out of hand.
你还是把事情的原委跟他说开了，免得他猜疑。
Nǐ háishi bǎ shìqing de yuánwěi gēn tā shuōkāi le，miǎn de tā cāiyí。
You\'d better explain clearly to him how all this came about, so as not to leave him in doubt.
猜疑
猜疑。
有话摆在桌面上，不要暗中猜疑
a husband jealous of other men
一个猜疑其他男人的丈夫
Andrew, you have a very suspicious mind.
安德鲁，你有个善猜疑的头脑。
His suspiciousness destroyed his marriage.
Tā de cāiyí huǐle tā de hūnyīn。
他的猜疑毁了他的婚姻。
我猜想他病了。
Wǒ cāixiǎngtā bìng le。
I suspect he is ill.
你这种猜想不一定正确。
Nǐ zhèzhǒng cāixiǎngbùyídìngzhèngquè。
This supposition of yours might be wrong.
猜想。
这么久不来信，我猜想他又生病住院了
她心里想些什么，我们可无从猜度
They are, I fancy, still friends.
我猜想，他们仍是朋友。
I gather that you disagree.
我猜想你不同意。
Jenny understands that she will have trouble on her travels with him.
Zhēnnī cāixiǎng hé tā yìqǐ lǚxíng huì yǒu máfan。
珍妮猜想和他一起旅行会有麻烦。
I suppose the presence of such qualities would be considered in bad taste.
Wǒ cāixiǎng zhèxiē pǐnzhì huì bèi rènwéi shì cūsú de。
我猜想这些品质会被认为是粗俗的。
Jill wondered whether he was kidding around.
Jí\'ěr cāixiǎng tā shìfǒu zài shuǎxiào。
吉尔猜想他是否在耍笑。
The mathematician showed the validity of the conjecture.
Shùxuéjiā zhèngmíngle gāi cāixiǎng de yǒuxiàoxìng。
数学家证明了该猜想的有效性。
I assume his train was late.
Wǒ cāixiǎng tā de huǒchē wǎndiǎn le。
我猜想他的火车晚点了。
I am guessing that the price of real estate will rise again.
Wǒ cāixiǎng fángdìchǎn jiàgé huì zàicì shàngshēng。
我猜想房地产价格会再次上升。
Look at that cloud!It has an animal shape! Guess which animal I\'m thinking about.
看那片云，是个动物的形状！猜猜我想到了什么动物。
Whether the idea will catch on is anybody\'s guess.
Měi gè rén dōuzài cāicè zhège xiǎngfǎ shìfǒu huì bèi guǎngfàn jiēshòu。
每个人都在猜测这个想法是否会被广泛接受。
猜拳行令。
自己没有私心，就不会猜忌别人。
Zijǐ méiyǒu sīxīn，jiù bú huì cāijì biérén。
If you didn\'t have selfish motives, you wouldn\'t be suspicious and jealous of others.
顺民难当，背负骂名还要遭新主猜忌。
Shùnmín nándāng，bēifù màmíng háiyào zāo xīnzhǔ cāijì。
It\'s not easy to be a docile subject, cursed by old friends while suspected by the new master at the same time.
猜忌
猜忌

She is said to have been poisoned by a jealous wife
Jùshuō，tā yǐ bèi yí wèi ài cāijì de qīzǐ dúsǐ le。
据说，她已被一位爱猜忌的妻子毒死了。
他心里在猜度，这位老人家是谁？
Tā xīnlǐ zài cāiduó，zhè wèi lǎorénjia shì shuí? 
He was wondering who that old man could be.

I can guess what\'s on his mind from the expression in his eyes.
这只不过是一种猜测。

It\'s just (or nothing but) a guess.
他说话向来直截了当，所以我们猜测他写的文章也不蔓不枝。

He always speaks in a direct way, and that is why we guess his writing style must be concise and straight-forward.
我们不要再这样互相猜测了，把问题谈开了吧。
Wǒmen búyào zài zhèyàng hùxiāng cāicè le，bǎ wèntí tánkāi le ba。
Let\'s stop making guesses. It\'s better that we make it clear.
老百姓纷纷猜测，这些身份不明的人是不是朝廷派来的。
Lǎobǎixìng fēnfēn cāicè，zhèxiē shēnfèn bùmíng de rén shìbúshì cháotíng pàilái de。
The civilians all suspected actively whether those unidentified people were dispatched by the court.
大家都在猜测谁能得奖。
Dàjiā dōuzài cāicè shuínéng déjiǎng。
Everybody was speculating about who was going to win the prize.

No one at this stage is prepared to hazard a guess at the outcome of the poll on February 25.
Méiyǒu rén zài zhège jiēduàn zhǔnbèi duì èr yuè èrshíwǔ rì mínyìdiàochá jiéguǒ zuòchū dàdǎn de cāicè。
没有人在这个阶段准备对二月二十五日民意调查结果作出大胆的猜测。
His guess that the flight would be delayed proved correct.
Tā cāicè hángbān jiāng huì yánwù，jiéguǒ zhèngmíng tā shì duì de。
他猜测航班将会延误，结果证明他是对的。

我猜测他们躲在那个地区的哪个地方。
They can only guess at the causes of the bird\'s decline.
Tāmen zhǐnéng cāicè xiǎoniǎo zhuìluò de yuányīn。
他们只能猜测小鸟坠落的原因。
They will be wondering what happened to their money.
Tāmen huì cāicè tāmen de qián chūle shénmeshì。
他们会猜测他们的钱出了什么事。
However, as she seems to be in the pink of health we must assume that this would be an unlikely eventuality.
Dànshì，yīnwèi tā kànqǐlái rúcǐ jiànkāng，wǒmen kěndìng huì qù cāicè zhè shì bù kěnéng de。
但是，因为她看起来如此健康，我们肯定会去猜测这是不可能的。

You always keep me guessing and keep me on my toes.
Nǐ zǒngshì ràng wǒ bùtíng de cāicè，shíkè jǐngjué。
你总是让我不停的猜测，时刻警觉。
I could not persuade him out of a suspicion that it had been stolen.
Wǒ wúfǎ quànshuō tā búyào zài qù cāicè tā shìfǒu bèi tōuzǒu le。
我无法劝说他不要再去猜测它是否被偷走了。
I was stalling for time to guess the correct answer.
Wǒ kāishǐ tuōyán shíjiān lái cāicè zhèngquè dá\'àn。
我开始拖延时间来猜测正确答案。
The whole argument rested on a basis of conjecture.
Zhěnggè lùnjù dōushì píngkōng cāicè de。

Theories about the extinction of dinosaurs are still highly conjectural.
Guānyú kǒnglóng mièjué de lǐlùn réngrán shì dàiyǒu hěn qiáng de cāicè xìng de。
关于恐龙灭绝的理论仍然是带有很强的猜测性的。
Newscasters speculated about the president\'s game plan for an invasion.
Xīnwén pínglùnyuán jìngxiāng cāicè zǒngtǒng duì shíshī rùqīn de cèlüè。
新闻评论员竞相猜测总统对实施入侵的策略。

His guess was on the nose.
Tā de cāicè shì duì de。
他的猜测是对的。

It is a very complex case which is hard to figure out.

He acts so bizarre, and no one understands why.

an educated guess
有所根据的猜测(不是瞎猜)

看那片云，是个动物的形状！猜猜我想到了什么动物。

to take {or} have {or} make a guess
猜猜看
I will guess at the size.

我来猜猜尺寸。
to base a guess on past experience
据过去经验来猜测

我猜想，他们仍是朋友。

a guess that proved right

我猜他们生活在伯明翰地区。

如果他聪明一点儿，就可以猜出我的反应。

我猜下周这些CD就得全部卖光。
There was a knock at the door... Now Jan knew her mother had promised to visit, so she assumed it was her.
突然间有人敲门，简知道妈妈答应她要过来，所以她猜应该是妈妈敲的门。
He didn\'t come to classes today, so I guess he doesn\'t feel good.
他今天没来上课，所以我猜他一定是不舒服了。

我猜他在做急诊室大夫时一定有一些有趣的经历。

看她走路的样子，我猜她是个跳舞的。
My little brother is doing crosswords.
我弟弟正在猜字谜。

猜测…
my guess is (that)...
我的猜测是…

我让你猜3次
best guess
最佳猜测
an informed guess/choice
有根据的猜测/选择

安德鲁，你有个善猜疑的头脑。
you would never guess that...
你永远猜不到…

不应以生日或者电话号码作密码，以防别人猜中。

我猜中了答案，赢得了奖品。

dead letter

茅草屋外，一个在匍匐而行的小男孩在射箭。

他以精通射箭术而闻名。

放箭射靶

The arrow fell wide of its mark.
箭没有射中目标。

The arrow struck home.

箭正好射中目标。
The arrow missed the target.
Jiàn méiyǒu shèzhòng mùbiāo。
箭没有射中目标。

Huǒjiàn de fāshè shífēn shùnlì。

The arrow was pointed in the direction the wind was blowing.

箭朝着风吹的方向射去。
The rocket had a minor problem during its first launch last October.

短暂
duǎnzàn
of short duration; transient; brief
一群迁徙的大雁飞落到湖边做短暂的停留。
Yì qún qiānxǐ de dàyàn fēiluò dào húbiān zuò duǎnzàn de tíngliú。
A flock of wild geese landed by the lake for a short stay.
自然主义文学派别的思考往往是肤浅的，这决定了它的短暂性。
Zìránzhǔyì wénxué pàibié de sīkǎo wǎngwǎng shì fūqiǎn de ，zhè juédìng le tāde duǎnzànxìng。
The naturalist literary sect always thinks shallowly, which determines its short duration.
短暂的分别
duǎnzànde fēnbié
brief parting
短暂。
时间短暂
In his defense he alleged temporary insanity.
在答辩中，他提出短暂的精神错乱为借口。
Art is long, and life is short.
生命短暂，艺术长存
ephemeral glory
短暂的荣华
a flying trip
短暂的旅行
a flying visit
短暂的访问
a passing interest in sb/sth
对某人/某事短暂的兴趣
We had a short meeting.
我们的会面很短暂。
He made a tremendous number of achievements in his short lifetime.
他在短暂的一生中做出了巨大的成就。
It is also time to take note of less transient events.
Yě shì shíjiān guānzhù nàxiē gèng duǎnzàn de shìjiàn le。
也是时间关注那些更短暂的事件了。
His stay was very brief indeed.
Shíjìshàng，tā tíngliú de shíjiān fēicháng duǎnzàn。
实际上，他停留的时间非常短暂。
Crane was a prolific writer throughout his short life.
Zuòjiā Kèléi\'ēn zài qí duǎnzàn de yìshēng zhōng chuàngzuò le xǔduō zuòpǐn。
作家克雷恩在其短暂的一生中创作了许多作品。
Louis and Hortense, who normally preferred to live apart, had two brief reunions.
Tōngcháng gèng lèyì fēnjū de Lùyìsī hé Huòdùn sī zuòle liǎng cì duǎnzàn de huìmiàn。
通常更乐意分居的路易斯和霍顿斯做了两次短暂的会面。
I would choose to be a millionaire in a flash.
Wǒ nìngkě zuò duǎnzàn de bǎiwàn fùwēng。
我宁可做短暂的百万富翁。
I have had a fugitive interest in this subject as a child.
Wǒ zài xiǎoshíhòu céngjīng duì zhège wèntí yǒuguò duǎnzàn de xìngqù。
我在小时候曾经对这个问题有过短暂的兴趣。
Despite the brief success, however, the film cannot go far without making a pig\'s ear of itself.
Jǐnguǎn qǔdéle duǎnzàn de chénggōng，dànshì zhè bù diànyǐng zhǐyǒu gǎoguài cáinéng chénggōng。
尽管取得了短暂的成功，但是这部电影只有搞怪才能成功。
Any happiness, no matter how brief, is better than no happiness at all.
Rènhé xìngfú， wúlùn duōme duǎnzàn， dōu hǎoguò yāgēn méiyǒu xìngfú。
任何幸福，无论多么短暂，都好过压根没有幸福。
People actually accomplish more when they take time for short rests.
Duǎnzàn xiūxi zhīhòu rénmen quèshí kěyǐ wánchéng gèng duō。
短暂休息之后人们确实可以完成更多。
His brief time as Prime Minister brought few real benefits to the poor.
Tā duǎnzàn de shǒuxiàng rènqī méiyǒu gěi qióngrén dàilái zhēnzhèng de hǎochù。
他短暂的首相任期没有给穷人带来真正的好处。
The team enjoyed a brief run of victories.
Nà zhī duìwu qǔdéle duǎnzàn de yìliánchuàn shènglì。
那支队伍取得了短暂的一连串胜利。
After a short rally connors won the point.
Yí gè duǎnzàn huíhé zhī hòu Kāngnàsī défēn。
一个短暂回合之后康纳斯得分。
The ex-slave tasted freedom shortly before she died.
Zhè míng guòqù de núlì zài tā qùshì qián xiǎngshòu dào le duǎnzàn de zìyóu。
这名过去的奴隶在她去世前享受到了短暂的自由。
The rookie made a brief appearance in the first period.
Zhège xīnxiù zhǐzài bǐsài dì-yī jié zhōng duǎnzàn chūchǎng。
这个新秀只在比赛第一节中短暂出场。
The momentary stay enabled him to escape the blow.
Duǎnzàn de tíngliú ràng tā nénggòu shāowēi xiūxī yíxià。
短暂的停留让他能够稍微休息一下。
There was a brief encounter in the hallway.
Zài zǒuláng lǐ céngjīng duǎnzàn xiāngyù。
在走廊里曾经短暂相遇。
In 1948 truman crossed the country several times on his whistle-stop tours.
Yījiǔsìbā nián，Dùlǔmén héng chuān Měiguó shù cì jìnxíng tā de duǎnzàn tíngliú fǎngwèn。
1948年，杜鲁门横穿美国数次进行他的短暂停留访问。
He wanted to hear all about my flying visit to his old stamping grounds.
Wǒ duì tā yǐqián lǎo qù de dìfang zuòle yí cì duǎnzàn fǎngwèn，tā xiǎng zhīdào suǒyǒu de shìqing。
我对他以前老去的地方做了一次短暂访问，他想知道所有的事情。
There was a brief period of conciliation but the fighting soon resumed.
Shuāngfāng zhījiān céngyǒu yí duàn duǎnzàn de tiáotíngqī，dàn zhīhòu hěn kuài yòu dǎ qǐlái le。
双方之间曾有一段短暂的调停期，但之后很快又打起来了。
Its was a brief and intense courtship.
Zhè shì yí cì duǎnzàn ér rèliè de qiú\'ài。
这是一次短暂而热烈的求爱。
Noticed the bee\'s momentary orienting pause before heading back to the hive.
Zhùyì dào mìfēng zài fǎnhuí fēngfáng qián wèi quèdìng fāngxiàng ér duǎnzàn tíngliú。
注意到蜜蜂在返回蜂房前为确定方向而短暂停留。
The market had one bad blip today.
Jīntiān hángqíng chūxiànle duǎnzàn de dīmí。
今天行情出现了短暂的低迷。
Politics is an impermanent factor of life.
Zhèngzhì zhǐshì shēngmìng zhōng duǎnzàn de yíbùfēn。
政治只是生命中短暂的一部分。
How gloriously happy she had been during those few fleeting moments of time.
Zài nàxiē fēishì de duǎnzàn shíguāng lǐ，tā shì duōme xìngfú a。
在那些飞逝的短暂时光里，她是多么幸福啊。
But wroth as he was，a short struggle ended in reconciliation.
Suīrán tā hěn qìfèn，dàn yí zhèn duǎnzàn de zhēngchǎo zhīhòu zhōngguī héjiě。
虽然他很气愤，但一阵短暂的争吵之后终归和解。
I don\'t know how it started; in any case，there was a brief scuffle.
Wǒ bù zhīdào shì zěnme kāishǐ de，fǎnzhèng fāshēngle yì chǎng duǎnzàn de hùnzhàn。
我不知道是怎么开始的，反正发生了一场短暂的混战。
Love is transitory but it is eternal.
Àiqíng duǎnzàn què yǒnghéng。
爱情短暂却永恒。

暂停按键
zàntíng ànjiàn
pause button
这件事情暂时存疑吧。
Zhèjiàn shìqing zànshí cúnyí ba。
Let\'s put this matter aside for the time being.

Her life was short but glorious.

这是后话，暂且不提。

That\'s what happened later, so no more of it now.
不能为了谋取暂时的利益而牺牲原则。
Bùnéng wèi le móuqǔ zànshí de lìyì ér xīshēng yuánzé。
We mustn\'t seek temporary gain at the expense of principle.

Xiūlǐ nèibù, zànshí tíngyè。

zànshí chǔyú xiàfēng

zàn yù yǒurénchù

短暂
duǎnzàn
of short duration; transient; brief
财界人士认为大盘的下跌只是暂时的。
Cáijiè rénshì rènwéi dàpán de xiàdiē zhǐshì zànshí de。
Members of the financial community believe the fall in the prices of the stock market is only temporary.
泥石流冲泻到公路上，交通出现暂时中断。
Níshíliú chōngxiè dào gōnglù shàng，jiāotōng chūxiàn zànshí zhōng duàn。
Debris flowed down the road, causing traffic to stop temporarily.
我建议你暂且雌伏于此，时机成熟再采取行动。
Wǒ jiànyì nǐ zànqiě cífú yú cǐ，shíjī chéngshú zài cǎiqǔ xíngdòng。
I suggest that you temporarily submit to others, and wait for the proper time to take action.
对方的态度过于粗硬，我们只好暂时结束会谈。
Duìfāng de tàidu guòyú cūyìng，wǒmen zhǐhǎo zànshí jiéshù huìtán。
Due to the course manner of the other party, we have to temporarily stop the meeting.
这种商品的价格倒挂是暂时的。
Zhèzhǒng shāngpǐn de jiàgé dàoguà shì zànshí de。
The purchase price being higher than the selling price is temporary for this commodity.
一群迁徙的大雁飞落到湖边做短暂的停留。
Yì qún qiānxǐ de dàyàn fēiluò dào húbiān zuò duǎnzàn de tíngliú。
A flock of wild geese landed by the lake for a short stay.
棋后棋王结为夫妻，新婚蜜月暂时封棋。
Qíhòu qíwáng jiéwéi fūqī，xīnhūn mìyuè zànshí fēngqí。
As the queen and king of chess have got married, the game will be delayed for their honeymoon.
他因为家人出国了，只能暂时寄寓在同学家里。
Tā yīnwèi jiārén chūguó le，zhǐnéng zànshí jìyù zài tóngxué jiā lǐ。
He had to live in his classmate\'s house for a while because his family had gone abroad.
今天暂停比赛，明天咱们再决雌雄！
Jīntiān zàntíng bǐsài，míngtiān zánmen zài jué cíxióng！
The competition is suspended for today. Let\'s fight it out tomorrow.
咱们今天暂且以乐忘忧吧。
Zánmen jīntiān zànqiě yǐlè wàngyōu ba。
Let\'s leave the sadness behind, and enjoy the moment today.
看你饿成那样，先吃个馒头暂时疗饥吧。
Kàn nǐ èchéng nàyàng，xiān chī gè mántou zànshí liáojī ba。
Look how hungry you are. Eat a piece of steamed bread first to allay your hunger.
我们今天暂且分别，明朝再会！
Wǒmen jīntiān zànqiě fēnbié，míngzhāo zàihuì！
So much for today. Let’s meet again.
皇帝还是个小孩子，暂时无法亲政。
Huángdì háishi gè xiǎoháizi，zànshí wúfǎ qīnzhèng。
The emperor is still a child, unable to assume the reins of government.
请大家先集中讨论这个问题，暂时不要说题外话。
Qǐng dàjiā xiān jí zhōng tǎolùn zhège wèntí，zànshí búyào shuō tíwài huà。
Let\'s get down to discussing the problem. Let\'s have no digressions for the moment.
这支笔你先暂用，等我有更好的再给你一支。
Zhèzhī bǐ nǐ xiān zànyòng，děng wǒ yǒu gènghǎo de zài gěi nǐ yì zhī。
You can use this pen for the time being. Later, I will give you another one when I have something better.
这次去海南旅游我们暂住在同学家。
Zhècì qù Hǎinán lǚyóu wǒmen zànzhùzài tóngxué jiā。
When we travel to Hainan, we will stay with one of my classmates.
居委会对小区内的暂住人口数量作了统计。
Jūwěihuì duì xiǎoqū nèi de zànzhù rénkǒu shùliàng zuò le tǒngjì。
The neighbourhood committee carried out a census towards the temporary residents in the neighbourhood.
外地来京人员应抓紧时间办暂住证。
Wàidì láijīng rényuán yīng zhuājǐn shíjiān bàn zànzhùzhèng。
People coming from other places to Beijing, should get their temporary residence certificate as soon as possible.
他们公司盈利很少，在竞争中暂居中下游。
Tāmen gōngsī yínglì hěnshǎo，zài jìngzhēng zhōng zànjū zhōng xiàyóu。
Their company makes a small profit and is at the low to middle level of the industry.

短暂
duǎnzàn
of short duration; transient; brief
一群迁徙的大雁飞落到湖边做短暂的停留。
Yì qún qiānxǐ de dàyàn fēiluò dào húbiān zuò duǎnzàn de tíngliú。
A flock of wild geese landed by the lake for a short stay.
自然主义文学派别的思考往往是肤浅的，这决定了它的短暂性。
Zìránzhǔyì wénxué pàibié de sīkǎo wǎngwǎng shì fūqiǎn de ，zhè juédìng le tāde duǎnzànxìng。
The naturalist literary sect always thinks shallowly, which determines its short duration.
短暂的分别
duǎnzànde fēnbié
brief parting
短暂。
时间短暂
In his defense he alleged temporary insanity.
在答辩中，他提出短暂的精神错乱为借口。
Art is long, and life is short.
生命短暂，艺术长存
ephemeral glory
短暂的荣华
a flying trip
短暂的旅行
a flying visit
短暂的访问
a passing interest in sb/sth
对某人/某事短暂的兴趣
We had a short meeting.
我们的会面很短暂。
He made a tremendous number of achievements in his short lifetime.
他在短暂的一生中做出了巨大的成就。
It is also time to take note of less transient events.
Yě shì shíjiān guānzhù nàxiē gèng duǎnzàn de shìjiàn le。
也是时间关注那些更短暂的事件了。
His stay was very brief indeed.
Shíjìshàng，tā tíngliú de shíjiān fēicháng duǎnzàn。
实际上，他停留的时间非常短暂。
Crane was a prolific writer throughout his short life.

作家克雷恩在其短暂的一生中创作了许多作品。

通常更乐意分居的路易斯和霍顿斯做了两次短暂的会面。

我在小时候曾经对这个问题有过短暂的兴趣。
Despite the brief success, however, the film cannot go far without making a pig\'s ear of itself.

尽管取得了短暂的成功，但是这部电影只有搞怪才能成功。
Any happiness, no matter how brief, is better than no happiness at all.

任何幸福，无论多么短暂，都好过压根没有幸福。
People actually accomplish more when they take time for short rests.

短暂休息之后人们确实可以完成更多。
His brief time as Prime Minister brought few real benefits to the poor.

那支队伍取得了短暂的一连串胜利。
After a short rally connors won the point.
Yí gè duǎnzàn huíhé zhī hòu Kāngnàsī défēn。
一个短暂回合之后康纳斯得分。

这名过去的奴隶在她去世前享受到了短暂的自由。
The rookie made a brief appearance in the first period.

The momentary stay enabled him to escape the blow.

He ate fast and heartily, but his skinny frame never gained a pound.
Tā chīfàn hěn kuài，wèikǒu yě hěn dà，dàn tā xiānshòu de shēntǐ què yìdiǎn ròu yě bù zhǎng。
他吃饭很快，胃口也很大，但他纤瘦的身体却一点肉也不长。
他瘦瘦的胳膊上青筋暴突。
Tā shòushòu de gēbo shàng qīngjīn bàotū。
His bony arm is roped with prominent veins.
弟弟刚军训回来，黑瘦黑瘦的。
Dìdi gāng jūnxùn huílái，hēishòu hēishòu de。
Back from military training, my brother is black and slim.
他本来身体很瘦弱。
Tā běnlái shēntǐ hěn shòuruò。
He used to be thin and weak.
瘦得不像样
shòu de bú xiàng yàng
extremely thin; worn to a mere shadow
他渐渐饮食不进，骨瘦如柴。
Tā jiànjiàn yǐnshí bú jìn，gǔshòurúchái。
Gradually he lost his appetite and wasted away till he was nothing but skin and bones.
瘦得只剩个骨头架子
shòu de zhǐ shènggè gǔtou jiàzi
be reduced to a skeleton; be all skin and bones
并不见瘦
bìngbú jiànshòu 
not seem to be any thinner
浑身精瘦
húnshēn jīnɡshòu
bag of bones
饿得精瘦
è de jīngshòu
be bony from hunger
精瘦的小猪
jīngshòu de xiǎozhū
skinny piglet
精瘦的衣裳
jīngshòu de yīshàng
extremely slim dress
他矮而且瘦，可是目光炯炯有神。
Tā ǎi érqiě shòu，kěshì mùguāngjiǒngjiǒngyǒushén。
He was short and thin, with, however, a pair of gleaming, penetrating eyes.
枯瘦如柴
kūshòu rú chái
skinny; be all skin and bones
脸形瘦长
liǎnxíngshòucháng
a thin and long face
瘦骨嶙峋
shòugúlínxún 
be terribly emaciated
面容消瘦
miànrónɡ xiāoshòu
look emaciated
你最近瘦了，怎么闹的？
Nǐ zuìjìn shòu le，zěnme nào de?
How come you look so thin these days?
瘦得皮包骨头
shòu de píbāogǔtou
be a bag of bones; be all skin and bones
你病后略见清瘦。
Nǐ bìng hòu lüè jiàn qīngshòu。
You look rather thin after your illness.
身形瘦长
shēnxíng shòu cháng
tall and thin
他长得很瘦。
Tā zhǎng de hěn shòu。
He is very thin.
脸瘦
liǎn shòu
be thin in the face
瘦肉
shòuròu
lean meat
这件上衣腰身瘦了点。
Zhèjiàn shàngyī yāoshēn shòu le diǎn。
The coat is a bit tight at the waist.
瘦土薄田
shòutǔ bótián
poor soil and barren land
他是瘦长个儿。
Tā shì shòuchánggèr。
He\'s a tall, lean chap. or He\'s a spindle-legs.
身材瘦小
shēncái shòuxiǎo
slight of figure (or stature)
瘦削的面孔
shòuxuē de miànkǒng
a haggard face
她一天天地瘦下去。
Tā yì tiāntian de shòu xiàqù。
She\'s getting thinner every day.
身体一天天消瘦下去
shēntǐ yì tiāntian xiāoshòu xiàqù
be getting thinner every day
显得有点消瘦
xiǎnde yǒudiǎn xiāoshòu
look a bit emaciated
那个男人因为吸白面儿已经瘦得不成人样了。
Nàge nánrén yīnwèi xī báimiànr yǐjing shòu de bùchéng rényàng le。
That poor guy has become emaciated from taking heroin.
每天面对这么繁冗的工作，他日渐消瘦。
Měitiān miànduì zhème fánrǒng de gōngzuò，tā rìjiàn xiāoshòu。
Faced with diverse and complex affairs, he is becoming thinner day by day.
这条裤子他穿着肥瘦儿正好！
Zhè tiáo kùzi tā chuān zhe féishòur zhènghǎo！
This pair of trousers suits him perfectly.
这块猪肉肥瘦儿正合适，做红烧肉肯定好吃。
Zhèkuài zhūròu féishòur zhèng héshì，zuò hóngshāoròu kěndìng hǎochī。
This piece of pork is neither too lean nor too fat and can be braised in brown sauce to make a delicious dish.
他买了块后暸肉，肥瘦合宜，正好做红烧肉。
Tā mǎi le kuài hòuliàoròu，féishòu héyí，zhènghǎo zuò hóngshāoròu。
He bought a piece of haunch meat with neither too much fat nor muscle. It was suitable to cook bouilli.
小王的家境清寒，没钱买营养的东西吃，因此身体十分瘠瘦。
Xiǎo Wáng de jiājìng qīnghán，méiqián mǎi yíngyǎng de dōngxi chī，yīncǐ shēntǐshífēn jíshòu。
Xiao Wang\'s family is poor and doesn\'t have enough money to buy nutritious food, so he is very thin.
这个地区因常年自然灾害，土地瘠瘦，寸草不生。
Zhège dìqū yīn chángnián zìrán zāihài，tǔdì jíshòu，cùncǎo bùshēng。
Land in this area is barren and no plant can grow here, because there are natural disasters throughout the entire year.
由于几天的熬夜，她的脸庞消瘦了许多。
Yóuyú jǐtiān de áoyè，tā de liǎnpáng xiāoshòu le xǔduō。
His face became much thinner, because he had stayed up late for several nights.
我看着一派绿肥红瘦的景象，不禁黯然神伤。
Wǒ kàn zhe yípài lǜféi hóngshòu de jǐng xiàng，bùjīn ànrán shénshāng。
The lingering spring makes me depressed.
他太瘦了，像麻秆儿似的。
Tā tài shòu le，xiàng mágǎnr sì de。
He is too lean and looks just like a hemp stalk.
他小时候胖墩墩的，长大以后却瘦了。
Tā xiǎoshíhou pàngdūndūn de，zhǎngdà yǐhòu què shòu le。
He used to be dumpy, but he became thin after he grew up.
瘦瘪的种子能够发芽吗？
Shòubiě de zhǒng zi nénggòu fāyá ma？
Can thin and hollow seeds germinate?
这匹老马由于长年的劳累，已经瘦骨嶙峋了。
Zhè pǐ lǎomǎ yóuyú chángnián de láolèi，yǐjing shòugǔlínxún le。
This old horse has become skinny due to long years\' tiring work.
小明是我们学校有名的瘦猴儿。
Xiǎo Míng shì wǒmen xuéxiào yǒumíng de shòuhóur。
Xiao Ming is a well known skinny boy in our school.
他瘦瘠的身体看起来似乎弱不禁风。
Tā shòují de shēntǐ kànqǐlái sìhū ruòbùjīnfēng。
His thin body looks extremely delicate.
瘦瘠的土地再也经不起过度开垦了！
Shòují de tǔdì zài yě jīngbùqǐ guòdù kāikěn le！
Such poor land can no longer stand over-cultivation!
他爱吃肉，但只吃瘦肉。
Tā ài chī ròu，dàn zhǐ chī shòuròu。
He likes eating meat, but only lean meat.
她每天都束腰，看起来是瘦点了，但不知道对身体是否有害。
Tā měitiān dōu shùyāo，kànqǐlái shì shòudiǎn le，dàn bùzhīdào duì shēntǐ shìfǒu yǒu hài。
She wears a girdle around her waist every day, and indeed looks thinner, but I don\'t know whether it is harmful to her body.
妈妈纤瘦的身影深深地印在我的脑海里。
Māma xiānshòu de shēnyǐng shēnshēn de yìnzài wǒ de nǎohǎi lǐ。
My mother \'s slender figure is deeply engraved in my mind.
她为减肥日渐削瘦，把身体都弄垮了，昨天去看医生了。
Tā wèi jiǎnféi rìjiàn xiāoshòu，bǎ shēntǐ dōu nòng kuǎ le，zuótiān qù kàn yīshēng le。
She has lost so much weight that there is something wrong with her health. Therefore, she went to see the doctor yesterday.
他从小就嘴刁，所以营养不良，瘦得像个猴子。
Tā cóng xiǎo jiù zuǐdiāo，suǒyǐ yíngyǎng bùliáng，shòu de xiàng gè hóuzi。
He has been critical about food since he was little. Therefore, he is malnourished and as thin as a monkey.
枯瘦
kūshòu
skinny
他年轻时是个瘦子，现在发胖了。
Tā niánqīng shí shì gè shòuzi，xiànzài fāpàngle。
When he was young he was thin, but now he\'s fat.
他瘦得连双颊都塌下去了。

He\'s got so thin that even his cheeks are sunken.

Carl is that slim guy sitting there; near the broom.

A tall thin man came out of the shadows at the bottom of the stone steps.

你比他瘦，所以你坐在后面好些。

Tā shòuxuē gāotiǎo，gēngè bāléiwǔ yǎnyuán shìde。

I\'m tall and thin and he\'s short and fat.
我又高又瘦，他又矮又胖。

你大概还记得这个姚金凤吧？瘦长条子，小圆脸儿，有几点细白麻粒，三十多岁，在厂里已经三年零六个月，这次怠工就是她开火的”
Any cat - skinny, fat, young or old can be trained to use the toilet bowl!
不论是胖猫,瘦猫,老猫,小猫都可以被训练学会使用冲水马桶.
Strict strong stringy Stephen Stretch slickly snared six sickly silky snakes.
精细、壮而瘦高的史蒂芬放出光滑的陷阱，来诱捕六条病弱如丝的蛇。
The decrease in weight was unexpected.
Méixiǎngdào huì shòu le。
没想到会瘦了。
Her face was pale and thin.
Tā de liǎn cāngbái ér xiāoshòu。
她的脸苍白而消瘦。

Duō zhī xiāngcháng zhǐyǒu 10% de shòuròu。
多脂香肠只有10%的瘦肉。
She really thinned out over the summer!
Jīngguò zhège xiàtiān tā zhēn de shòu le xiàlái。
经过这个夏天她真的瘦了下来。
He enjoys the company of tall skinny blondes.
Tā fēicháng xǐhuan zhè qún yòugāoyòushòu de jīnfàbìyǎn de měinǚ。

She was tall, thin, bony almost, with short-cropped blonde hair.
Tā hěn gāo、hěn shòu、jīhū píbāogǔtóu，liú jīnsè duǎnfà。
她很高、很瘦、几乎皮包骨头，留金色短发。
A tall, thin man, with a hard, austere face, had stepped out of the open doorway.
Yí gè liǎn shàng kàn shàng qù jiānrèn ér yòu yánsù de gāo shòu nánrén cóng ménkǒu zǒu le chūlái。
一个脸上看上去坚韧而又严肃的高瘦男人从门口走了出来。
A little old lady bought a ticket from the bus conductor.
Yì míng shòuxiǎo de lǎo fùrén cóng shòupiàoyuán nàlǐ mǎile yì zhāng piào。
一名瘦小的老妇人从售票员那里买了一张票。
Why was that tall, thin creep staring at her?
Wèishénme nàge yòugāo-yòushòu de guàirén dīngzhe tā kàn？
为什么那个又高又瘦的怪人盯着她看？
The endless quest for thinness has done far more harm than good.
Méiwánméiliǎo de zhuīqiú shòushēn yǐjīng yuǎnyuǎn bì dàyú lì。
没完没了的追求瘦身已经远远弊大于利。
They were thin and weak, but looked surprisingly well.
Tāmen yídù hěn shòu hěn xūruò，dànshì què lìng rén jīngyà de quányùle。
他们一度很瘦很虚弱，但是却令人惊讶地痊愈了。
He ate fast and heartily, but his skinny frame never gained a pound.
Tā chīfàn hěn kuài，wèikǒu yě hěn dà，dàn tā xiānshòu de shēntǐ què yìdiǎn ròu yě bù zhǎng。
他吃饭很快，胃口也很大，但他纤瘦的身体却一点肉也不长。
His body is a bag of bones.
Tā de shēntǐ gǔshòurúchái。
他的身体骨瘦如柴。
He was very thin and a stranger to hugs and kisses.
Tā hěn shòu，bù xíguàn yōngbào hé qīnwěn。
他很瘦，不习惯拥抱和亲吻。
He doesn\'t look too bad because of his coat but when you handle him，he is just a bag of bones.
Yīnwèi tā de yīfu，tā kàn shàngqù bìng bú shì hěn zāogāo，dànshì dāng nǐ chùmō tā de shíhou，huì fāxiàn tā qíshí gǔshòurúchái。
因为他的衣服，他看上去并不是很糟糕，但是当你触摸他的时候，会发现他其实骨瘦如柴。
I have lost a lot of weight and have to catch my dress in at the waist.
Wǒ shòule xǔduō， bùdébù bǎ qúnzi yāoshēn shōuzhǎi yìdiǎn。
我瘦了许多， 不得不把裙子腰身收窄一点。
He bent double，hugging his thin chest inside his cloak，then drew himself up to his full height.
Tā wānxià yāo，yōngbàole yíxià pīfēng xià de shòuxiǎo shēnqū，ránhòu yòu zhíqǐle shēnzi。
他弯下腰，拥抱了一下披风下的瘦小身躯，然后又直起了身子。
She felt the pit of her stomach fall away.
Tā juéde tā de dùzi shòubiě xiàqù。
她觉得她的肚子瘦瘪下去。
Gradually she pined away.
Tā jiànjiàn xiāoshòu le。
她渐渐消瘦了。
She not pining over Harris, then?
Tā búshì yīnwèi Hālǐsī ér xiāoshòu le ba？
她不是因为哈里斯而消瘦了吧？
The skinny boy was short of weight.
Zhè míng gǔshòurúchái de nánhái tǐzhòng bùzú。
这名骨瘦如柴的男孩体重不足。
The lack of food caused the cat to thin out.
Shíwù de quēfá ràng zhè zhī māo biànshòu le。
食物的缺乏让这只猫变瘦了。
She spread herself too thin by trying to do a lot of things at one time.
Tā shìtú yícì zuò hěn duō shì ràng zìjǐ biàn de hěn shòu。
她试图一次做很多事让自己变得很瘦。
Right，my face will start falling off.
Shì de，wǒ de liǎn kāishǐ shòu le。
是的，我的脸开始瘦了。
You can\'t be too rich or too thin.
Nǐ jì bùnéng tài pàng，yě bùnéng tài shòu。
你既不能太胖，也不能太瘦。
Hunger had caused the hollows in their cheeks.
Jī\'è shǐ tāmen liǎnjiá shòuxuē。

He\'s a mere slip of a lad.
Tā zhǐ búguò shì gè shòuxiǎo de xiǎonánhái。
他只不过是个瘦小的小男孩。

Nàgè Kǎixī\'ōukǎ kànqǐlái yòu shòu yòu\'è。
那个凯西欧卡看起来又瘦又饿。
The prime minister was wearing a grey suit and a white shirt with a soft collar, but his neck had become thinner and the collar stood away from it as if it had been bought haphazard.
Shǒuxiàng chuānzhe yí tào huīsè xīzhuāng hé yí jiàn báisè ruǎn lǐng chènshān，dànshì tā de bózi xiǎnde gèng shòu le，yīlǐng yuǎnlí bózi，fǎngfú yīfu shì suíbiàn mǎi lái yíyàng。
首相穿着一套灰色西装和一件白色软领衬衫，但是他的脖子显得更瘦了，衣领远离脖子，仿佛衣服是随便买来一样。
A lean, swarthy fellow was peering through the window, grinning impudently.
Yí gè hēishòu de jiāhuo zhèng tòuguò chuānghu xiàng wū lǐ zhāngwàng，bēibǐ de liězuǐ xiàozhe。
一个黑瘦的家伙正透过窗户向屋里张望，卑鄙地咧嘴笑着。
The effect of his irregular life could be seen writ large on his gaunt features.
Tā shēnghuó bù guīlǜ，hòuguǒ cóng tā qiáocuì xiāoshòu de shēnxíng shàng kěyǐ qīngxī de kàndào。
他生活不规律，后果从他憔悴消瘦的身形上可以清晰地看到。
He did well despite his withered arm.
Suīrán tā de gēbo hěn shòu，dàn zuò de búcuò。
虽然他的胳膊很瘦，但做的不错。
Miss Burney protested indignantly, her long thin nose turning pink with mortification at this irreverent piece of mimicry.
Bóní xiǎojiě fènnù de kàngyì，gǎnjué zhè zhǒng bújìng mófǎng duì tā éryán shì yì zhǒng xiūrǔ，tā shòucháng de bízi yīncǐ yě biàn de fā hóng。
伯尼小姐愤怒地抗议，感觉这种不敬模仿对她而言是一种羞辱，她瘦长的鼻子因此也变得发红。
The prisoners were appallingly thin.
Qiúfàn fēicháng shòu，kànshàngqù lìng rén máogǔsǒngrán。
囚犯非常瘦，看上去令人毛骨悚然。
The illness has sallowed her face.
Jíbìng shǐ tā miànhuángjīshòu。
疾病使她面黄肌瘦。
The dress hung shapelessly on her thin body.
Zhè jiàn yīfu chuānzài tā nà shòuxiǎo de shēntǐ shàng xiǎnde hěn méi xíng。
这件衣服穿在她那瘦小的身体上显得很没型。
The treatment emaciated him.
Zhìliáo shǐ tā hěn shòuruò。
治疗使她很瘦弱。
He was recognizably slimmer now.
Tā xiànzài míngxiǎn shì gèngjiā shòu le。
他现在明显是更加瘦了。
Please take in this skirt--I\'ve lost weight.

请收紧一下这条衬衫，我变瘦了。
A lanky kid transformed almost overnight into a handsome young man.
Zhège shòucháng nánkàn de háizi jīhū zài yíyèzhījiān jiù biànchéngle yí gè yīngjùn de shàonián。
这个瘦长难看的孩子几乎在一夜之间就变成了一个英俊的少年。
He looked shriveled and ill.
Tā kànqǐlái gānshòu，yì fú bìngtài。
他看起来干瘦，一幅病态。
你病后略见清瘦。
Nǐ bìng hòu lüè jiàn qīngshòu。
You look rather thin after your illness.
小王的家境清寒，没钱买营养的东西吃，因此身体十分瘠瘦。
Xiǎo Wáng de jiājìng qīnghán，méiqián mǎi yíngyǎng de dōngxi chī，yīncǐ shēntǐshífēn jíshòu。

略显清瘦。

他看起来干瘦，一幅病态。
昨夜下了一场大雪(雨)。
Zuóyè xià le yìcháng dàxuě（yǔ）。
There was a heavy fall of snow (rain) last night.
病人昨夜失眠。
Bìngrén zuóyè shīmián。
The patient had a sleepless night last night.
可能是昨夜受风了，她后脊梁疼得厉害。
Kěnéng shì zuóyè shòufēng le，tā hòujǐliáng téng de lìhai。
Perhaps having been striken by cold last night, her back aches badly.
为了观看昨夜的流星雨，我们彻夜未眠。
Wèile guānkàn zuóyè de liúxīngyǔ，wǒmen chèyè wèimián。
We didn’t get any sleep last night in order to see the meteors.
昨夜我们夜话一宿，她似乎长大了许多。

Last night, the patrol team captured another boat that intended to ferry across the border secretly.
他是昨天半夜发的病，现在还在抢救。

汤姆昨晚和雷吵了一架，所以他不愿意邀请雷来他的生日聚会。

昨晚，楼上忽然传来的一声尖叫吓了我一跳。

我们决定分担昨晚晚餐的花销，因为让朱迪一个人给我们所有人付钱不公平。

别告诉老板我昨晚从收银机里拿了一百块。

Zuótiān de dàhuì kāi de xīxilālā，zhēn méi jìn。
Yesterday\'s meeting was a dull affair.
我昨天到一个老朋友家里去做客。
Wǒ zuótiān dào yígè lǎopéngyou jiālǐ qù zuòkè。
I was a guest at an old friend\'s yesterday.
昨天我做了一个可怕的梦。
Zuótiān wǒ zuò le yígè kěpà de mèng。
I had a terrible dream last night.

zuótiān
yesterday
我昨天着实被酒精折腾了一宿。
Wŏ zuótiān zhuóshí bèi jiŭjīng zhēténgle yìxiǔr。
昨天在安全岛附近我看见他帮助一位老人过马路。
Zuótiān zài Ānquándǎo fùjìn wǒ kànjiàn tā bāngzhù yíwèi lǎorén guò mǎlù。
I saw him helping an old man across the street by the pedestrian area.
昨天我在公园的水族馆看到了白鳍豚。
Zuótiān wǒ zài gōngyuán de shuǐzúguǎn kàndào le báiqítún。
Yesterday I saw dolphins in the aquarium in the park.
昨天我们参观了少林寺的大雄宝殿。
Zuótiān wǒmen cānguān le shàolínsì de dàxióng bǎodiàn。
Yesterday, we visited Daxiong temple hall of Shaolin Temple.
昨天的比赛中又爆出了“黑哨”丑闻！
Zuótiān de bǐsài zhōng yòu bàochū le“hēishào”chǒuwén！
Unfair refereeing in yesterday\'s match made the news again.
昨天演唱会的观众都爆棚了。
Zuótiān yǎnchànghuì de guānzhòng dōu bàopéng le。
There was only standing room for yesterday\'s concert.
昨天晚上受了风，今天我觉得全身不得劲儿。
Zuótiān wǎnshàng shòu le fēng，jīntiān wǒ juédé quánshēn bùdéjìnr。
I caught a cold last night, and felt ill today.
这次考试的吹风会昨天刚开完，今天老师会不会带来一些信息呢？
Zhècì kǎoshì de chuīfēnghuì zuótiān gāng kāiwán，jīntiān lǎoshī huìbuhuì dàilái yìxiē xìnxī ne？
We just had a meeting about this exam yesterday, will the teacher bring some more information about it today?
昨天，我们荡舟西湖。
Zuótiān，wǒmen dàngzhōu Xīhú。
We paddled a boat on the West Lake yesterday.
截止到昨天，工资已经全部发付到位。
Jiézhǐ dào zuótiān，gōngzī yǐjing quánbùfāfù dàowèi。
Salaries have been distributed to every worker up to yesterday.
昨天还头晕得厉害，今天已经好些了。
Zuótiān hái tóuyūn de lìhai，jīntiān yǐjing hǎo xiē le。
I felt dizzy yesterday, but I am better now.
昨天他忽地告诉我他要结婚了。
Zuótiān tā hū de gàosù wǒ tā yào jiéhūn le。
Yesterday, he suddenly told me that he was going to get married.
昨天他走的时候就不太精神，或是早就病了？
Zuótiān tā zǒu de shíhou jiù bú tài jīngshén，huòshì zǎo jiù bìng le？
He was spiritless when he left yesterday. Has he been ill for long?
他昨天晚上在驾驶室里睡了一晚。
Tā zuótiān wǎnshàng zài jiàshǐshì lǐ shuì le yì wǎn。
Last night he slept in the driver\'s cab.
昨天夜里树林里有一个女孩子被奸杀了。
Zuótiān yèlǐ shùlín lǐ yǒu yígè nǚháizi bèi jiānshā le。
A girl was raped and killed in the woods last night.
昨天运动时我不小心拉伤了肩窝的肌肉。
Zuótiān yùndòng shí wǒ bùxiǎoxīn lāshāng le jiānwō de jīròu。
I strained a muscle in the shallow part of my shoulder yesterday when I was doing sports.
地上积水这么深，可知昨天晚上雨下得不小啊！
Dìshàng jīshuǐ zhème shēn，kězhī zuótiān wǎnshàng yǔ xià de bùxiǎo a！
Since so much water has collected on the ground, the rain must have been quite heavy last night.
他于昨天在教堂接受了领洗。
Tā yú zuótiān zài jiàotáng jiēshòu le lǐngxǐ。
He was baptized in the church yesterday.
由于紧张，昨天的演出他居然冒场了。
Yóuyú jǐnzhāng，zuótiān de yǎnchū tā jūrán màochǎng le。
He made an early entrance  in the performance yesterday due to nervousness.
他昨天一夜没睡，今天一直睡眼蒙眬。
Tā zuótiān yíyè méi shuì，jīntiān yìzhí shuìyǎn ménglóng。
He did not sleep last night, and has been bleary-eyed all day.
昨天我在某个论坛上看到了一个特别有趣的帖子！
Zuótiān wǒ zài mǒu gè lùntán shàng kàndào le yígè tèbié yǒuqù de tiězi！
I saw a very interesting notice on a forum yesterday.
昨天小区里闹贼了，听说被盗的那家损失惨重。
Zuótiān xiǎoqū lǐ nàozéi le，tīngshuō bèi dào de nàjiā sǔnshī cǎnzhòng。
Burglars broke into the housing estate yesterday, I heard that that family suffered heavy losses.
昨天警察局门口竟发生了一起枪战。
Zuótiān jǐngchájú ménkǒu jìng fāshēng le yì qǐ qiāngzhàn。
There was a gun battle in front of the doorway of the police station yesterday.
昨天海关用燃烧弹销毁了一批毒品。
Zuótiān hǎiguān yòng ránshāodàn xiāohuǐ le yì pī dúpǐn。
Yesterday, customs destroyed a collection of drugs with incendiary bombs.
他爷爷昨天刚刚去世，他们全家都戴着热孝。
Tā yéye zuótiān gānggāng qùshì，tāmen quánjiā dōu dài zhe rèxiào。
His grandpa passed away yesterday, all of his family members are wearing mourning clothes.
我昨天晚上吃了两斤沙肝儿。
Wǒ zuótiān wǎnshàng chī le liǎng jīn shāgānr。
Last night I ate two kilos of pork liver.
昨天夜里巡逻队又截获了一艘企图偷渡的蛇船。
Zuótiān yèlǐ xúnluóduì yòu jiéhuò le yí sōu qǐtú tōudù de shéchuán。
Last night, the patrol team captured another boat that intended to ferry across the border secretly.
你昨天递交上来的条陈写得很好。
Nǐ zuótiān dìjiāo shànglái de tiáochén xiě de hěnhǎo。
The suggestions that you submitted to me yesterday were very good.
昨天晚上我们通宿打牌直到天亮。
Zuótiān wǎnshàng wǒmen tōngxiǔ dǎpái zhídào tiānliàng。
We played cards the whole night last night.
从昨天早上开始，天空就一直在下毛毛雨。
Cóng zuótiān zǎoshàng kāishǐ，tiānkōng jiù yìzhí zài xià máomáoyǔ。
A drizzle has gone on and on since yesterday morning.
昨天的讨论会上，同学们又提出了新论。
Zuótiān de tǎolùnhuì shàng，tóngxuémen yòu tíchū le xīnlùn。
The students proposed some new ideas in yesterday\'s symposium.
我们昨天去香山了，满山秀色，风景宜人。
Wǒmen zuótiān qù Xiāngshān le，mǎnshān xiùsè，fēngjǐng yírén。
Yesterday we went to the Fragrant Hill. It was full of beautiful sceneries and made us feel very pleasant.
我们昨天去王府井商场买了一双黄色的绣鞋。
Wǒmen zuótiān qù wángfǔjǐng shāngchǎng mǎi le yì shuāng huángsè de xiùxié。
Yesterday we bought a pair of yellow embroidered shoes at the Wangfujing Department Store.
昨天看恐怖片，今天我的心还虚悬着呢。
Zuótiān kàn kǒngbùpiān，jīntiān wǒ de xīn hái xūxuán zhe ne。
Having watched a horror film yesterday, my heart is still unsettled today.
她为减肥日渐削瘦，把身体都弄垮了，昨天去看医生了。
Tā wèi jiǎnféi rìjiàn xiāoshòu，bǎ shēntǐ dōu nòng kuǎ le，zuótiān qù kàn yīshēng le。
She has lost so much weight that there is something wrong with her health. Therefore, she went to see the doctor yesterday.
他们昨天打架了，今天脸上还有血痕呢。
Tāmen zuótiān dǎjià le，jīntiān liǎnshàng háiyǒu xuèhén ne。
They had a fight yesterday. There are still small wounds on their faces.
昨天我去检查身体了，血象有点高。
Zuótiān wǒ qù jiǎnchá shēntǐ le，xuè xiàng yǒu diǎn gāo。
I took a physical test yesterday. My hemogram was a bit high.
他昨天被训诫了一通，所以心情不大好。
Tā zuótiān bèi xùnjiè le yítòng，suǒyǐ xīnqíng búdà hǎo。
He feels upset because he was reprimanded yesterday.
昨天他和小张打架了，胳臂上全是被咬的牙印。
Zuótiān tā hé Xiǎo Zhāng dǎjià le，gēbei shàng quánshì bèi yǎo de yáyìn。
He had a fight with Xiao Zhang yesterday and there are bite marks all over his arms.
昨天的军事演习，甲方放了一个哑炮。
Zuótiān de jūnshì yǎnxí，jiǎfāng fàng le yígè yǎpào。
During yesterday\'s sham battle, party A fired a dud.
昨天买了一盒胭脂红的颜料，还挺贵的。
Zuótiān mǎi le yì hé yānzhihóng de yánliào，hái tǐng guì de。
I bought a box of rouge yesterday, which was quite expensive.
昨天下雨了，檐口滴水，你小心点。
Zuótiān xiàyǔ le，yánkǒu dīshuǐ，nǐ xiǎoxīn diǎn。
It rained yesterday, the cornice is dripping water - be careful.
昨天老板请我们吃羊羹了，味道不错。
Zuótiān lǎobǎn qǐng wǒmen chī yánggēng le，wèidào búcuò。
Yesterday, my boss invited us to eat some red-bean cakes, they were delicious.
昨天看见一只羊眼，好奇怪啊。
Zuótiān kànjiàn yìzhī yángyǎn，hǎo qíguài a。
I saw a sheep\'s eye yesterday, it was grotesque.
昨天我扬扬洒洒写了一篇文章，结果没存盘。
Zuótiān wǒ yángyángsǎsǎ xiě le yì piān wénzhāng，jiéguǒ méi cúnpán。
I wrote an long article yesterday, but I didn\'t save it.
昨天小朋友 去养老院劳动了。
Zuótiān xiǎopéngyou qù yǎnglǎoyuàn láodòng le。
The children worked in a nursing home yesterday.
昨天公司收到邀请信，不知道派谁去。
Zuótiān gōngsī shōudào yāoqǐngxìn，bùzhīdào pài shuí qù。
Our company received the invitation letter yesterday, but I don\'t know who to send.
昨天去求了药王菩萨，希望他的病早点痊愈。
Zuótiān qù qiú le yàowáng púsà，xīwàng tā de bìng zǎo diǎn quányù。
I prayed to the medicine king bodhisattva that he can recover soon.
昨天我吃了新鲜的椰肉，味道很特别呢。
Zuótiān wǒ chī le xīnxiān de yēròu，wèidào hěn tèbié ne。
I ate some fresh coconut kernel yesterday, it had a special taste.
他昨天为了工作大骂了我一通。
Tā zuótiān wèi le gōngzuò dàmà le wǒ yí tòng。
He gave me a scolding out of work yesterday.
昨天他们打架，把衣扣都扯掉了。
Zuótiān tāmen dǎjià，bǎ yīkòu dōu chědiào le。
They had a fight yesterday, during which their buttons were torn off.
他昨天穿的那套衣裤是我送的，挺合身的。
Tā zuótiān chuān de nà tào yīkù shì wǒ sòng de，tǐng héshēn de。
The clothes he wore yesterday were sent by me, they fit him well.
世贸大厦在昨天的大爆炸中被夷为平地。
Shìmào dàshà zài zuótiān de dàbàozhà zhōng bèi yíwéi píngdì。
The world trade building was razed to the ground in the big explosion yesterday..
他昨天说的所有话都是有据可查的。
Tā zuótiān shuō de suǒyǒu huà dōushì yǒujù kěchá de。
All he said yesterday has adequate foundation.
我昨天把手袋落在奶奶家了，我有空儿就去取。
Wǒ zuótiān bǎ shǒudài làzài nǎinai jiā le，wǒ yǒukòngr jiù qù qǔ。
I left my bag at grandma\'s house yesterday; I will go and get it when I am free.
杰克昨天摔了一跤，脸上摔出老大一块淤斑。
Jiékè zuótiān shuāi le yì jiāo，liǎnshàng shuāichū lǎodà yí kuài yūbān。
Jack fell down yesterday and got a big bruise on his face.
我昨天晚上真的在家，他可以作证人。
Wǒ zuótiān wǎnshàng zhēn de zàijiā，tā kěyǐ zuòzhèng rén。
I really was at home last night, he is my witness.
他昨天梦见了梓里的小桥。
Tā zuótiān mèngjiàn le zǐlǐ de xiǎoqiáo。
Last night he dreamed of the small bridge in his hometown.
这条高速公路因为昨天的那场车祸被阻绝了。
Zhè tiáo gāosù gōnglù yīnwèi zuótiān de nà chǎng chēhuò bèi zǔjué le。
The expressway is blocked from yesterday\'s accident.
昨天我在街上让一个路边艺人为我画了肖像画。
Zuótiān wǒ zài jiēshàng ràng yígè lùbiān yìrén wèi wǒ huà le xiāo xiàng huà。
I had my portrait drawn by a roadside painter in the street yesterday.
这两拨货昨天已经发出了。
Zhèliǎngbōhuò zuótiān yǐjīng fāchūle。
The two batches of goods were sent out yesterday.
昨天下了一场大雨。
Zuótiān xiàle yìchǎngdàyǔ。
Yesterday there was a downpour.
昨天我们是抽签决定谁洗碗的。
Zuótiān wǒmen shì chōuqiānjuédìng shuí xǐwǎnde。
Yesterday we drew lots to decide who was going to wash the dishes.
昨天下了场大雪。
Zuótiān xiàlechǎng dàxuě。
It snowed heavily yesterday.
我是昨天到上海的。
Wǒ shì zuótiān dào Shànghǎide。
I arrived in Shanghai yesterday.
昨天我们玩得很过瘾。
Zuótiān wǒmen wánde hěnguòyǐn。
Yesterday we played to our heart\'s content.
想起来那件事好似是昨天发生的。
Xiǎngqǐlái nàjiànshì hǎosì shì zuótiān fāshēngde。
I think this is like what happened yesterday.
昨天发生山体滑坡。
Zuótiān fāshēng shāntǐ huápō.
Yesterday there was a landslide.

Zuótiān lái le jǐwèi kèrén?

Zuótiān zhāng yīshēng gěi tā kànguòbìng.

她昨天请了一天的假，是因为孩子生病了。

昨天一架军用飞机在城市附近的山上坠毁了。
Yesterday, I was so tired that I fell asleep at 9 p.m.
昨天我太累了，晚上九点就睡着了。

昨天有一百多人参加了詹妮的婚礼。

I felt dizzy yesterday, but I am better now.
可能是昨夜受风了，她后脊梁疼得厉害。

昨天他忽地告诉我他要结婚了。
Zuótiān tā hū de gàosù wǒ tā yào jiéhūn le。

昨天他走的时候就不太精神，或是早就病了？

他昨天晚上在驾驶室里睡了一晚。

Last night he slept in the driver\'s cab.
昨天夜里树林里有一个女孩子被奸杀了。
Zuótiān yèlǐ shùlín lǐ yǒu yígè nǚháizi bèi jiānshā le。
A girl was raped and killed in the woods last night.
昨天运动时我不小心拉伤了肩窝的肌肉。
Zuótiān yùndòng shí wǒ bùxiǎoxīn lāshāng le jiānwō de jīròu。
I strained a muscle in the shallow part of my shoulder yesterday when I was doing sports.
昨晚，一位的哥被两名男子劫杀了。
Zuówǎn，yí wèi dígē bèi liǎng míng nánzǐ jiéshā le。
Last night, a taxi driver was robbed and killed by two men.
昨晚我约了个朋友去酒吧喝酒。
Zuówǎn wǒ yuē le gè péngyou qù jiǔba hējiǔ。
I went to the bar for a drink with a friend last night.
地上积水这么深，可知昨天晚上雨下得不小啊！
Dìshàng jīshuǐ zhème shēn，kězhī zuótiān wǎnshàng yǔ xià de bùxiǎo a！
Since so much water has collected on the ground, the rain must have been quite heavy last night.
他于昨天在教堂接受了领洗。
Tā yú zuótiān zài jiàotáng jiēshòu le lǐngxǐ。
He was baptized in the church yesterday.
为了观看昨夜的流星雨，我们彻夜未眠。
Wèile guānkàn zuóyè de liúxīngyǔ，wǒmen chèyè wèimián。
We didn’t get any sleep last night in order to see the meteors.
由于紧张，昨天的演出他居然冒场了。
Yóuyú jǐnzhāng，zuótiān de yǎnchū tā jūrán màochǎng le。
He made an early entrance  in the performance yesterday due to nervousness.
他昨天一夜没睡，今天一直睡眼蒙眬。
Tā zuótiān yíyè méi shuì，jīntiān yìzhí shuìyǎn ménglóng。
He did not sleep last night, and has been bleary-eyed all day.
昨晚我梦游巴黎，在梦中我看到了巴黎圣母院。
Zuówǎn wǒ mèngyóu Bālí，zài mèng zhōng wǒ kàndào le Bālí Shèngmǔyuàn。
Last night I dreamed of  traveling to Paris and seeing Notre-Dame de Paris.
昨天我在某个论坛上看到了一个特别有趣的帖子！
Zuótiān wǒ zài mǒu gè lùntán shàng kàndào le yígè tèbié yǒuqù de tiězi！
I saw a very interesting notice on a forum yesterday.
昨天小区里闹贼了，听说被盗的那家损失惨重。
Zuótiān xiǎoqū lǐ nàozéi le，tīngshuō bèi dào de nàjiā sǔnshī cǎnzhòng。
Burglars broke into the housing estate yesterday, I heard that that family suffered heavy losses.
昨天警察局门口竟发生了一起枪战。
Zuótiān jǐngchájú ménkǒu jìng fāshēng le yì qǐ qiāngzhàn。
There was a gun battle in front of the doorway of the police station yesterday.
昨天海关用燃烧弹销毁了一批毒品。
Zuótiān hǎiguān yòng ránshāodàn xiāohuǐ le yì pī dúpǐn。
Yesterday, customs destroyed a collection of drugs with incendiary bombs.
他爷爷昨天刚刚去世，他们全家都戴着热孝。
Tā yéye zuótiān gānggāng qùshì，tāmen quánjiā dōu dài zhe rèxiào。
His grandpa passed away yesterday, all of his family members are wearing mourning clothes.
昨晚我头疼得难以入寐。
Zuówǎn wǒ tóuténg de nányǐ rùmèi。
My headache was so terrible last night that I couldn\'t fall asleep.
我昨天晚上吃了两斤沙肝儿。
Wǒ zuótiān wǎnshàng chī le liǎng jīn shāgānr。
Last night I ate two kilos of pork liver.
昨天夜里巡逻队又截获了一艘企图偷渡的蛇船。
Zuótiān yèlǐ xúnluóduì yòu jiéhuò le yí sōu qǐtú tōudù de shéchuán。
Last night, the patrol team captured another boat that intended to ferry across the border secretly.
我昨晚一直在编辑部里审稿。
Wǒ zuówǎn yìzhí zài biānjíbù lǐ shĕngǎo.
I was reading contributions to the edition department all night yesterday.
你昨天递交上来的条陈写得很好。
Nǐ zuótiān dìjiāo shànglái de tiáochén xiě de hěnhǎo。
The suggestions that you submitted to me yesterday were very good.
昨天晚上我们通宿打牌直到天亮。
Zuótiān wǎnshàng wǒmen tōngxiǔ dǎpái zhídào tiānliàng。
We played cards the whole night last night.
从昨天早上开始，天空就一直在下毛毛雨。
Cóng zuótiān zǎoshàng kāishǐ，tiānkōng jiù yìzhí zài xià máomáoyǔ。
A drizzle has gone on and on since yesterday morning.
昨天的讨论会上，同学们又提出了新论。
Zuótiān de tǎolùnhuì shàng，tóngxuémen yòu tíchū le xīnlùn。
The students proposed some new ideas in yesterday\'s symposium.
我们昨天去香山了，满山秀色，风景宜人。
Wǒmen zuótiān qù Xiāngshān le，mǎnshān xiùsè，fēngjǐng yírén。
Yesterday we went to the Fragrant Hill. It was full of beautiful sceneries and made us feel very pleasant.
我们昨天去王府井商场买了一双黄色的绣鞋。
Wǒmen zuótiān qù wángfǔjǐng shāngchǎng mǎi le yì shuāng huángsè de xiùxié。
Yesterday we bought a pair of yellow embroidered shoes at the Wangfujing Department Store.
昨天看恐怖片，今天我的心还虚悬着呢。
Zuótiān kàn kǒngbùpiān，jīntiān wǒ de xīn hái xūxuán zhe ne。
Having watched a horror film yesterday, my heart is still unsettled today.
她为减肥日渐削瘦，把身体都弄垮了，昨天去看医生了。
Tā wèi jiǎnféi rìjiàn xiāoshòu，bǎ shēntǐ dōu nòng kuǎ le，zuótiān qù kàn yīshēng le。
She has lost so much weight that there is something wrong with her health. Therefore, she went to see the doctor yesterday.
他们昨天打架了，今天脸上还有血痕呢。
Tāmen zuótiān dǎjià le，jīntiān liǎnshàng háiyǒu xuèhén ne。
They had a fight yesterday. There are still small wounds on their faces.
昨天我去检查身体了，血象有点高。
Zuótiān wǒ qù jiǎnchá shēntǐ le，xuè xiàng yǒu diǎn gāo。
I took a physical test yesterday. My hemogram was a bit high.
他昨天被训诫了一通，所以心情不大好。
Tā zuótiān bèi xùnjiè le yítòng，suǒyǐ xīnqíng búdà hǎo。
He feels upset because he was reprimanded yesterday.
昨天他和小张打架了，胳臂上全是被咬的牙印。
Zuótiān tā hé Xiǎo Zhāng dǎjià le，gēbei shàng quánshì bèi yǎo de yáyìn。
He had a fight with Xiao Zhang yesterday and there are bite marks all over his arms.
昨天的军事演习，甲方放了一个哑炮。
Zuótiān de jūnshì yǎnxí，jiǎfāng fàng le yígè yǎpào。
During yesterday\'s sham battle, party A fired a dud.
昨天买了一盒胭脂红的颜料，还挺贵的。
Zuótiān mǎi le yì hé yānzhihóng de yánliào，hái tǐng guì de。
I bought a box of rouge yesterday, which was quite expensive.
昨天下雨了，檐口滴水，你小心点。
Zuótiān xiàyǔ le，yánkǒu dīshuǐ，nǐ xiǎoxīn diǎn。
It rained yesterday, the cornice is dripping water - be careful.
昨天老板请我们吃羊羹了，味道不错。
Zuótiān lǎobǎn qǐng wǒmen chī yánggēng le，wèidào búcuò。
Yesterday, my boss invited us to eat some red-bean cakes, they were delicious.
昨天看见一只羊眼，好奇怪啊。
Zuótiān kànjiàn yìzhī yángyǎn，hǎo qíguài a。
I saw a sheep\'s eye yesterday, it was grotesque.
昨天我扬扬洒洒写了一篇文章，结果没存盘。
Zuótiān wǒ yángyángsǎsǎ xiě le yì piān wénzhāng，jiéguǒ méi cúnpán。
I wrote an long article yesterday, but I didn\'t save it.
昨天小朋友 去养老院劳动了。
Zuótiān xiǎopéngyou qù yǎnglǎoyuàn láodòng le。
The children worked in a nursing home yesterday.
昨天公司收到邀请信，不知道派谁去。
Zuótiān gōngsī shōudào yāoqǐngxìn，bùzhīdào pài shuí qù。
Our company received the invitation letter yesterday, but I don\'t know who to send.
昨天去求了药王菩萨，希望他的病早点痊愈。
Zuótiān qù qiú le yàowáng púsà，xīwàng tā de bìng zǎo diǎn quányù。
I prayed to the medicine king bodhisattva that he can recover soon.
昨天我吃了新鲜的椰肉，味道很特别呢。
Zuótiān wǒ chī le xīnxiān de yēròu，wèidào hěn tèbié ne。
I ate some fresh coconut kernel yesterday, it had a special taste.
昨夜我们夜话一宿，她似乎长大了许多。
Zuóyè wǒmen yèhuà yìxiǔ，tā sìhū chángdà le xǔduō。
After we talked the whole night, she seems to be more mature.
他昨天为了工作大骂了我一通。
Tā zuótiān wèi le gōngzuò dàmà le wǒ yí tòng。
He gave me a scolding out of work yesterday.
昨天他们打架，把衣扣都扯掉了。
Zuótiān tāmen dǎjià，bǎ yīkòu dōu chědiào le。
They had a fight yesterday, during which their buttons were torn off.
他昨天穿的那套衣裤是我送的，挺合身的。
Tā zuótiān chuān de nà tào yīkù shì wǒ sòng de，tǐng héshēn de。
The clothes he wore yesterday were sent by me, they fit him well.
世贸大厦在昨天的大爆炸中被夷为平地。
Shìmào dàshà zài zuótiān de dàbàozhà zhōng bèi yíwéi píngdì。
The world trade building was razed to the ground in the big explosion yesterday..
昨日的辉煌已经永逝，我们要懂得把握今天。
Zuórì de huīhuáng yǐjing yǒngshì，wǒmen yào dǒngdé bǎwò jīntiān。
The glory of the past has gone forever; we should learn to grasp today.
他昨天说的所有话都是有据可查的。
Tā zuótiān shuō de suǒyǒu huà dōushì yǒujù kěchá de。
All he said yesterday has adequate foundation.
我昨天把手袋落在奶奶家了，我有空儿就去取。
Wǒ zuótiān bǎ shǒudài làzài nǎinai jiā le，wǒ yǒukòngr jiù qù qǔ。
I left my bag at grandma\'s house yesterday; I will go and get it when I am free.
杰克昨天摔了一跤，脸上摔出老大一块淤斑。
Jiékè zuótiān shuāi le yì jiāo，liǎnshàng shuāichū lǎodà yí kuài yūbān。
Jack fell down yesterday and got a big bruise on his face.
我昨天晚上真的在家，他可以作证人。
Wǒ zuótiān wǎnshàng zhēn de zàijiā，tā kěyǐ zuòzhèng rén。
I really was at home last night, he is my witness.
他昨天梦见了梓里的小桥。
Tā zuótiān mèngjiàn le zǐlǐ de xiǎoqiáo。
Last night he dreamed of the small bridge in his hometown.
这条高速公路因为昨天的那场车祸被阻绝了。

The expressway is blocked from yesterday\'s accident.
昨天我在街上让一个路边艺人为我画了肖像画。

这两拨货昨天已经发出了。

Yesterday there was a downpour.

Zuówǎn wǒ shuìde hěnchén。
Last night I slept very deeply.

昨天我太累了，晚上九点就睡着了。

昨天在密苏里河流域发现了一具尸体。

昨晚我的狗生了六只小狗，它们简直太可爱了。

I called you thrice last night.

Being slandered that way made his blood boil, and he shook with anger.

In  history, China has been forced to sign too many humiliating treaties.
屈辱。
遭受百般的屈辱。

shòudào línɡrǔ 
be humiliated; suffer humiliation

凌辱。

陈诉委屈
chénsù wěiqū 
state one\'s grievances

Tā jué de shòu le wěiqū yìdǔqì jiù zǒu le。
Feeling he had been wronged, he went off in a fit of pique.
她自幼娇生惯养，未受过一日委屈。
Tā zì yòu jiāoshēngguànyǎng，wèi shòuguò yí rì wěiqū。
She\'s always lived in comfort, never had to put up with a single day\'s bad treatment.
你有委屈就说出来，不该拿别人杀气。

Get it off your chest if you feel you\'ve been wronged. Don\'t take it out on others.
诉委屈
sù wěiqu 
pour out one\'s grievances

You\'ll have to put up with it.
对不起，委屈你了。

Cí de qū zhé xíngshì kě yóu yí gè cígàn hé yì zǔ fùjiā cíwěi biànhuà lái tǐxiàn。
词的屈折形式可由一个词干和一组附加词尾变化来体现。
He assumed an attitude of surrender.
Tā zhuāng chū qūfú de tàidù。
他装出屈服的态度。
He was active in drawing attention to their grievances.
Tā jījí hàozhào rénmen guānzhù tāmen de yuānqū。
他积极号召人们关注他们的冤屈。
She dipped her knee.
Tā qūxī xínglǐ。
她屈膝行礼。
Editors and journalists who express opinions in print that are opposed to the interests of the rich are dismissed and replaced by subservient ones.
Nàxiē yǔ fùrén lìyì zuòduì de biǎodá tāmen guāndiǎn de biānjí hé jìzhě bèi kāichúle，bìng bèi nàxiē qūcóng de rén suǒ qǔdài。
那些与富人利益作对的表达他们观点的编辑和记者被开除了，并被那些屈从的人所取代。
Eventually the family left the house to the devices of this malevolent force.
Zuìzhōng，zhè yì jiā rén qūfú yú xié\'è shìlì ér líkāile fángzi。
最终，这一家人屈服于邪恶势力而离开了房子。
When bending the elbow the triceps are the antagonist.
Qū bì shí，gōngsāntóujī wèi duìkàngjī。
屈臂时，肱三头肌为对抗肌。

He was resigned to a life of dishonor.
Tā guòzhe qūrǔ de shēnghuó。

The commander\'s prostration demoralized his men.

There were only extralegal recourses for their grievances.
Tāmen de yuānqū zhǐnéng yòng fǎlǜ guīdìng fànwéi zhī wài de shǒuduàn lái jiějué。
他们的冤屈只能用法律规定范围之外的手段来解决。
German is an inflected language.

德语是一种屈折语言。
The queen\'s condescension was intended to make us feel comfortable.
Nǚwáng de qūzūn xíngwéi shì wèile ràng wǒmen gǎnjué qīngsōng yìxiē。
女王的屈尊行为是为了让我们感觉轻松一些。
He listened deferentially.
Tā bēigōngqūxī de língtīngzhe。
他卑躬屈膝地聆听着。

iron-willed and unyielding

bùqū
unyielding; unbending

This tribe refused to yield to the powerful invaders, and fought bravely.

A man should remain unyielding in the face of brutal force!
事情不是你想象的那样，你不要屈枉我！

不要做屈理的事。

Don\'t do anything unreasonable.
对不起，委屈你了。
Duìbuqǐ，wěiqu nǐ le。

Tā juédìng zài yě bùbēigōngqūxī de guò rìzi le。
He has decided not to bow to anyone, and lead an honorable life.
她很委屈，止不住暗泣。

他虽然没什么出息，但也不愿卑恭屈节。

Although he is not promising, he is unwilling to shrink back submissively.
他委屈得说不出话来，只是抽咽着。

Feeling wronged, he couldn\'t do anything but sob.
她情愿粉身碎骨，也不在敌人面前屈服。

She would rather be cut to pieces than yield to the enemy.
他的口供是屈打成招，不足为证。

这种屈心的事我不干。
Zhèzhǒng qūxīn de shì wǒ bú gàn。
I wouldn\'t do a mean thing like that.
你有委屈就说出来，不该拿别人杀气。

Get it off your chest if you feel you\'ve been wronged. Don\'t take it out on others.

他总是屈曲着腿，好像永远站不直。

He always bends his legs, as if he is always unable to stand up straight.
她委屈的哭了，咬着衣角，让人不忍再批评了。

Cóng xiānqín dào jìndài，lǎojiàoshòu jīngshǐ zǐjí míbú guàntōng，yóu yǐ jíbùwéi zuìjīng。
The elderly professor knows everything from the early Qin Dynasty to recent times, and from Jing, Shi, Zi to Ji, the last of which is his specialty.
秦桧是宋代著名的佞臣，受尽后人的唾骂。
Qín Huì shì Sòngdài zhùmíng de nìngchén，shòujìn hòurén de tuòmà。
Qinhui was a notorious sycophantic official in the Song dynasty, and was spurned by later generations.
先秦时期是我国的青铜器时代。
Xiānqín shíqī shì wǒguó de qīngtóngqì shídài。
The pre-Qin days were China\'s bronze age.
在秦朝的苛法逼迫下，终于发生了农民起义。
Zài Qíncháo de kēfǎ bīpò xià，zhōng yú fāshēng le nóngmín qǐyì。
The peasants were constrained by the harsh laws of the Qin Dynasty and staged an uprising.
秦王朝以还，我国确立了大一统的封建政权。
Qínwángcháo yǐhuán，wǒguó quèlì le dàyītǒng de fēngjiàn zhèngquán。
Since the establishment of the Qin Dynasty, our country established a unified feudal regime.
秦朝末年，陈涉率先起事。
西安出土的秦兵马俑，被称为世界第八大奇迹。

xiānqín diǎnjí 
pre-Qin books and records

The two families formed a marriage alliance.

A\' Fang Palace, which was ordered to be built by Emperor Qinshihuang, wasted both money and man power.
这枚大钱是秦代铸造的。

This copper coin was made during the Qin Dynasty.

Qíndài shíxiàn le huáxià mínzú de dàyìtǒng。
Cathay was reunified in Qin dynasty.
大篆在秦代以后就不通行了。
Dàzhuàn zài Qíndài yǐhòu jiù bùtōngxíng le。
Big seal characters were no longer used after the Qin Dynasty.
据说，淮扬菜发轫于先秦时期。
Jùshuō，huáiyángcài fārèn yú xiānqín shíqī。
The Huaiyang dish is said to originate from the pre-Qin period.
那些秦始皇兵马俑的方阵整齐，气势逼人。
Nàxiē Qínshǐhuáng bīngmǎyǒng de fāngzhèn zhěngqí，qìshì bīrén。
The Sculpture Legion in the Museum of Chin Shi Huang\'s mausoleum is full of power and grandeur.
秦始皇的功罪是大家争论的焦点。
Qínshǐhuáng de gōngzuì shì dàjiā zhēnglùn de jiāodiǎn。
The successes and blunders of the First Emperor of Qin is the point at issue.
秦始皇合一了六国。
Qínshǐhuáng héyī le liù guó。
Qin Shihuang united the eight states.
战国时期，为了对付秦国，齐国与鲁国偷偷会盟。
Zhànguó shíqī，wèi le duìfù Qínguó，Qíguó yǔ Lǔguó tōutōu huìméng。
During the Warring States Period, in order to defend  the Qin state, deputies from the states of Qi and Lu met surreptitiously with each other.
秦始皇所实行的极权统治让人民痛苦不堪。
Qínshǐhuáng suǒ shíxíng de jíquán tǒngzhì ràng rénmín tòngkǔ bùkān。
The totalitarian control carried out by the first emperor of the Qin Dynasty made people suffer greatly.
从先秦到近代，老教授经史子集靡不贯通，尤以集部为最精。
Cóng xiānqín dào jìndài，lǎojiàoshòu jīngshǐ zǐjí míbú guàntōng，yóu yǐ jíbùwéi zuìjīng。

Tim looked worried but then snorted a laugh through his nose.

我把这首歌放了好几个月，一声儿也没哼过。
他总是哼儿哈儿的，就是不说句痛快话。

groan with pain

我们没有选择直接的路线，而将绕道风景更美的路线。

Tā měi tiān zǎoshang ràozhe pǎodào pǎoshàng wǔ quān。
她每天早上绕着跑道跑上五圈。
The first major milestone in space exploration was in 1957, when the ussr\'s sputnik 1 orbited the earth.
1957 nián shì tàikōng tànsuǒ shì de dìyī gè zhòngyào lǐchéngbēi，dāngshí sūlián de rénzàowèixīng“wèixīng yī hào”（sputnik 1）jìnrù rào de guǐdào。
1957年是太空探索是的第一个重要里程碑，当时苏联的人造卫星“卫星一号”（Sputnik 1）进入绕地轨道。
As each spacecraft orbits the Earth it emits a carrier wave.

All of the planets rotate the sun in approximately the same ecliptic.

你必须明确回答这个问题，想绕是绕不过去的。

这是一个典型的傻瓜胆大妄为的例子。
One man calls another a fool, and at this the other stands up and clenches his fist and lands a blow on his nose.
Yí gè rén jiào lìng yí gèrén shǎguā，yúshì tā jiù zhàn qǐlái，wò jǐn quántou cháozhe nàgè rén de bízi dǎle yì quán。
一个人叫另一个人傻瓜，于是他就站起来，握紧拳头朝着那个人的鼻子打了一拳。
他一看考题就傻眼了。
Tā yí kàn kǎotí jiù shǎyǎn le。
When he saw the examination questions he got a nasty shock.
打开试卷，一看题目，他便傻眼了。
他对着她呵呵傻笑。
Tā duìzhe tā hēhēshǎxiào。
He giggled at her.
小孩子抿了抿嘴唇，傻乎乎地笑了。
Xiǎoháizi mǐn le mǐn zuǐchún，shǎhūhū de xiào le。
The child puckered up her lips and began to smile innocently.
她破涕为笑，说：“我真傻，怎么就没有想到这一点。”
Tā pòtìwéixiào，shuō:“Wǒ zhēn shǎ，zěnme jiù méiyǒu xiǎngdào zhè yìdiǎn。”
She smiled through her tears, and said, &quot;What a silly I am not to be aware of that!&quot;
嘿嘿地傻笑
傻呵呵地笑。
搞错了你还笑，看你这傻劲儿。
giggling that rasped his nerves
恼人的傻笑(声)
All they saw was a primitive, black girl from a backward country who was stupid and talked funny.
Suǒyǒu tāmen kàndào de shì yígè láizì luòhòu guójiā de pǔshí hēirén nǚhái，zhège hēirén nǚhái hěn shǎ，shuōhuó hěn gǎoxiào。
所有他们看到的是一个来自落后国家的朴实黑人女孩，这个黑人女孩很傻，说活很搞笑。
With funny faces and silly costumes, he made the audience laugh.
他滑稽的脸和傻乎乎的戏服惹得观众捧腹大笑。
傻头傻脑
他总是在众人面前冒傻气。
Tā zǒngshì zài zhòngrén miànqián mào shǎqì。
He always acts and speaks like a fool in public.
他说话做事情都是这样傻里傻气的。
Tā shuōhuà zuòshìqing dōushì zhèyàng shǎlǐshǎqì de。
He thinks, and acts mechanically.
你真傻气，这点意思还看不出来？
他说话做事情都是这样傻里傻气的。
Tā shuōhuà zuòshìqing dōushì zhèyàng shǎlǐshǎqì de。
He thinks, and acts mechanically.
小孩子抿了抿嘴唇，傻乎乎地笑了。
Xiǎoháizi mǐn le mǐn zuǐchún，shǎhūhū de xiào le。
The child puckered up her lips and began to smile innocently.
With funny faces and silly costumes, he made the audience laugh.
他滑稽的脸和傻乎乎的戏服惹得观众捧腹大笑。
我常被她蔑称为傻瓜蛋。
Wǒ chángbèi tā mièchēngwéi shǎguādàn。
I\'m often scornfully referred to as a fool by her.
来了一个黑不溜秋的傻大个儿。
他的样子傻大黑粗，看着不像个文化人。
Tā de yàngzi shǎdàhēicū，kàn zhe bú xiàng gè wénhuàrén。
He looks clumzy and hulky, not like a well-educated man.
来了一个黑不溜秋的傻大个儿。
It was a clear case of fools rushing in.
Zhè shì yí gè diǎnxíng de shǎguā dǎndàwàngwéi de lìzi。
这是一个典型的傻瓜胆大妄为的例子。
你以为他傻吗？ 他才不傻呢！
Nǐ yǐwéi tā shǎ ma? Tā cái bùshǎ ne！
You think he\'s stupid? Not him!
他说话做事情都是这样傻里傻气的。
Tā shuōhuà zuòshìqing dōushì zhèyàng shǎlǐshǎqì de。
He thinks, and acts mechanically.
他还是傻傻地一如既往地爱着她。
Tā háishi shǎshǎ de yírú jìwǎng de ài zhe tā。
He is stupid that he loves her just as much as before.
我常被她蔑称为傻瓜蛋。
Wǒ chángbèi tā mièchēngwéi shǎguādàn。
I\'m often scornfully referred to as a fool by her.
他是个明白人，不会干什么傻事。
Tā shì gè míngbairén，bú huì gàn shénme shǎ shì。
He is too sensible to do anything foolish.
她破涕为笑，说：“我真傻，怎么就没有想到这一点。”
Tā pòtìwéixiào，shuō:“Wǒ zhēn shǎ，zěnme jiù méiyǒu xiǎngdào zhè yìdiǎn。”
She smiled through her tears, and said, &quot;What a silly I am not to be aware of that!&quot;
你真傻，他这点意思都听不出来。
Nǐ zhēn shǎ，tā zhè diǎn yìsi dōu tīngbu chūlái。
How stupid you were. You should have known what he was driving at.
吓傻了
xiàshǎ le
be dumbfounded; be stunned
别一个劲儿傻干，要讲究方法。
Bié yígejìnr shǎgàn，yào jiǎngjiū fāngfǎ。
Don\'t just keep slogging away. Pay attention to method.
别看他傻呵呵的，心里可有数。
Bié kàn tā shǎhēhē de，xīnlǐ kě yǒushù。
Maybe he doesn\'t look very clever, but he knows what\'s what.
小孩子抿了抿嘴唇，傻乎乎地笑了。
Xiǎoháizi mǐn le mǐn zuǐchún，shǎhūhū de xiào le。
The child puckered up her lips and began to smile innocently.
不能光靠傻劲儿，得找窍门。
Bùnéng guāng kào shǎjìnr，děI zhǎo qiàomén。
Enthusiasm alone won\'t do. You\'ve got to work skilfully.
这小伙子干活有股傻劲儿。
Zhè xiǎohuǒzi gànhuó yǒu gǔ shǎjìnr。
That youngster works with a will.
他一看考题就傻眼了。
Tā yí kàn kǎotí jiù shǎyǎn le。
When he saw the examination questions he got a nasty shock.
看你这傻样，还不快过来和大家打招呼。
Kàn nǐ zhè shǎyàng，hái bú kuài guòlai hé dàjiā dǎ zhāohū。
Don\'t stand there looking so foolish. Come over and say hello to everybody.
傻瓜照相机
shǎguā zhào xiàng jī 
foolproof camera
这孩子从小就痴傻，不太正常。
Zhè háizi cóng xiǎo jiù chīshǎ，bú tài zhèngcháng。
The child has been abnormally- mentally retarded since childhood.
她都走了，你还呆傻在那儿干什么？
Tā dōu zǒu le，nǐ hái dāishǎ zài nàr gàn shénme？
She has gone. Why are you still there like a fool?
别站在那里发傻了，快去写作业吧。
Bié zhàn zài nàlǐ fāshǎ le，kuài qù xiězuòyè ba。
Stop looking at a loss and get down to your homework.
你看你又发傻，天冷不知道加衣服啊！
Nǐ kàn nǐ yòu fāshǎ，tiānlěng bùzhīdào jiā yīfu a！
What a fool you are! Why don\'t you wear a warm coat on such a cold day?
别犯傻了，这事就是你干的。
Bié fànshǎ le，zhèshì jiùshì nǐ gàn de。
You did it, don’t pretend to be innocent!
小明尽干犯傻的事儿，今天上课他又走错教室了。
Xiǎo Míng jìn gān fànshǎ de shìr，jīntiān shàngkè tā yòu zǒu cuò jiàoshì le。
Xiao Ming always acts foolishly, he went to the wrong classroom today.
别在这儿犯傻了，时间都让你耽误了。
Bié zài zhè\'ér fànshǎ le，shíjiān dōu ràng nǐ dānwù le。
Don\'t stay here staring blankly, we are running out of time.
他总是在众人面前冒傻气。
Tā zǒngshì zài zhòngrén miànqián mào shǎqì。
He always acts and speaks like a fool in public.
别在那儿傻站着，还不快给客人请茶！
Bié zài nàr shǎzhàn zhe，hái bú kuài gěi kèrén qǐngchá！
Don’t just stand there like a fool, why don\'t you serve tea to the guests?
他的样子傻大黑粗，看着不像个文化人。
Tā de yàngzi shǎdàhēicū，kàn zhe bú xiàng gè wénhuàrén。
He looks clumzy and hulky, not like a well-educated man.
这是一台傻瓜相机，使用起来非常方便。
Zhè shì yìtái shǎguā xiàng jī，shǐyòng qǐlái fēicháng fāngbiàn。
This is an Instamatic. It is very easy to operate.
都别傻愣愣地坐着了，赶快开始工作吧！
Dōu bié shǎlènglèng de zuò zhe le，gǎnkuài kāishǐ gōngzuò ba！
Don\'t sit there in trance. Start working quickly.
别以为我是傻帽儿，我的见识不比你少！
Bié yǐwéi wǒ shì shǎmàor，wǒ de jiànshí bù bǐ nǐ shǎo ！
Don\'t think I am a nut. I know no less than you.
损人不利己的事情只有傻子才会做。
Sǔnrén bú lìjǐ de shìqing zhǐyǒu shǎzi cáihuì zuò。
Only fools will do things harmful to others which are not beneficial to themselves.
在这种危机重重的时候，向来聪明的他也只能装傻充愣。
Zài zhèzhǒng wēijī chóngchóng de shíhou，xiàng lái cōngming de tā yě zhǐnéng zhuāngshǎ chōnglèng。
Being bogged down in crises, he who was always very clever had no choice but to feign confusion over the current situation.

Tā duìzhe tā hēhēshǎxiào。
He giggled at her.

他现在正和上流社会的一个傻瓜在一起，而这个人刚刚与他妹妹结婚。
You would be a dingbat even to try it.
Rúguǒ nǐ chángshì nàyàng zuò，nǐ huì shì yí gè shǎguā。
如果你尝试那样做，你会是一个傻瓜。
She\'s a total airhead.
Tā shì yí gè shízú de shǎguā。
她是一个十足的傻瓜。
The suggester of this absurd strategy was a fool.
Zhège huāngmiù cèlüè de tíyìzhě shì gè shǎguā。
这个荒谬策略的提议者是个傻瓜。
装疯卖傻
zhuāngfēngmàishǎ
play the fool
装疯卖傻
Zhuāngfēngmàishǎ
play the fool
装疯卖傻
装疯卖傻是他的惯伎。
He\'s acting the fool, making everyone feel good.
Tā zài zhuāngfēng-màishǎ， shǐ měi gè rén dōu gǎnjué hěn hǎo。
他在装疯卖傻，使每个人都感觉很好。
He\'s acting the fool，making everyone feel good.
Tā zhuāngfēngmàishǎ，hǎo ràng suǒyǒu rén gǎnjué liánghǎo。
他装疯卖傻，好让所有人感觉良好。
别犯傻了，这事就是你干的。
Bié fànshǎ le，zhèshì jiùshì nǐ gàn de。
You did it, don’t pretend to be innocent!
小明尽干犯傻的事儿，今天上课他又走错教室了。
Xiǎo Míng jìn gān fànshǎ de shìr，jīntiān shàngkè tā yòu zǒu cuò jiàoshì le。
Xiao Ming always acts foolishly, he went to the wrong classroom today.
别在这儿犯傻了，时间都让你耽误了。
Bié zài zhè\'ér fànshǎ le，shíjiān dōu ràng nǐ dānwù le。
Don\'t stay here staring blankly, we are running out of time.
别跟我犯傻，你总得给我个答复。
你犯傻啦，怎么不放水就把米蒸上了？
电影散场了，他还呆在那里犯傻。
you are/must be mad (to do that)
你(那么做)准是犯傻了
In the story, an arch criminal named The Vampire uses a drug to kill an idiot.
Gùshi zhōng，yí gè míng jiào“xīxuèguǐ”de fànzuì lǎoshǒu yòngle yì zhǒng yàowù qù shāsǐ yí gè shǎguā。
故事中，一个名叫“吸血鬼”的犯罪老手用了一种药物去杀死一个傻瓜。
心广体胖
xīnguǎngtǐpán
carefree and contented; fit and happy
心广体胖。
你这样打肿脸充胖子，到最后只能自己吃亏。
Nǐ zhèyàng dǎzhǒng liǎn chōng pàngzi，dào zuìhòu zhǐnéng zìjǐ chīkuī。
If you get beyond your depth like this , it is you who will suffer at last.
一个胖小子
yígè pàngxiǎozi
a chubby little boy
这胖小子唇红齿白的，真好看。
Zhè pàngxiǎozi chúnhóng chǐbái de，zhēn hǎokàn。
This little plump boy has rosy lips and pretty white teeth, he\'s really good-looking.
她不是发胖，是双身子。
Tā búshì fā pàng，shì shuāngshēnzi。
She isn\'t really getting fat; she is with child (or she\'s in the family way).
现在的女孩子大都怕胖。
Xiànzài de nǚháizi dàdōu pà pàng。
Most girls are afraid of being overweight.
他年轻时是个瘦子，现在发胖了。
Tā niánqīng shí shì gè shòuzi，xiànzài fāpàngle。
When he was young he was thin, but now he\'s fat.
公司都快倒闭了，别再充胖子了。
头胎养了个胖小子。
生了个胖小子。
他个子不高，胖墩墩的。
孩子生下来就胖嘟嘟的，人见人爱。
She was sandwiched in her airplane seat between two fat men.
Zài fēijī shàng，tā bèi jǐ zài liǎng gè dà pàngzi zhōngjiān。
在飞机上，她被挤在两个大胖子中间。
You should hire the fat and spotty one.
nǐ yīnggāi pìnyòng nàgè liǎn shàng zhǎngmǎn fěncì de pàngzi。
你应该聘用那个脸上长满粉刺的胖子。
Overweight children are being placed in foster care on the grounds that they are victims of child abuse.
那些肥胖的孩子因为遭受虐待将被寄养安置。
The fattest rabbits in winter are often found in close proximity to brambles.
Dōngtiān，zài jīngjí fùjìn，cháng fāxiàn zuì féipàng de tùzi。
冬天，在荆棘附近，常发现最肥胖的兔子。
He was a fat man with a dyed black moustache.
Tā shì yí gè rǎnzhe hēi húzǐ de pàng nánrén。
他是一个染着黑胡子的胖男人。
We will plump out that poor starving child.
Wǒmen jiāng bǎ zhège kělián、jī\'è de háizi yǎngpàng。
我们将把这个可怜、饥饿的孩子养胖。
The short round woman is in a red dress.
那位矮胖的女士穿了一件红裙子。
I caught sight of myself in the mirror at the store, and I realized I\'m getting fat.
我偶然在商店的镜子里瞥见自己的形象，才发觉自己长胖了。
这位老先生太胖，我一个人搀不起他来。
Zhèwèi lǎo xiānsheng tài pàng，wǒ yígèrén chān bu qǐ tā lái。
The old gentleman was too heavy, I wasn\'t able to help him up alone.
由于暴饮暴食，他现在已经胖得没有人样儿了。
Yóuyú bàoyǐn bàoshí，tā xiànzài yǐjing pàng de méiyǒu rényàngr le。
Because of overindulgence in food and drink, he is  really fat now.
原发性肥胖一般不会对人体造成伤害。
Yuánfāxìng féipàng yìbān búhuì duì réntǐ zàochéng shānghài。
Generally speaking, natural obesity should not be harmful to human bodies.
孩子生下来就胖嘟嘟的，人见人爱。
Obese people are more likely to take time off owing to illness.
pàngrén gèng kěnéng qǐng bìngjià。
胖人更可能请病假。
Fat people score particularly badly.
pàngrén huòdé de píngjià yóuqí bùhǎo。
胖人获得的评价尤其不好。
He was a fat man with a dyed black moustache.
Tā shì yí gè rǎnzhe hēi húzǐ de pàng nánrén。
他是一个染着黑胡子的胖男人。
Men are portly and women are stout.
Nánrén dūnshí，nǚrén féipàng。
男人敦实，女人肥胖。
She disliked fatness in herself as well as in others.
Tā bù xǐhuan zìjǐ hé tārén de shēncái féipàng。
她不喜欢自己和他人的身材肥胖。
Some people seem born to be square and chunky.
Yǒuxiē rén sìhū shēnglái jiù yòu\'ǎi-yòupàng。
有些人似乎生来就又矮又胖。
The unfit person will tend to be flabby and possibly fat.

这个身体不佳的人趋于肌肉松弛很可能变肥胖。
In the fight against obesity you have，no doubt，often regarded yourself as your own worst enemy.

这个小孩的脸蛋胖乎乎的。
Zhège xiǎohái de liǎndàn pànghūhū de。

a chubby child

yígè pàngxiǎozi
a chubby little boy
心广体胖
xīnguǎngtǐpán
carefree and contented; fit and happy
这是谁家的小孩儿，长得这么白胖。

What a chubby kid!
暴饮暴食对健康不利，也容易发胖啊。
Bàoyǐn bàoshí duì jiànkāng búlì，yě róngyì fāpàng a。
Binge-eating is bad for one\'s health. Besides, it will make you fat.
他如今膘肥体胖，都是猛吃猛喝造成的。

He is quite fat now as a result of his bad eating habits.
你这样打肿脸充胖子，到最后只能自己吃亏。

This little plump boy has rosy lips and pretty white teeth, he\'s really good-looking.
虽然他看起来身形有些胖，但跑起来犹如离弦之箭。

Though he is a little fat, he runs as fast as an arrow.
小娃娃胖嘟嘟的脸儿上，笑起来还有俩酒窝呢。

The baby shows two dimples on his chubby cheeks when he smiles.
他小时候胖墩墩的，长大以后却瘦了。
Tā xiǎoshíhou pàngdūndūn de，zhǎngdà yǐhòu què shòu le。
He used to be dumpy, but he became thin after he grew up.
他年轻时就不胖，年老以后显得更加清癯了。
Tā niánqīng shí jiù búpàng，niánlǎo yǐhòu xiǎnde gèngjiā qīngqú le。

由于暴饮暴食，他现在已经胖得没有人样儿了。

Because of overindulgence in food and drink, he is  really fat now.
他今年胖了许多，臀围从三尺长到了三尺五。
Tā jīnnián pàng le xǔduō，túnwéi cóng sān chǐ zhǎngdào le sān chǐ wǔ。
He has put on a lot of weight this year, his hip measurement growing from 3 feet to 3.5 feet.
原发性肥胖一般不会对人体造成伤害。
Yuánfāxìng féipàng yìbān búhuì duì réntǐ zàochéng shānghài。
Generally speaking, natural obesity should not be harmful to human bodies.
听说棕榈油可以减肥，广大 肥胖女士疯狂抢购。
Tīngshuō zōnglǘyóu kěyǐ jiǎnféi，guǎngdà féipàng nǚshì fēngkuáng qiǎnggòu。
It was said palm oil can help weight loss, so many obese women rushed crazily to buy it.
天天去跳健美操，你怎么还那么胖啊！
Tiāntiān qù tiào jiànměicāo，nǐ zěnme hái nàme pàng ɑ！
肥胖症是一种病态。
Féipàngzhèng shì yìzhǒng bìngtài。
Obesity is an illness.
他比过去胖多了。
Tā bǐ guòqù pàngduōle。
He weighs a lot more than he used to.
他有发胖的倾向。
Tā yǒu fāpàng de qīngxiàng.
He has a tendency to put on weight.

我知道如果戒烟的话我会变胖。

她在一年之内变得又胖又丑。

寒假结束后，她好像有点儿发胖。

去年一年，我想吃什么就吃什么，所以好像胖了一些。

那些肥胖的孩子因为遭受虐待将被寄养安置。

我怀头胎的时候非常胖。
Obesity during pregnancy poses one of the biggest risks to the health of an unborn child.
怀孕造成的肥胖严重威胁着胎儿的健康。
Mothers come in all shapes and sizes.
母亲们的高矮胖瘦各不相同。
The right style of swimsuit can help by hiding bulges.
款式适当的游泳衣有助于掩饰肥胖部位。
I\'m tall and thin and he\'s short and fat.
我又高又瘦，他又矮又胖。
Obesity is related to many diseases such as high blood pressure and heart disease.
肥胖与许多疾病有关，如高血压和心脏病。
Any cat - skinny, fat, young or old can be trained to use the toilet bowl!
不论是胖猫,瘦猫,老猫,小猫都可以被训练学会使用冲水马桶.
Fat women are campaigning against all forms of discrimination.
Féipàng fùnǚ fǎnduì yíqiè xíngshì de qíshì。

She\'s obsessed with her weight, even though she\'s not fat.
Jíshǐ tā bìng bú pàng，tā réng lǎo xiǎngzhe jiǎnféi de shì。

Niánlíng zēngzhǎng bù yídìng dǎozhì fāpàng。
年龄增长不一定导致发胖。
The knot is a dumpy, short-legged, wading bird.
Bīnyù shì yì zhǒng ǎipàng de duǎn jiǎo shèqín。
滨鹬是一种矮胖的短脚涉禽。
Obesity is gradual and progressive, often starting by age 4 or 5 years.

Everytime I see him he\'s put on more weight.

这个问题通常是在“官能性肥胖”的题目下进行讨论。
She was too fat to be a mannequin.

她太胖了，以至于不能成为一个时装模特。

她不喜欢自己和他人的身材肥胖。
We will plump out that poor starving child.
Wǒmen jiāng bǎ zhège kělián、jī\'è de háizi yǎngpàng。
我们将把这个可怜、饥饿的孩子养胖。
Sumo wrestlers are large heavy men.
Xiàngpū shuāijiāo duìyuán dōu fēicháng féipàng。
相扑摔跤队员都非常肥胖。
You should hire the fat and spotty one.
nǐ yīnggāi pìnyòng nàgè liǎn shàng zhǎngmǎn fěncì de pàngzi。
你应该聘用那个脸上长满粉刺的胖子。
Obese people are more likely to take time off owing to illness.
pàngrén gèng kěnéng qǐng bìngjià。
胖人更可能请病假。
Fat people score particularly badly.
pàngrén huòdé de píngjià yóuqí bùhǎo。
胖人获得的评价尤其不好。
我近来好像发胖了。
Wǒ jìnlái hǎo xiàng fāpàng le。
I seem to have put on some weight lately.
她不是发胖，是双身子。
Tā búshì fā pàng，shì shuāngshēnzi。
She isn\'t really getting fat; she is with child (or she\'s in the family way).
暴饮暴食对健康不利，也容易发胖啊。
Bàoyǐn bàoshí duì jiànkāng búlì，yě róngyì fāpàng a。
Binge-eating is bad for one\'s health. Besides, it will make you fat.
他有发胖的倾向。
Tā yǒu fāpàng de qīngxiàng.
He has a tendency to put on weight.
他年轻时是个瘦子，现在发胖了。
Tā niánqīng shí shì gè shòuzi，xiànzài fāpàngle。
When he was young he was thin, but now he\'s fat.
原发性肥胖一般不会对人体造成伤害。
Yuánfāxìng féipàng yìbān búhuì duì réntǐ zàochéng shānghài。
Generally speaking, natural obesity should not be harmful to human bodies.
There was a slight increase in her weight after the winter holidays.
寒假结束后，她好像有点儿发胖。
Gaining weight is not an inevitable part of getting older.
Niánlíng zēngzhǎng bù yídìng dǎozhì fāpàng。
年龄增长不一定导致发胖。
He began to fill out after he stopped excercising.
Tíngzhǐ duànliàn yǐhòu，tā kāishǐ fāpàng。
停止锻炼以后，他开始发胖。
The fattest rabbits in winter are often found in close proximity to brambles.
Dōngtiān，zài jīngjí fùjìn，cháng fāxiàn zuì féipàng de tùzi。
冬天，在荆棘附近，常发现最肥胖的兔子。
I caught sight of myself in the mirror at the store, and I realized I\'m getting fat.
我偶然在商店的镜子里瞥见自己的形象，才发觉自己长胖了。

In August 1914 , there was a dismally sentimental little dinner, when the French, German, Austrian and Belgian members of the committee drank together to the peace of the future.
1914 nián 8 yuè，zhèlǐ jǔbànle yígè chénmèn bēishāng de xiǎoxíng wǎnyàn，ér dāngshí Fǎguó、 Déguó、Àodìlì hé Bǐlìshí de tóngméngguó wěiyuánhuì chéngyuán què zhèngzài jǔbēi tóng zhù wèilái hépíng。

佩带左轮手枪穿着马甲的警官站在法庭周围。
The workers here must be badged.
Zài zhèli gōngzuò de rén bìxū pèidài zhèngjiàn。
在这里工作的人必须佩带证件。
a belted knight
佩绶带的骑士
Some nobles of the Middle Ages often leave devices with their name on the sword.
相当多的中世纪贵族常常在佩剑上留下带有自己名字的纹章。
Anyone wearing buttons or carrying signs is given especially close scrutiny.
Rènhé pèidài huīzhāng huòzhě xiédài biāoyǔ de rén dōu bèi tèbié zǐxì de jiǎnchá。
任何佩戴徽章或者携带标语的人都被特别仔细地检查。
民间传说佩戴貔貅玉佩可以辟邪、招财。
Mínjiān chuánshuō pèidài píxiū yùpèi kěyǐ bìxié、zhāocái。
The legend says that wearing jade articles carved in the shape of a pixiu (a fabulous wild beast) can ward off evil spirits and let riches come into your house.
这块玉佩是咱们家的传家宝。

This jade pendant is our family heirloom.
我对他的文才非常敬佩。

大家以敬佩的目光望着他。

yùpèi
jade pendant

pèi yù

yāo pèi shǒuqiānɡ
carry a pistol in one\'s belt

Tā jīzhì yǒnggǎn，lìngrén pèifu。

pèijiàn yùndòngyuán

表示钦佩
biǎoshì qīnpèi
express admiration for

Tāmen jiānchí kēxué shíyàn de jīngshén lìng rén qīnpèi。

同志们对这种英勇行为无不表示钦佩。

All the comrades, without exception, expressed great admiration for this heroic act.
佩服得五体投地
pèifu de wǔtǐtóudì 
prostrate oneself before sb. in admiration; admire sb. from the bottom of one\'s heart; worship sb.
钦佩
qīnpèi
admire; esteem
看到宝宝被你调教得这么服帖，我真佩服你。
Kàndào bǎobǎo bèi nǐ tiáojiào de zhème fútiē，wŏ zhēn pèifú nǐ。
他爱惜羽毛、洁身自好，令人钦佩。
Tā àixī yǔmáo、jiéshēn zìhào，lìngrén qīnpèi。
He takes great care not to do anything that may compromise his good name. That\'s great.
据说佩戴宝玉饰品可以得到好运。
Jùshuō pèidài bǎoyù shìpǐn kěyǐ dédào hǎoyùn。
It is said that wearing precious jade ornaments brings good luck.

他对自己的信念始终不渝，令人敬佩。
Tā duì zìjǐ de xìnniàn shǐ zhōng bùyú，lìngrén jìngpèi。
His loyalty to his faith deserves our respects.

Tā zhè gǎnxiǎng gǎngàn de jìnr，wǒ hái zhēnshì pèifú！

他的事迹真令人感佩！
Tā de shìjì zhēn lìngrén gǎnpèi！

Tā de gāofēng liàngjié wéirén suǒ qīnpèi。

每年的端午节，我都会用佩兰做些香袋送给朋友。

她身上的这块佩玉是奶奶送给她的。
Tā shēnshàng de zhèkuài pèiyù shì nǎinai sònggěi tā de。
The jade pendant she wears was given by her grandma.
他的速算速度惊人，我们都很佩服他。
Tā de sùsuàn sùdù jīngrén，wǒmen dōu hěnpèifú tā。
He can calculate numbers at an amazing speed, which has won our admiration.

sturdy and durable

耐心等待
nàixīn děngdài
wait patiently
她做任何事都耐心得很。
Tā zuò rènhé shì dōu nàixīn de hěn。
She does everything patiently.
失去耐心
shīqù nàixīn
lose one\'s patience; be out of patience
伺候病人没有耐心烦可不行。
Cìhòu bìngrén méiyǒu nàixīn fán kě bùxíng。
It needs great patience to nurse the sick.
耐心劝导
nàixīn quàndǎo
try patiently to talk sb. round
要耐心说服他。
Yào nàixīn shuōfú tā。

教练耐心地指点他们。
Jiàoliàn nàixīn de zhǐdiǎn tāmen。

变富/变老/变得不耐烦

（对某事）不耐烦

我有种感觉，他也在安静耐心地等待着。
After an hour of waiting I was at the boiling point.
Děng le yí gè xiǎoshí hòu，wǒ zhōngyú rěnnàibúzhù le。
等了一个小时后，我终于忍耐不住了。
The horse that won the race is a good stayer.
Sàipǎo zhōng huòshèng de nà pǐ mǎ hěn yǒu nàilì。
赛跑中获胜的那匹马很有耐力。
Acrylic blankets are both warm and washable.
Bǐngxīsuān de dìtǎn nuǎnhuo érqiě nàixǐ。
丙烯酸的地毯暖和而且耐洗。
Regular exercise resulted in the re-establishment of his endurance.
Yǒu guīlǜ de duànliàn chóngxīn jiànlìle tā de nàilì。
有规律的锻炼重新建立了他的耐力。
He was a great believer in the corrosion-resistant qualities of cast iron.
Tā duì zhùtiě de nàifǔshíxìng jiānxìn bù yí。
他对铸铁的耐腐蚀性坚信不疑。
She shot him an impatient side-glance.
Tā bú nàifán de xiéshìle tā yì yǎn。
她不耐烦地斜视了他一眼。
They advertised the durability of their products.
Tāmen xuānchuán qí chǎnpǐn de chíjiǔ nàiyòng。
他们宣传其产品的持久耐用。
He advertised the imperishability of the product.
Tāmen xuānchuán nàzhǒng chǎnpǐn de nàiyòngxìng。
他们宣传那种产品的耐用性。
He answered her impatiently.
Tā hěn búnàifán de huídále tā de wèntí。
他很不耐烦地回答了她的问题。
This material outwears all others.

这种材料比其他材料都耐用。
They outstayed their competitors.
Tāmen de nàijiǔlì bǐ duìshǒu qiáng。
他们的耐久力比对手强。
He patiently played with the child.
Tā hěn nàixīn de hé háizi wánr。
他很耐心地和孩子玩儿。

kèkǔ nàiláo
bear hardships and work hard
他做事总是急不可耐，缺乏理性。

liǎn shàngxiǎnchū bu nàifán de shénsè
with impatience written on one\'s face
他老说车轱辘话，我都不耐烦了。
Tā lǎoshuō chēgūlù huà，wǒ dōu bú nàifán le。

他的这篇报告里都是冗词赘句，听者越来越不耐烦。

His report is full of redundant words and repetitive expressions, the audience are getting impatient.
头家出牌太慢了，我有些不耐烦。

It needs great patience to nurse the sick.

显得不耐烦。
This better be good

山峰赫然耸现在我们面前

他是曼切斯特最显赫的名人。

现在的上流社会到底有多显赫呢？

这些手稿是巴赫本人的手迹。

巴赫的音乐几乎是与心脏跳动合拍的。

这真会对她很有帮助，因为我们都会支援她。

大家一定要挺住，援军马上就要到了。

这篇译文丢失了法语原文中许多精妙的表达。

如果个人身份号码或密码丢失或遗忘，可以更换或重发，但生物身份识别则不能。

diūrénxiànyǎn
make a fool of oneself; make a spectacle of oneself
笔套容易丢，别随处乱放。
Bǐtào róngyì diū，bié suíchù luànfàng。

他丢了学生证，只好申请处补办。
Tā diū le xuéshengzhèng，zhǐhǎo shēnqǐngchù bǔbàn。
He lost his student card, and had to re-register to get another.
把那封信放到我抽斗里，小心别丢了。
Bǎ nàfēngxìn fàngdào wǒ chōudǒu lǐ，xiǎoxīn bié diū le。
You should put the letter away, be careful not to lose it.
我这个手镯可是纯金打造的，可别给我弄丢了。
Wǒ zhège shǒuzhuó kě shì chúnjīn dǎzào de，kě bié gěi wǒ nòngdiū le。
My bracelet is made of pure gold, so be careful not to lose it.
穿这件衣服出席晚宴，也太丢份了。
Chuān zhèjiàn yīfu chūxí wǎnyàn，yě tài diūfèn le。
Dress yourself the way you do and you will be making a spectacle of yourself at the banquet.
这些耕地丢荒了，真让人可惜。
Zhèxiē gēngdì diūhuāng le，zhēn ràngrén kěxī。
It is a pity to let this cultivated land lie idle.
自从见到她以后，他整天丢魂落魄。
Zìcóng jiàn dào tā yǐhòu，tā zhěngtiān diūhún luòpò。
He has been preoccupied with her ever since he met her.
这次考试，小明在多选题上丢了不少分儿。

Xiaoming did badly in the multiple choice in this exam.
去买个菜竟然丢了钱包，这事想起来就觉得犯堵！

It drives me mad to know that he lost his wallet when going to the market.
因为把手机丢了，她站在那里号咷大哭。
Yīnwéi bǎ shǒujī diū le，tā zhànzài nàlǐ hàotáo dàkū。
She cried loudly because she lost her mobile phone.
他的尸体被丢在荒沟中，无人认领。
Tā de shītǐ bèi diūzài huānggōu zhōng，wúrén rènlǐng。
His corpse was abandoned in a deserted ditch, and no one claimed it.
和同龄人相比，他的生活实在是灰不溜丢。

Compared with his peers, his life was really gloomy.
这一段时间我的机运极差，总是丢钱。
Zhè yíduàn shíjiān wǒ de jīyùn jíchà，zǒng shì diūqián。
I have had very bad luck recently, always losing money.
请游客注意景区卫生，不要乱丢垃圾。
Qǐng yóukè zhùyì jǐngqū wèishēng，búyào luàndiū lājī。
Please keep the site clean and do not litter.

他自行车车轮上的轮辐丢了，得再买一个装上去。
Tā zìxíngchē chēlún shàng de lúnfú diū le，děi zài mǎi yígè zhuāng shàngqù。

小明突然蔫不唧的，原来他心爱的自行车丢了。

Xiao Ming is quite despondent, for he lost his beloved bicycle.
一下子丢了这么多钱，对她来说真是青天霹雳！

It was really a bolt from the blue for her to lose so much money at one time.

虽然为此丢了工作，可我依然无悔无怨。

Eventhough I lost my job over it, I have no regrets.

zhèjiànshì wǒ diūbùkāi。
I can\'t let go of it.

diū miànzi

kuīxīnshì

亏心事
kuīxīnshì
a deed that troubles (or weighs on) one\'s conscience
你说这话，不亏心吗？
Nǐ shuō zhè huà，bùkuīxīn ma?
Doesn\'t your conscience trouble you for saying that?
