Ènàn zhī shí，xìngkuī péngyou bāngzhù le tā。
He survived the time of hardship thanks to the help from his friends.
这次的事多亏你帮助我，略备菲酌，表示感谢。
Zhècì de shì duōkuī nǐ bāngzhù wǒ，lüèbèi fěizhuó，biǎoshì gǎnxiè。
I\'d like to thank you for your help with a simple meal.
骂他混账一点也不亏，他太气人了。
Mà tā hùnzhàng yìdiǎn yě bùkuī，tā tài qìrén le。
It\'s not excessive to call him a bastard. He is such a nuisance!
幸亏是请的家政，要是我们自己这些积垢是很难清理的。
Xìngkuī shì qǐng de jiāzhèng，yàoshì wǒmen zìjǐ zhèxiē jīgòu shì hěnnán qīnglǐ de。
Luckily, we have employed a housemaid. It would have been very difficulty for us to clean these scales.
航空母舰不小心挤垮了一艘小渔船，幸亏没造成人员伤亡。
Hángkōngmǔjiàn bùxiǎoxīn jǐkuǎ le yì sōu xiǎo yúchuán，xìngkuī méi zàochéng rényuán shāngwáng。
The aircraft carrier accidentally hit a little fishing boat. Luckily, no one was hurt.
新经理一上任就制定了减亏增盈的计划。
Xīn jīnglǐ yí shàngrèn jiù zhìdìng le jiǎnkuī zēngyíng de jìhuà。
The newly-elected manager formulated a plan for turning the loss into a profit as soon as he took the post.
小明的病多亏奶奶精心看顾，很快就好了。
Xiǎo Míng de bìng duōkuī nǎinai jīngxīn kāngù，hěnkuài jiù hǎo le。
Thanks to the meticulous care from grandma, Xiaoming recovered from his illness quickly.
他不知天高地厚口出狂言，一定会吃亏的。
Tā bùzhī tiāngāo dìhòu kǒuchū kuángyán，yídìng huì chīkuī de。
He will suffer from boasting and having no idea of his limitations.
店里的苹果已经亏短了，需要补货！
Diàn lǐ de píngguǒ yǐjing kuīduǎn le，xūyào bǔhuò！
The apples in the store are insufficient so we need to purchase more.
公司这样一直亏累，已经很难支持下去了。
Gōngsī zhèyàng yìzhí kuīlèi，yǐjing hěnnán zhīchí xiàqù le。
The company shows repeated deficits and can hardly hold out.
这家店一直亏折，生意实在是做不下去了！
Zhèjiā diàn yìzhí kuīzhé，shēngyì shízai shì zuò bú xiàqù le！
This shop has been running a deficit and can hardly continue with its business.
今年的生意不好做，到年底公司竟然拉亏空了！
Jīnnián de shēngyì bùhǎozuò，dào niándǐ gōngsī jìngrán lākuīkōng le！
Business is down this year, and the company will run into debt by the end of the year.
多亏了邻人相救，他才能在火灾中逃生。
Duōkuī le línrén xiāngjiù，tā cáinéng zài huǒzāi zhōng táoshēng。
It was due to the help of his neighbours that he managed to survive the fire.
幸亏有录音遗嘱，他才能胜诉。
Xìngkuī yǒu lùyīn yízhǔ，tā cáinéng shèngsù。
Thanks to the recorded will or won the lawsuit.
幸亏得到了这次机会，才使得他的才华不至于沦没。
Xìngkuī dédào le zhècì jīhuì，cái shǐdé tā de cáihuá bùzhìyú lúnmò。
It\'s thanks to this opportunity that his talent wasn\'t buried.
爷爷得了脑血栓，幸亏治疗及时，恢复得还算不错。
Yéye dé le nǎoxuèshuān，xìngkuī zhìliáo jíshí，huīfù de háisuàn búcuò。
Grandpa suffered cerebral thrombus. But thanks to iearly treatment, he recovered well.
工厂得以扭亏创收，离不开全体干部职工的共同努力。
Gōngchǎng děi yǐ niǔkuī chuàngshōu，líbùkāi quántǐ gànbùzhígōng de gòngtóng nǔlì。
The factory turned loss into profit,  it would never have happened without the efforts of all the cadres and employees.
一路上多亏了同路人的帮助，我才能平安回来。
Yílùshàng duōkuī le tónglùrén de bāngzhù，wǒ cáinéng píngān huílái。
It was due to my fellow travelers\' help all through the journey that I could come back safely.
由于做了亏心事，他的内心终日不得安宁。
Yóuyú zuò le kuīxīnshì，tā de nèixīn zhōng rì bùdé ānníng。
He is conscience-stricken about his misconduct.
我吃了哑巴亏，有苦说不出，你就不要取笑我了。
Wǒ chī le yǎbakuī，yǒu kǔ shuō bùchū，nǐ jiù búyào qǔxiào wǒ le。
Don\'t make fun of me. I have already swallowed the bitter pill in silence.
眼前亏就别吃了，要识时务啊。
Yǎnqiánkuī jiù biéchī le，yào shí shíwù a。
Don\'t suffer from the troubles in front of you, you should submit to circumstances.
瞧他摇头摆尾的样子，早晚要吃亏的。
Qiáo tā yáotóu bǎiwěi de yàngzi，zǎowǎn yào chīkuī de。
Look at him, shaking his head and wagging his tail, he will get into trouble some day.
从那么高的地方摔下来都没事，你多亏了祖上积的阴骘。
Cóng nàme gāo de dìfāng shuāi xiàlái dōu méishì，nǐ duōkuī le zǔshàng jī de yīn zhì。
You fell from such a high place and you weren\'t hurt, you should thank the good deeds done in secret of your ancestors.
他吃了个哑巴亏，实在是有苦难言。
Tā chī le gè yǎbakuī，shízai shì yǒukǔ nányán。
He is suffering a loss, but is unable to complain about it.
企业自负盈亏的经营方式非常受欢迎。
Qǐyè zìfù yíngkuī de jīngyíng fāngshì fēicháng shòu huānyíng。
The enterprise\'s operational method of assuming sole responsibility for its profits or losses is well accepted by the people.
亏本
kuīběn
lose money in business
不亏不盈
bùkuībùyíng
neither too little nor too much
吃亏
chīkuī
lose out
在谈判中我们吃亏了。
Zài tánpàn zhōng wǒmen chīkuīle。
We lost out in the negotiation.
多亏你把他送医院了。
Duōkuī nǐ bǎ tā sòngyīyuàn le。
It\'s lucky that you took him to hospital.
多亏你告诉我们，不然我们就迷路了。
Duōkuī nǐ gàosù wǒmen，bùrán wǒmen jiù mílùle。
It\'s lucky that you told us or we would have got lost.
理亏
lǐkuī
be in the wrong
公司亏不了股东。
Gōngsī kuī bù liǎo gǔdōng.
The company can\'t allow its shareholders to suffer losses.
亏你把我叫醒，要不我就迟到了。
Kuī nǐ bǎ wǒ jiàoxǐng，yàobù wǒ jiù chídàole.
It\'s lucky you woke me up or I would have been late.
这种烂主意，亏你想得出来！
Zhèzhǒng làn zhǔyi，kuī nǐ xiǎng de chūlái！
How could you think up such a stupid idea?
亏他还是个经理，连这点问题都解决不了！
Kuī tā háishì gè jīnglǐ，lián zhèdiǎn wèntí dōu jiějué bù liǎo！
What a joy to have him as a manager - when he can\'t even solve a problem as small as this!
公司不能亏待员工。
Gōngsī bùnéng kuīdài yuángōng.
The company can\'t treat its workers badly.
幸亏他手疾眼快，一下子拔掉了电源。
Xìngkuī tā shǒujíyǎnkuài，yíxiàzǐ bádiàole diànyuán。
Luckily he was quick off the mark, and took the plug out of the socket at once.
功亏一篑。

他因为自己的愚蠢，多次错过了弥补亏损的机会。

你把低价泄露给他给公司带来了巨大的亏损。

年其它业务亏损额

由于缺乏远见，他们正在吃大亏。

多亏你的帮助
duōkūi nǐ de bāngzhù
thanks to your help
多亏你给我们带路。
Duōkūi nǐ gěi wǒmen dàilù。
We were lucky to have you as our guide.
多亏你救了我的驾！
Duōkūi nǐ jiù le wǒ de jià！
Thanks a lot for rescuing me from embarrassment!
多亏朋友帮衬，我才能有今天。

I owe my success to the generous help of my friends.
多亏有人在中间穿线，他们才能合好。

Thanks to someone acting as a go-between, they are reconciled again.

吃亏上当
他跑得不快，踢足球吃亏。
Tā pǎo de bú kuài，tī zúqiú chīkūi。
He can\'t run fast and that puts him at a disadvantage as a footballer.
两不吃亏。
Liǎnɡ bù chīkuī。
Neither side suffers any loss.
你还是忍耐一点吧，否则要吃亏的。
Nǐ háishi rěnnài yìdiǎn ba，fǒuzé yào chīkuī de。
You\'d better restrain yourself a little or you\'ll come to grief.
这事是我吃亏，但我也认了。
Zhè shì shì wǒ chīkuī，dàn wǒ yě rèn le。
I\'ve resigned myself to losing out this time.
有备才能无患，无备必定吃亏。
Yǒubèicáinéngwúhuàn，wúbèibìdìngchīkūi。
If one is prepared, one will be safe; if not, one will suffer. or Preparedness ensures security; unpreparedness invites disaster.
你这样打肿脸充胖子，到最后只能自己吃亏。
Nǐ zhèyàng dǎzhǒng liǎn chōng pàngzi，dào zuìhòu zhǐnéng zìjǐ chīkuī。
If you get beyond your depth like this , it is you who will suffer at last.
他不知天高地厚口出狂言，一定会吃亏的。
Tā bùzhī tiāngāo dìhòu kǒuchū kuángyán，yídìng huì chīkuī de。
He will suffer from boasting and having no idea of his limitations.
瞧他摇头摆尾的样子，早晚要吃亏的。
Qiáo tā yáotóu bǎiwěi de yàngzi，zǎowǎn yào chīkuī de。
Look at him, shaking his head and wagging his tail, he will get into trouble some day.

chīkuī
lose out

Zài tánpàn zhōng wǒmen chīkuīle。
We lost out in the negotiation.

光棍不吃眼前亏。
Guānɡɡùn bù chī yǎnqiánkūi。
A wise man doesn\'t fight agaist impossible odds.
别惹他们。这一帮人不好惹，好汉不吃眼前亏。

这件事情他不敢声张，只能吃哑巴亏了。

违章行驶
wéizhāngxíngshǐ 
drive against traffic regulations

work in a risky way in violation of the rules

The owner of the car was fined 200 Yuan for parking illegally.

违背自己的诺言

go back on one\'s word

违背/遵守(做某事的)诺言
做违心事
zuò wéixīn shì 
act against one\'s conscience
你不要再怪他了，他的话都是违心之论。
Nǐ búyào zài guài tā le，tā de huà dōushì wéixīn zhī lùn。
Stop blaming him. What he said was not what he really thinks.
他违心地投了赞成票。
Tā wéixīn de tóule zànchéngpiào。
He voted for the motion against his conscience.
与素心相违
yǔ sùxīn xiāng wéi
go against one\'s true will

against one\'s will
违背意愿地，违心地

wéifǎ shīzhí 
transgression of the law and neglect of duty

把违禁品没收(或充公)
There are three classes of illegal drugs, each with a different penalty.
Yǒu sān lèi wéijìnyàopǐn，měi yì zhǒng huì shòudào bùtóng de chǔfá。
有三类违禁药品，每一种会受到不同的处罚。
He claimed to have purchased the contraband innocently.
Tā shēngchēng zìjǐ shì wúyì zhōng cái mǎile wéijìnpǐn。
他声称自己是无意中才买了违禁品。
Marijuana is criminalized in the U.S..
Dàmá zài Měiguó shì yì zhǒng wéijìnwùpǐn。
大麻在美国是一种违禁物品。
on pain of death/imprisonment
违者以死/监禁论处
The offence carries a penalty of up to six months imprisonment and a fine.
该违法行为将被判处最多6个月的监禁，并支付罚金。
他们从不背着纠察队干违纪的事。
Tāmen cóngbú bèi zhe jiūcháduì gàn wéijì de shì。
They never violate the rules behind the pickets\'back.
对于这种违纪现象，主管部门一定要严加申饬。
Duìyú zhèzhǒng wéijì xiàn xiàng，zhǔguǎn bùmén yídìng yào yánjiā shēnchì。
The relevant department must seriously warn people who break rules like this.
试场中要严肃考试纪律，对于违纪的考生要严惩不待。
Shìchǎng zhōng yào yánsù kǎoshì jìlǜ，duìyú wéijì de kǎoshēng yào yánchéngbúdài。
Rules must be strictly enforced in an examination room, and examinees who have broken the rules should be severely punished.
对于顶风违法违纪的人，我们决不姑息！
Duìyú dǐngfēng wéifǎ wéijì de rén，wǒmen juébùgūxī！
We will never tolerate those who break the law and breach principles at the most critical moment.
以违反纪律论处
yǐ wéifǎn jìlǜ lùnchǔ 
be punished for a breach of discipline
违反纪律
wéifǎn jìlǜ 
violate discipline
违犯纪律
wéifàn jìlǜ 
violation of discipline; breach of discipline
有个别人违反纪律。
Yǒu gèbiérén wéifǎnjìlǜ。
A couple of people broke the rules.
违法乱纪的人必然会受到法律的严惩。
Wéifǎ luànjì de rén bìrán huì shòudào fǎlǜ de yánchéng。
People who violate the law and public discipline will definitely be punished by the law.
学生一旦违反校纪，就将受到严厉惩处。
Xuésheng yídàn wéifǎn xiàojì，jiù jiāng shòudào yánlì chéngchǔ。
The students will be severely punished if they break school regulations.
你有正经的工作不做却要跑出来做贼人，干那些违法犯纪的事。
Nǐ yǒu zhèngjing de gōngzuò búzuò què yào pǎochūlái zuò zéirén，gàn nàxiē wéifǎ fànjì de shì。
Though having a decent job, you gave it up to be a thief.
在工作岗位上他遵章守纪，从来没有违反过单位的制度。
Zài gōngzuò gǎngwèi shàng tā zūnzhāng shǒujì，cónglái méiyǒu wéifǎn guò dānwèi de zhìdù。
He abides by rules and regulations, and has never violated the regulations of the work unit.
违纪。
通过搞有偿新闻来抄肥，是严重违纪行为。
违纪现象。
他一辈子安分守己，从来不做违法违纪的事。
违法乱纪
对违法乱纪的人要严肃处理，任何人不得回护。
听说最近你身体违和，要多多保重啊！
Tīngshuō zuìjìn nǐ shēntǐ wéihé，yào duōduō bǎozhòng a！
I heard that you have not been well recently. Take care of yourself!
玄学和唯物论是相违背的。
Xuánxué hé wéiwùlùn shì xiāng wéibèi de。
Metaphysics goes against materialism.
贵体违和，善自珍摄。
broken health
健康违和
They should safeguard the public against illegal or unethical professional conduct.
Tāmen yào bǎohù gōngzhòng，ràng tāmen miǎnyú wéifǎ de hé bùhédàodé de zhíyè xíngwéi。
他们要保护公众，让他们免于违法的和不合道德的职业行为。
The notification stated the grace period and the penalties for defaulting.
Tōngzhī chǎnmíngle kuānxiàn qī hé wéiyuē chéngfá。
通知阐明了宽限期和违约惩罚。
Unsportsmanlike conduct is not necessarily illegal, but is frowned upon by the majority of both players and spectators.
不光彩的举动不一定违法，但是为多数运动员和观众所不齿。
这几年，违规搭盖住房又有抬头之势。
Zhè jǐ nián，wéiguī dāgài zhùfáng yòu yǒu táitóu zhī shì。
In these few years, putting up houses against regulations has become a rising trend.
这家商场在违规发放代币券。
Zhèjiā shāngchǎng zài wéiguī fāfàng dàibìquàn。
The store is illegally issuing token money.
交通警察正在突击检查违规车辆。
Jiāotōng jǐngchá zhèngzài tūjī jiǎnchá wéiguī chēliàng。
Traffic policemen are having a surprise inspection of cars that violate traffic regulations.
建设部通知所有违规项目必须停建。
Jiànshèbùtōngzhī suǒyǒu wéiguī xiàng mù bìxū tíngjiàn。
The Ministry of Construction has ordered that all the projects which violate rules should stop construction.
经调查，这次大爆炸是由工人违规操作引起的。
Jīng diàochá，zhècì dàbàozhà shì yóu gōngrén wéiguī cāozuò yǐnqǐ de。
According to the investigation, this big explosion was caused by workers\' operating against regulations.
任凭你是谁，都不该违反规定。
Rènpíng nǐ shì shuí，dōu bù gāi wéifǎn guīdìng.
No matter who you are, you still can\'t break the rules.
航空人员违反规章制度，致使发生重大飞行事故。
Hángkōng rényuán wéifǎn guīzhāngzhìdù，zhìshǐ fāshēng zhòngdà fēixíngshìgù。
Flouting of the rules by airline staff led to a serious plane crash.
违反校规者将给予记过处分。
Wéifǎn xiàoguīzhě jiāngjǐyǔ jìguò chǔfèn。
Whoever violates the school regulations will be given a demerit.
他老是违反监规，非好好治治他不可。
Tā lǎoshì wéifǎn jiānguī，fēi hǎohāo zhìzhi tā bùkě。
He always violates the prison regulations and should be given a good punishment.
违背帮规的人都要受到处罚。
Wéibèi bāngguī de rén dōuyào shòudào chǔfá。
Those who violate the rules of the underworld gang will be punished.
由于违反厂规，他的科长职务被撤免了。
Yóuyú wéifǎn chǎngguī，tā de kēzhǎng zhíwù bèi chèmiǎn le。
He was dismissed as the Chief of his section because he violated the company rules.
他因违反教规被革出教派。
Tā yīn wéifǎn jiàoguī bèi géchū jiàopài。
He was excommunicated because he violated canonical law.
违反交通规则要罚款。
Wéifǎn jiāotōng guīzé yào fákuǎn。
Fines are imposed for breaches of traffic rules.
违反交通规则
wéifǎn jiāotōngguīzé 
violate traffic regulations
没有人能违背自然规律而生存。
Méiyǒu rén néng wéibèi zìrán guīlǜ ér shēngcún。
No one can survive violating natural law.
他因违反公司的规章制度遭到上级的挥斥。
Tā yīn wéifǎn gōngsī de guīzhāngzhìdù zāodào shàngjí de huīchì。
He was chided by the superior because he had violated the company\'s bylaws.
交警要求违反了交通规则的驾驶员出示驾驶证。

Do not go through a red light when crossing street, or you will violate traffic regulations.

If all minor traffic offences were prosecuted it would clog up the system.
Rúguǒ suǒyǒu de qīngwēi jiāotōng wéiguī dōuhuì bèi qǐsù，nà zhěnggè tǐxì dōuhuì tānhuàn。

He was to be set as an example for those who dared to disobey.
Duì nàxiē dǎngǎn wéiguī de rén éryán，tā jiùshì qiánchēzhījiàn。
对那些胆敢违规的人而言，他就是前车之鉴。
His influence in high society allowed him to literally get away with murder.
Tā zài shàngcéng shèhuì de yǐngxiǎng shǐ tā wéiguī ér wèi bèi chéngfá。
他在上层社会的影响使他违规而未被惩罚。
He got out of line.
Tā wéiguī le。
他违规了。
Giving a police officer a free meal may be against the law，but it seems to be a picayune infraction.

Wéiguīzhě de fāngshì hěn nán ràng rén jiēshòu。
违规者的方式很难让人接受。
An unoffending motorist should not have been stopped.
Bù wéiguī de sījī bù yīnggāi bèi lánjié。

We must insist on strict compliance with the regulations.
我们必须坚持不违反规定。

The book dealer would not break the set.

The offence, as now defined in English law, covers a wide spectrum of culpability.

你喝酒了就不能开车，首先这很危险，其次也违反法律。
against the law/rules
违反法律/规则
to offend against
[+law，rule] 违反
We must insist on strict compliance with the regulations.
我们必须坚持不违反规定。
Some types of unsportsmanlike acts may draw a technical foul.
有些违反体育道德的动作可以构成一次技术犯规。
The president is criticizing a federal court ruling that calls his warrantless wiretapping program unconstitutional.
一联邦法院称总统的窃听装置方案是不正当的，总统称该判决是违反宪法。
Whoever fails to observe the law will be punished.
任何人违反法律都会受到惩罚。
Corruption and of abuse of the government against the people is extremely common in some poorer countries.
Zhèngfǔ wéifǎn rénmín dàzhòng de lìyì，fǔbài qiě lànyòng quánlì，zhè zài yìxiē jiào pínqióng de guójiā shì jíwéi pǔbiàn de xiànxiàng。
政府违反人民大众的利益，腐败且滥用权力，这在一些较贫穷的国家是极为普遍的现象。
Clearly the contractor was in breach of the contract, when he didn\'t come to work.
Hěn xiǎnrán，zhè wèi chéngbāorén méiyǒu kāigōng，yīncǐ tā wéifǎnle hétóng。
很显然，这位承包人没有开工，因此他违反了合同。
Spectators who breach the rules will be asked to leave the building.
Wéifǎnguīdìng de guānzhòng jiānghuì bèi qǐng chū zhè zuò jiànzhùwù。
违反规定的观众将会被请出这座建筑物。
This concentration of forces is a violation of international agreements.
Xiàng zhèyàng jízhōng bīnglì shì wéifǎn guójì gōngyuē de。
像这样集中兵力是违反国际公约的。
They are obliged to make decisions that go against the grain.
Tāmen bùdébù zuòchū wéifǎn yìyuàn de juédìng。
他们不得不做出违反意愿的决定。
The idea that they vanish completely from existence seems to offend against logic, yet they cannot escape from the black hole.
Guānyú tāmen wánquán xiāoshī de xiǎngfǎ kànqǐlái wéifǎnle luójì，mùqián tāmen hái bùnéng nàgè táolí hēidòng。
关于它们完全消失的想法看起来违反了逻辑，目前他们还不能那个逃离黑洞。
It went against the grain to let him win.
Ràng tā yíng wéifǎnle tā de yìyuàn。
让他赢违反了他的意愿。
It led nowhere, but cut across many normal routes of communication within the city.
Tā búhuì yǒu shénme jiéguǒ ，dànshì wéifǎn le chéngshìnèi xǔduō jiāoliú de zhèngcháng tújìng。
它不会有什么结果，但是违反了城市内许多交流的正常途径。

Fǎtíng duì wéifǎn mìnglìng de rènhé rén búxièyígù。
法庭对违反命令的任何人不屑一顾。
The book dealer would not break the set.
Zhège túshū jīngxiāoshāng búhuì wéifǎn guīdìng。
这个图书经销商不会违反规定。
This sentence violates the rules of syntax.
Zhège jùzi wéifǎnle jùfǎ guīzé。
这个句子违反了句法规则。
Vice offends the moral standards of the community.
Bú dàodé xíngwéi wéifǎnle shèhuì de dàodé biāozhǔn。
不道德行为违反了社会的道德标准。

Hōngzhà Sài\'ěrwéiyà de yìjiàn wéifǎnle dǎng de lùxiàn。
轰炸塞尔维亚的意见违反了党的路线。

transgression of the law and neglect of duty

违法
wéifǎ
break the law; be illegal

Those who violate the rules of the underworld gang will be punished.
做出这种违背道义的事，他真是权欲熏心了！

He was really overcome by a lust for power, to do such a thing against morality and justice.
玄学和唯物论是相违背的。
Xuánxué hé wéiwùlùn shì xiāng wéibèi de。
Metaphysics goes against materialism.
没有人能违背自然规律而生存。

No one can survive violating natural law.
他们从不背着纠察队干违纪的事。

无缘无故责备别人或者让别人有罪恶感，是完全违背我的原则的。
I\'ve never broken my promise to you, I\'m just waiting for you to come back.

Statecontrol is a very un-American notion.

He is a volatile man and always breaches his promise.
他是一个反复无常的人，总是违背自己的诺言。

离那个反复无常的人远点，他经常违背自己的诺言。

Wǒ yǒngyuǎn yě bú huì wéibèi fù mìng。
我永远也不会违背父命。
Only the ice-blue eyes betrayed the man\'s ruthless will.
Zhǐyǒu bīng lánsè yǎnjing de rén wéibèile nàgè rén de wúqíng yìyuàn。
只有冰蓝色眼睛的人违背了那个人的无情意愿。
Westminster City Council lays down strict rules for elected persons.
Wēisīmǐnsītè chéngshì wěiyuánhuì zhìdìngle bùkě wéibèi de xuǎnjǔ rén guīdìng。
威斯敏斯特城市委员会制订了不可违背的选举人规定。
I turned my back and broke my promises.
Wǒ zhìzhībùlǐ，wéibèile nuòyán。

Shame they allowed themselves to be bullied into voting  against their wishes.
Tāmen bèi bī zuòchūle wéibèi yìyuàn de tóupiào，zhēnshì xiūchǐ。
他们被逼做出了违背意愿的投票，真是羞耻。
The player was centered out for his unsportsmanlike behavior.

It goes against the very nature of man today.

He will not violate his principles.
Tā búhuì wéibèi zìjǐ de yuánzé。
他不会违背自己的原则。
He had sinned against her unwillingly.

Tā hěn bù qíngyuàn de wéibèile zìjǐ de yìyuàn。
他很不情愿地违背了自己的意愿。
对于顶风违法违纪的人，我们决不姑息！
Duìyú dǐngfēng wéifǎ wéijì de rén，wǒmen juébùgūxī！
We will never tolerate those who break the law and breach principles at the most critical moment.
粗暴地违反国际惯例
cūbào de wéifǎn guójì guànlì

This way of doing things runs counter to our original ideas.
王兄，久违了！
Wángxiōng，jiǔwéi le！
Hi, Wang! Haven\'t seen you for ages!

Those who violate the rules of the underworld gang will be punished.

The court confiscated the possessions of the convict, and sentenced him to three years in jail.
播散谣言是不道德的，甚至是违法的。

It is immoral, and even illegal to spread rumors.

The police have the right to confiscate any forbidden objects they find.
由于违章停车，车主被罚款200元。

The owner of the car was fined 200 Yuan for parking illegally.
由于违反厂规，他的科长职务被撤免了。

He was dismissed as the Chief of his section because he violated the company rules.

It is illegal to secretly remove capital.
对于你的违法行为，只有坦白交待才能争取从宽处理。
Duìyú nǐ de wéifǎ xíngwéi，zhǐyǒu tǎnbái jiāodài cáinéng zhēngqǔ cóngkuān chǔlǐ。
As for your illegal behavior, only by telling the truth will you receive a light sentence.
你要从新做人，不能再做违法的事情了。
Nǐ yào cóngxīn zuòrén，bùnéng zài zuò wéifǎ de shìqing le。
You should start all over and never break the law again.
这几年，违规搭盖住房又有抬头之势。

In these few years, putting up houses against regulations has become a rising trend.
这家商场在违规发放代币券。
Zhèjiā shāngchǎng zài wéiguī fāfàng dàibìquàn。
The store is illegally issuing token money.
过马路闯红灯也是违法行为，大家不要以为罚不责众！

Don\'t think that crossing the road when there\'s a red light is OK, just because so many people do it. It\'s breaking the law.
小张违章停车，交警给他开了个罚单。
Xiǎo Zhāng wéizhāng tíngchē，jiāojǐng gěi tā kāi le gè fádān。
Xiao Zhang parked his car illegally. As a result he was issued a notice for payment of fine by the police.
他尽干违法的坏事，早晚有一天会翻船！
Tā jìn gàn wéifǎ de huài shì，zǎowǎn yǒu yìtiān huì fānchuán！
He will be caught one day for all his bad deeds.

Every day, the city inspectors drive a trailer to clear away peddlers who are in the driveway against the regulations.
对于违法犯罪行为，我们应该毫不留情的揭发举报。

The business administration bureau has chastised pornography vendors to prevent them from violating the law again.
他因违反公司的规章制度遭到上级的挥斥。

交警要求违反了交通规则的驾驶员出示驾驶证。

The police demanded the driver who had violated traffic regulations show them his license.
交通警察正在突击检查违规车辆。
Jiāotōng jǐngchá zhèngzài tūjī jiǎnchá wéiguī chēliàng。
Traffic policemen are having a surprise inspection of cars that violate traffic regulations.
久违的春雨浸润着大地。
Jiǔwéi de chūnyǔ jìnrùn zhe dàdì。
The spring rain, which we have waited for so long, moistens the land.
他们从不背着纠察队干违纪的事。
Tāmen cóngbú bèi zhe jiūcháduì gàn wéijì de shì。
They never violate the rules behind the pickets\'back.
我们这次暌违，不知道什么时候才能再见！

滥捕滥杀野生鸟类是违法行为！
Lànbǔ lànshā yěshēng niǎolèi shì wéifǎ xíngwéi！
Excessive capturing and slaughtering of wild birds constitutes unlawful behavior.
我们都是安顺良民，不会做违法之事。

We are all obedient and good people. We won\'t do illegal things.

Jǐngchē yìlái，wéifǎzhě jiù luànzuò yìtuán le。
Law-breakers were in great disorder when the police car came.
他想谈一场罗曼司的恋爱，可是事与愿违。
Tā xiǎng tán yìchǎng luómànsī de liàn\'ài，kěshì shìyǔ yuànwéi。

我们最近工作重点是严厉打击买私贩私的违法活动。
Wǒmen zuìjìn gōngzuò zhòngdiǎn shì yánlì dǎjī mǎisī fànsī de wéifǎ huódòng。
In recent days, we have aimed at cracking down on smuggling.
酒后驾车害人害己，对于这种违法行为我们应当鸣鼓而攻之！
Jiǔhòu jiàchē hàirén hàijǐ，duìyú zhèzhǒng wéifǎ xíngwéi wǒmen yīngdāng mínggǔ ér gōngzhī！
The Drunk-driver bites others while getting bitten himsel.  We should make a scathing indictment of the unlawful action.
过马路时千万不能闯红灯啊，那样一来就违犯交通法规了！
Guò mǎlù shí qiānwàn bùnéng chuǎng hóngdēng a，nàyàng yìlái jiù wéifàn jiāotōng fǎguī le！
Do not go through a red light when crossing street, or you will violate traffic regulations.
社区里发布了限期迫迁违章建筑的通知。
Shèqū lǐ fābù le xiànqī pòqiān wéizhāng jiànzhù de tōngzhī。
The community sent out a notice of compulsory evacuation of the substandard building before the deadline.
做出这种违背道义的事，他真是权欲熏心了！
Zuòchū zhèzhǒng wéibèi dàoyì de shì，tā zhēnshì quányù xūnxīn le！
He was really overcome by a lust for power, to do such a thing against morality and justice.
你们这样私自设卡收费是违法的。
Nǐmen zhèyàng sīzì shèkǎ shōufèi shì wéifǎ de。
It is illegal for you to set up private toll-gates.
对于这种违纪现象，主管部门一定要严加申饬。
Duìyú zhèzhǒng wéijì xiàn xiàng，zhǔguǎn bùmén yídìng yào yánjiā shēnchì。
The relevant department must seriously warn people who break rules like this.
试场中要严肃考试纪律，对于违纪的考生要严惩不待。
Shìchǎng zhōng yào yánsù kǎoshì jìlǜ，duìyú wéijì de kǎoshēng yào yánchéngbúdài。
Rules must be strictly enforced in an examination room, and examinees who have broken the rules should be severely punished.
私分遗产是件很不道德的事，同时也是违法的。
Sīfēn yíchǎn shì jiàn hěnbú dàodé de shì，tóngshí yěshì wéifǎ de。
Privately dividing inheritance is immoral, and illegal at the same time.
贩卖私盐是违法的。
Fànmài sīyán shì wéifǎ de。
It is illegal to sell salt without paying the tax.
建设部通知所有违规项目必须停建。
Jiànshèbùtōngzhī suǒyǒu wéiguī xiàng mù bìxū tíngjiàn。
The Ministry of Construction has ordered that all the projects which violate rules should stop construction.
偷运违禁物品的行为，要受到法律的制裁。
Tōuyùn wéijìn wùpǐn de xíngwéi，yào shòudào fǎlǜ de zhìcái。
People who smuggle contraband goods will be punished by the law.
卫生局查抄了一批违法的土作坊。
Wèishēngjú cháchāo le yì pī wéifǎ de tǔzuōfāng。
The Hygiene Bureau has confiscated the contents of some illegal crude workshops.
违法乱纪的人必然会受到法律的严惩。
Wéifǎ luànjì de rén bìrán huì shòudào fǎlǜ de yánchéng。
People who violate the law and public discipline will definitely be punished by the law.
经调查，这次大爆炸是由工人违规操作引起的。
Jīng diàochá，zhècì dàbàozhà shì yóu gōngrén wéiguī cāozuò yǐnqǐ de。
According to the investigation, this big explosion was caused by workers\' operating against regulations.
听说最近你身体违和，要多多保重啊！
Tīngshuō zuìjìn nǐ shēntǐ wéihé，yào duōduō bǎozhòng a！
I heard that you have not been well recently. Take care of yourself!
警察从他的旅行包里搜出了违禁品。
Jǐngchá cóng tā de lǚxíngbāo lǐ sōuchū le wéijìnpǐn。
The police have discovered out some contraband goods in his traveling bag.
在我们家，所有违忤长辈的人都将受到严厉处罚。
Zài wǒmen jiā，suǒyǒu wéiwǔ zhǎngbèi de rén dōu jiāng shòudào yánlì chǔfá。
In our family, anyone who disobeys their superior will be severely punished.
你不要再怪他了，他的话都是违心之论。
Nǐ búyào zài guài tā le，tā de huà dōushì wéixīn zhī lùn。
Stop blaming him. What he said was not what he really thinks.
他们在合同中约定违约金为30万人民币。
Tāmen zài hétong zhōng yuēdìng wéiyuējīn wéi sānshíwàn rénmínbì。

The students will be severely punished if they break school regulations.

现在对犯人压杠子是违反的，你别乱来。

It\'s a violation of the law if you press the criminals\' legs with thick sticks. Don\'t do it!
严查违禁药品，不能让坏人逍遥法外。

Illegal medicine should be investigated strictly and those who break the law should be punished.
家父的严命谁敢违抗，你总是为难我。

Though having a decent job, you gave it up to be a thief.

The courtiers reported to the emperor on the flood of the Yellow river.
钦差大臣一般都带着敕书巡查地方。
Qīnchāi dàchén yìbān dōu dài zhe chìshū xúnchá dìfāng。
An Imperial envoy often went on a tour of inspection carrying an imperial edict.
皇帝登基以后，总要封赏他手下的大臣。
Huángdì dēngjī yǐhòu，zǒngyào fēngshǎng tā shǒuxià de dàchén。
When the emperors ascended to the throne, they would award all their officials.
这部史书记载了汉朝一些公卿大臣的生平。
Zhèbù shǐshū jìzǎi le Hàncháo yìxiē gōngqīng dàchén de shēngpíng。
This historical book records the lives of some officials in the Han Dynasty.
皇上正在宫廷会见大臣。
Huángshàng zhèngzài gōngtíng huìjiàn dàchén。
The Emperor is meeting his ministers at the imperial court.
皇家的宫苑是不许百姓进入的，只能皇帝带领大臣打猎游玩。
Huángjiā de gōngyuàn shì bùxǔ bǎixìng jìnrù de，zhǐnéng huángdì dàilǐng dàchén dǎliè yóuwán。
The common people are not allowed to enter the palatial gardens. Only the emperor has the right to bring his ministers to the palatial gardens for hunting and sight-seeing.
这几位大臣因护驾有功而得到晋升。
Zhè jǐ wèi dàchén yīn hùjià yǒugōng ér dédào jìnshēng。
These ministers got promoted because of their merits in guarding the Emperor.
皇帝鼓励大臣谏诤，以戒除自己的缺点。
Huángdì gǔlì dàchén jiànzhèng，yǐ jièchú zìjǐ de quēdiǎn。
The emperor encouraged his ministers to point out his faults frankly so that he could correct them.
皇帝站在阶墀上注视着下面跪倒的大臣。
Huángdì zhànzài jiēchí shàng zhùshì zhe xiàmiàn guìdǎo de dàchén。
The emperor stood at the painted step, looking down at the those ministers on their knees.
大臣向皇帝进呈运河形势图。
Dàchén xiàng huángdì jìnchéng yùnhé xíngshìtú。
The minister presented the canal situation chart to the emperor.
皇帝突然密召大臣们进宫议事。
Huángdì tūrán mìzhào dàchénmen jìngōng yìshì。
All at once, the emperor secretly summoned cabinet ministers to the court to discuss official business.
这里是大臣们每天上朝的必经之路。
Zhèlǐ shì dàchénmen měitiān shàngcháo de bìjīngzhīlù。
Officials must pass this way to go to court every day.
从电视剧中我们经常能见到持手板朝见皇帝的大臣。
Cóng diànshìjù zhōng wǒmen jīngcháng néng jiàndào chí shǒubǎn cháojiàn huángdì de dàchén。
We can often see ministers holding a tablet when having an audience with an emperor in TV serials.
老皇帝去世后，大臣们一致拥立二皇子当皇帝。
Lǎohuángdì qùshì hòu，dàchénmen yízhì yōnglì èrhuángzǐ dāng huángdì。
After the death of the old emperor, officials unanimously supported the second son to be the new emperor.
古代大臣上朝时手里都会拿着一个玉圭。
Gǔdài dàchén shàngcháo shí shǒu lǐ dōuhuì ná zhe yígè yùguī。
In ancient times, all officials would hold a jade tablet in their hands when going to court.
没有得到朱批之前，大臣们都不敢轻举妄动。
Méiyǒu dédào zhūpī zhīqián，dàchénmen dōu bùgǎn qīngjǔwàngdòng。
Before receiving remarks written in red, no official dares move without careful thought.
这些大臣对国君都是忠心耿耿的。
Zhèxiē dàchén duì guójūn dōushì zhōngxīngěnggěng de。
These officials are very faithful to the emperor.
在大宴群臣的时候，皇帝将贡酒赐予有功之臣以示恩典。
Zài dàyàn qúnchén de shíhou，huángdì jiāng gòngjiǔ cìyǔ yǒugōng zhī chén yǐshì ēndiǎn。
When holding a feast for all the ministers, the emperor granted tribute alcohol to the ministers with great accomplishments as a sign of favor.
大凡古代的名臣贤士都有后世皇帝为其立碑以记其功德。
Dàfán gǔdài de míngchén xiánshì dōu yǒu hòushì huángdì wèi qí lìbēi yǐ jì qí gōngdé。
The virtures and merits of most famous ministers, and virtuous scholars of ancient times were recorded by erecting monuments by later emperors.
看到奏章后，皇帝大吃一惊，他不相信自己的爱臣会造反。
Kàndào zòuzhāng hòu，huángdì dàchī yìjīng，tā bùxiāngxìn zìjǐ de àichén huì zào fǎn。
Having read the memorial, the emperor was greatly shocked. He couldn\'t believe that his favorite official would rise in rebellion against him.
总理大臣
北洋大臣。
王公大臣
外交大臣
《钦差大臣》是很有名的喜剧。
六国见秦之强大，莫不臣服
a minister without portfolio
不管部大臣(或部长)
Politically, the chancellor\'s strongest card is that he has delivered a decade of economic growth and stability.
从政治角度来看，这个大臣的王牌就是十年来他使得经济稳定地增长。
the Transport/Health Secretary
[BRIT] 交通/卫生大臣
He is appointed a minister extraordinary.
他被任命为特命大臣。
The king frustrated his brother\'s scheme with the help of his loyal ministers.
国王在忠诚大臣的辅佐下，挫败了他哥哥的阴谋。
Four ministers restored the emperor to the throne with the help of an army.
在将士们的帮助下，四位大臣成功使国王复位。
The Treasury will be appointed by the the Parliament.
Yīngguó cáizhèngbù dàchén yóu yìhuì rènmìng。
英国财政部大臣由议会任命。
The Chancellor of the Exchequer announced the government\'s new tax policies.
Yīngguó cáizhèng dàchén xuāndúle zhèngfǔ xīn de shuìshōu zhèngcè。
英国财政大臣宣读了政府新的税收政策。
Papers should be circulated to ministers seven days before a meeting.
Wénjiàn yīnggāi zài huìyì qī tiān qián gěi dàchénmen chuányuè。
文件应该在会议七天前给大臣们传阅。
Robinson splashes money around New Labour \'s stars and suddenly becomes paymaster general.
Luóbīnxùn wèi Xīngōngdǎng de míngxīng men dàsìhuīhuò，yíxiàzi chéngwéi zhǔjìdàchén。
罗宾逊为新工党的明星们大肆挥霍，一下子成为主计大臣。
Who\'s running for treasurer this year?
Shuí jīnnián jìngxuǎn cáiwù dàchén。
谁今年竞选财务大臣。
The minister served the King for many years.
Zhè wèi dàchén fúshì zhè wèi guówáng hǎo xiēn ián le。
这位大臣服侍这位国王好些年了。
The Secretary of the Navy will leave office next month.
Hǎijūn dàchén jiāng yú xià yuè lízhí。
海军大臣将于下月离职。
The best doctors would stay resentfully out of the national service, refusing to become the minions of a minister.
Zuì hǎo de yīshēng jiāng huì fènrán jùjué fú bīngyì，yě búhuì qù zuò bùzhǎng dàchén men de núcai。
最好的医生将会愤然拒绝服兵役，也不会去做部长大臣们的奴才。
The king abnegated his power to the ministers.
Guówáng bǎ quánlì jiāogěile dàchénmen。
国王把权力交给了大臣们。
他企图弑君叛国，这种乱臣贼子还是及早除掉为好。
Tā qǐtú shìjūn pànguó，zhèzhǒng luànchén zéizǐ háishi jízǎo chúdiào wéi hǎo。
As a traitor and usurper who sought to murder the sovereign and betray his country, he should be killed as soon as possible.
老皇帝去世后，大臣们一致拥立二皇子当皇帝。
Lǎohuángdì qùshì hòu，dàchénmen yízhì yōnglì èrhuángzǐ dāng huángdì。
After the death of the old emperor, officials unanimously supported the second son to be the new emperor.
君臣父子
贰臣贼子
Robinson splashes money around New Labour \'s stars and suddenly becomes paymaster general.
Luóbīnxùn wèi Xīngōngdǎng de míngxīng men dàsìhuīhuò，yíxiàzi chéngwéi zhǔjìdàchén。
罗宾逊为新工党的明星们大肆挥霍，一下子成为主计大臣。
他宦游一生，是皇上最信赖的臣下。
Tā huànyóu yìshēng，shì huángshàng zuì xìnlài de chénxià。
He has been an official all his life ,and is the one the Emperor trusted most.
古代的臣下都愿意为皇帝孝犬马之劳。
Gǔdài de chénxià dōu yuànyì wèi huángdì xiào quǎnmǎ zhī láo。
Courtiers in ancient times were willing to be at the emperor\'s beck and call.
皇帝登基以后，总要封赏他手下的大臣。
Huángdì dēngjī yǐhòu，zǒngyào fēngshǎng tā shǒuxià de dàchén。
When the emperors ascended to the throne, they would award all their officials.
幼皇在老臣们的辅弼下坐上了龙位。
Yòuhuáng zài lǎochénmen de fǔbìxià zuòshàng le lóngwèi。
The young emperor took the throne with the help of old courtiers.
皇帝站在阶墀上注视着下面跪倒的大臣。
Huángdì zhànzài jiēchí shàng zhùshì zhe xiàmiàn guìdǎo de dàchén。
The emperor stood at the painted step, looking down at the those ministers on their knees.
外嬖(受宠爱的臣下)

臣下；臣民

罗宾逊为新工党的明星们大肆挥霍，一下子成为主计大臣。
皇帝宠信幸臣实非万民之福。
Huángdì chǒngxìn xìngchén shífēi wànmín zhī fú。
It is not a blessing for people if the Emperor dotes on his favorite courtiers.
人民功臣
liege subjects
臣下；臣民
A monarch has a duty to his subjects.
君主对他的臣民负有责任。
British subjects and Commonwealth citizens need not give their address.
Yīngguó chénmín hé Gònghéguó jūmín bú yòng gěichū dìzhǐ。
英国臣民和共和国居民不用给出地址。
What more could he inflict on his subjects?
Tā hái néng bǎ shénme gèng duō de dōngxi qiángjiā dào tā de chénmín Shēnshàng？
他还能把什么更多的东西强加到他的臣民身上？
The masses will lick our feet and serve us as our slaves.
Chénmínmen huì fǔshǒutiē\'ěr，xiàng núlì yìbān shìfèng wǒmen。
臣民们会俯首贴耳，像奴隶一般侍奉我们。
Kings allowed the innocent to live and let live.
Guówáng yǔnxǔ wúgū chénmín kuānyǐdàirén。
国王允许无辜臣民宽以待人。
臣服于先王
六国见秦之强大，莫不臣服
高超的技艺，优良的作风，使对方欣然臣服
I had to yield to the call from God.
Wǒ bùdébù chénfú yú shàngdì de zhàohuàn。
我不得不臣服于上帝的召唤。
The minister served the King for many years.
Zhè wèi dàchén fúshì zhè wèi guówáng hǎo xiēn ián le。

在大宴群臣的时候，皇帝将贡酒赐予有功之臣以示恩典。
Zài dàyàn qúnchén de shíhou，huángdì jiāng gòngjiǔ cìyǔ yǒugōng zhī chén yǐshì ēndiǎn。
When holding a feast for all the ministers, the emperor granted tribute alcohol to the ministers with great accomplishments as a sign of favor.
手版又叫笏板，是大臣们的记事板，同时也因材质的不同而体现着大臣们不同的等级。
Shǒubǎn yòu jiào hùbǎn，shì dàchénmen de jìshìbǎn，tóngshí yě yīn cáizhì de bùtóng ér tǐxiàn zhe dàchénmen bùtóng de děngjí。
Also called hu ban, the shou ban was a note-tablet of ministers, and showed different ranks of ministers when made of different materials.
君臣
jūnchén 
the monarch and his subjects
治淮功臣
zhìhuái gōngchén
meritorious workers in harnessing the Huaihe River
开国功臣
kāiguó gōngchén
founders of a state
不要以功臣自居。
Búyào yǐ gōngchén zìjū。
Don\'t give yourself the airs of a hero.
逆臣
nì chén
a traitorous vassal
钦差大臣林则徐
qīnchāi dàchén Lín Zéxú
(Imperial) Commissioner Lin Zexu
“钦差大臣”满天飞
qīnchāi dàchén mǎn tiān fēi
&quot;imperial envoys&quot; rushing here, there, and everywhere
王公大臣
wánɡɡōnɡ dàchén 
princes, dukes and ministers
奸臣用事
jiānchén yònɡshì 
treacherous officials in power
以功臣自居
yǐ ɡōnɡchén zìjū 
pose as one who has rendered great service; give oneself the airs of a hero
贰臣
èrchén
an official who retains his position after capitulating to the new dynasty; turncoat official
皇帝不顾众朝臣的反对，贸然出兵了。
Huángdì búgù zhòng cháochén de fǎnduì，màorán chūbīng le。
The emperor hastily dispatched troops against objections from his courtiers.
每逢皇帝生日或者其他庆典，诸侯群臣皆要朝贺。
Měi féng huángdì shēngrì huòzhě qítā qìngdiǎn，zhūhóu qúnchén jiē yào cháohè。
All other countries must come and pay their respect for all emperial birthdays, and celebrations.
众臣僚坚决反对再次增加百姓的赋税。
Zhòngchénliáo jiānjué fǎnduì zàicì zēngjiā bǎixìng de fùshuì。
All court officials firmly opposed an additional increase in taxes.
大臣向皇帝陈奏黄河水患。
Dàchén xiàng huángdì chénzòu Huáng Hé shuǐhuàn。
The courtiers reported to the emperor on the flood of the Yellow river.
钦差大臣一般都带着敕书巡查地方。
Qīnchāi dàchén yìbān dōu dài zhe chìshū xúnchá dìfāng。
An Imperial envoy often went on a tour of inspection carrying an imperial edict.
皇帝的宠臣多是阿谀奉承之辈。
Huángdì de chǒngchén duō shì ēyú fèngchéng zhī bèi。
The minions of the emperor were generally skilled in flattery.
皇帝登基以后，总要封赏他手下的大臣。
Huángdì dēngjī yǐhòu，zǒngyào fēngshǎng tā shǒuxià de dàchén。
When the emperors ascended to the throne, they would award all their officials.
奸臣当道犹如浮云蔽日。
Jiānchén dāngdào yóurú fúyún bìrì。
A treacherous court official that cheats a monarch is like a floating cloud obscuring the sun.
幼皇在老臣们的辅弼下坐上了龙位。
Yòuhuáng zài lǎochénmen de fǔbìxià zuòshàng le lóngwèi。
The young emperor took the throne with the help of old courtiers.
这部史书记载了汉朝一些公卿大臣的生平。
Zhèbù shǐshū jìzǎi le Hàncháo yìxiē gōngqīng dàchén de shēngpíng。
This historical book records the lives of some officials in the Han Dynasty.
皇上正在宫廷会见大臣。
Huángshàng zhèngzài gōngtíng huìjiàn dàchén。
The Emperor is meeting his ministers at the imperial court.
皇家的宫苑是不许百姓进入的，只能皇帝带领大臣打猎游玩。
Huángjiā de gōngyuàn shì bùxǔ bǎixìng jìnrù de，zhǐnéng huángdì dàilǐng dàchén dǎliè yóuwán。
The common people are not allowed to enter the palatial gardens. Only the emperor has the right to bring his ministers to the palatial gardens for hunting and sight-seeing.
这个权臣把持朝政多年，众人都要求他归政于君主。
Zhège quánchén bǎchí cháozhèng duōnián，zhòngrén dōu yāoqiú tā guīzhèng yú jūnzhǔ。
After being in power for many year, this official was asked to return the power of the imperial government to the emperor.
古代，忠臣往往因为直言规谏君王而遭受处罚。
Gǔdài，zhōng chén wǎngwǎng yīnwèi zhíyán guījiàn jūnwáng ér zāoshòu chǔfá。
In ancient times, loyal officials were always punished after directly speaking out against the emperor.
这几位大臣因护驾有功而得到晋升。
Zhè jǐ wèi dàchén yīn hùjià yǒugōng ér dédào jìnshēng。
These ministers got promoted because of their merits in guarding the Emperor.
他宦游一生，是皇上最信赖的臣下。
Tā huànyóu yìshēng，shì huángshàng zuì xìnlài de chénxià。
He has been an official all his life ,and is the one the Emperor trusted most.
皇帝鼓励大臣谏诤，以戒除自己的缺点。
Huángdì gǔlì dàchén jiànzhèng，yǐ jièchú zìjǐ de quēdiǎn。
The emperor encouraged his ministers to point out his faults frankly so that he could correct them.
皇帝站在阶墀上注视着下面跪倒的大臣。
Huángdì zhànzài jiēchí shàng zhùshì zhe xiàmiàn guìdǎo de dàchén。
The emperor stood at the painted step, looking down at the those ministers on their knees.
大臣向皇帝进呈运河形势图。
Dàchén xiàng huángdì jìnchéng yùnhé xíngshìtú。
The minister presented the canal situation chart to the emperor.
大凡古代的名臣贤士都有后世皇帝为其立碑以记其功德。
Dàfán gǔdài de míngchén xiánshì dōu yǒu hòushì huángdì wèi qí lìbēi yǐ jì qí gōngdé。
The virtures and merits of most famous ministers, and virtuous scholars of ancient times were recorded by erecting monuments by later emperors.
他企图弑君叛国，这种乱臣贼子还是及早除掉为好。
Tā qǐtú shìjūn pànguó，zhèzhǒng luànchén zéizǐ háishi jízǎo chúdiào wéi hǎo。
As a traitor and usurper who sought to murder the sovereign and betray his country, he should be killed as soon as possible.
皇帝突然密召大臣们进宫议事。
Huángdì tūrán mìzhào dàchénmen jìngōng yìshì。
All at once, the emperor secretly summoned cabinet ministers to the court to discuss official business.
内廷重地，只有少数几位重臣在皇帝召见时才能进入。
Nèitíng zhòngdì，zhǐyǒu shǎoshù jǐ wèi zhòngchén zài huángdì zhàojiàn shí cáinéng jìnrù。
Important due to being the imperial residence, only a few important officials can be admitted when summoned.
秦桧是宋代著名的佞臣，受尽后人的唾骂。
Qín Huì shì Sòngdài zhùmíng de nìngchén，shòujìn hòurén de tuòmà。
Qinhui was a notorious sycophantic official in the Song dynasty, and was spurned by later generations.
他是位曾经领兵平叛的国家功臣。
Tā shì wèi céngjīng lǐngbīng píngpàn de guójiā gōngchén。
He is a national official of merit who once led the army and put down a rebellion.
他是一位屡建功勋的屏藩忠臣。
Tā shì yíwèi lǚjiàn gōngxūn de píngfān zhōng chén。
He is a loyal official who has made some great contributions.
权臣的提议有时会影响皇帝的决定。
Quánchén de tíyì yǒushí huì yǐngxiǎng huángdì de juédìng。
Suggestions of domineering ministers sometimes affect the emperor\'s decisions.
古代的臣下都愿意为皇帝孝犬马之劳。
Gǔdài de chénxià dōu yuànyì wèi huángdì xiào quǎnmǎ zhī láo。
Courtiers in ancient times were willing to be at the emperor\'s beck and call.
这里是大臣们每天上朝的必经之路。
Zhèlǐ shì dàchénmen měitiān shàngcháo de bìjīngzhīlù。
Officials must pass this way to go to court every day.
蔺相如是赵国出使秦国的使臣。
Lìn Xiàngrú shì Zhàoguó chūshǐ Qínguó de shǐchén。
Lin Xiangru was the envoy the Zhao state detached to the Qin State.
从电视剧中我们经常能见到持手板朝见皇帝的大臣。
Cóng diànshìjù zhōng wǒmen jīngcháng néng jiàndào chí shǒubǎn cháojiàn huángdì de dàchén。
We can often see ministers holding a tablet when having an audience with an emperor in TV serials.
佞臣当道，致使国势颓败。
Nìngchén dāngdào，zhìshǐ guóshì tuíbài。
Because crafty and fawning officials are in charge of the imperial government, the country is becoming more and more decadent.
皇帝宠信幸臣实非万民之福。
Huángdì chǒngxìn xìngchén shífēi wànmín zhī fú。
It is not a blessing for people if the Emperor dotes on his favorite courtiers.
老皇帝去世后，大臣们一致拥立二皇子当皇帝。
Lǎohuángdì qùshì hòu，dàchénmen yízhì yōnglì èrhuángzǐ dāng huángdì。
After the death of the old emperor, officials unanimously supported the second son to be the new emperor.
古代大臣上朝时手里都会拿着一个玉圭。
Gǔdài dàchén shàngcháo shí shǒu lǐ dōuhuì ná zhe yígè yùguī。
In ancient times, all officials would hold a jade tablet in their hands when going to court.
没有得到朱批之前，大臣们都不敢轻举妄动。
Méiyǒu dédào zhūpī zhīqián，dàchénmen dōu bùgǎn qīngjǔwàngdòng。
Before receiving remarks written in red, no official dares move without careful thought.
看到奏章后，皇帝大吃一惊，他不相信自己的爱臣会造反。
Kàndào zòuzhāng hòu，huángdì dàchī yìjīng，tā bùxiāngxìn zìjǐ de àichén huì zào fǎn。

这些大臣对国君都是忠心耿耿的。

她从小就敏悟好学，是个好孩子。
Tā cóng xiǎo jiù mǐnwù hàoxué，shì gè hǎoháizi。
She has been agile and studious since she was very young, and she is always a good girl.
小男孩拿个木棒乱舞一通，原来是要学孙悟空呢。
Xiǎonánhái ná gè mùbàng luànwǔ yítòng，yuánlái shì yào xué Sūnwùkōng ne。
The boy wields the wooden stick at random, and it turns out that he wants to act like Sun Wukong.
孙悟空四处求师学艺，终于学成了通天的本领。
Sūnwùkōng sìchù qiúshī xuéyì，zhōng yú xuéchéng le tōngtiān de běnlǐng。
The monkey king sought masters everywhere, and finally mastered extraordinary ability.
你现在收手还为时不晚，如果执迷不悟就会酿成大祸。
Nǐ xiànzài shōushǒu hái wéishí bùwǎn，rúguǒ zhímí búwù jiùhuì niàngchéng dàhuò。
It\'s still not too late if you stop now, there will be serious consequences if you keep to your errors.
孙悟空初到水晶宫，就抢走了老龙王的定海神针。
Sūnwùkōng chū dào shuǐjīnggōng，jiù qiǎngzǒu le lǎolóngwáng de dìnghǎishénzhēn。
The first time the Monkey King went to the Dragon Palace, he grabbed the old Dragon King\'s Divine Needle which guarded the sea.
他每天诵经，从中领悟到了大智慧。
Tā měitiān sòngjīng，cóng zhōng lǐngwù dào le dàzhìhuì。
He reads religious scriptures every day, from which he understood a great deal of deep wisdom.
历经磨难之后，他终于悟出了人生的真谛。
Lìjīng mónàn zhīhòu，tā zhōng yú wùchū le rénshēng de zhēndì。
After a series of trials, he finally understood the truth of life.
因为孙悟空搅了蟠桃盛会，西王母大发雷霆。
Yīnwéi Sūnwùkōng jiǎo le pántáoshènghuì，Xīwángmǔ dàfā léitíng。
The Queen Mother of the West was furious at Sun Wukong because he ruined her peach party.
经过长时间的思考，他终于省悟了。

He finally came to an understanding after serious meditation.

He has picked up the piano very quickly.

Internal auditors typically do not have the training to conduct a fraud investigation on their own.

他欺骗了自己的女朋友。
He had a deceptively casual acting style that hid the effort he put into each role.
Tā yǒu yì zhǒng qīpiànxìng de zìrán suíyì de biǎoyǎn fāngshì，zhè yǎngàile tā zài měi gè juésè shàng fùchū de xīnxuè。
他有一种欺骗性的自然随意的表演方式，这掩盖了他在每个角色上付出的心血。
She played a really nasty trick on her ex-boyfriend and told him that she is pregnant!
她以各种无耻的手段欺骗前男友，告诉他自己怀孕了。
Tom tricked young girls, claiming that he would make them super models.
汤姆欺骗年轻女孩，声称自己可以让她们成为超级名模。

银行的安全程序不能制止所有的欺诈行为，可能就会出现私自印制或改动支票的行为。
他一贯欺压邻里，积怨甚多。
Tā yíguàn qīyā línlǐ，jīyuàn shèn duō。
He always rode roughshod over his neighbours and incurred widespread resentment.
欺压人民
qīyā rénmín
ride roughshod over the people
欺压百姓，为非作歹
qīyā bǎixìng，wéifēizuòdǎi 
ride roughshod over the people and commit all sorts of crimes
在古代，农奴制使得大批农民世代为奴，受尽欺压。
Zài gǔdài，nóngnúzhì shǐdé dàpī nóngmín shìdài wéinú，shòujìn qīyā。
In ancient times, serfdom made large quantities of farmers slaves for generations and they suffered greatly from oppression.
你不要用强力欺压弱者。
Nǐ búyào yòng qiánglì qīyā ruòzhě。
You mustn\'t use force to bully and oppress the weak.
欺压。
欺压。
怙恃权势，欺压百姓。
不能欺压百姓。
这伙人欺行霸市，随意压价。
The battered citizens will surely arise to form a new government.
Shòu jìn qīyā de mínzhòng bìdìng huì jiēgān\'érqǐ zǔzhī yí gè xīn zhèngfǔ。
受尽欺压的民众必定会揭竿而起组织一个新政府。
他们欺人太甚，我们忍无可忍。
Tāmen qīréntàishèn，wǒmen rěnwúkěrěn。
Their provocations have gone beyond the limits of forbearance.
欺人太甚。

欺人太甚
qīréntàishèn
be too high-handed
欺人太甚。
他这样做也欺人太甚了！
欺人太甚。
制造谎言欺骗公众
zhìzào huǎngyán qīpiàn gōngzhòng
fabricate lies to deceive the public
抛出一项欺骗性的提案
pāochū yí xiàng qīpiànxìng de tí\'àn
dish out (or trot out) a phoney proposal
欺骗世界舆论
qīpiàn shìjiè yúlùn
befuddle world opinion
这只能欺骗那些不明真相的人。
Zhè zhǐnéng qīpiàn nàxiē bùmíng zhēnxiàng de rén。
This can only deceive those who do not know the truth. or This can only mislead those who are not aware of the facts.
你这是在欺骗自己。
Nǐ zhè shì zài qīpiàn zìjǐ。
You\'re deceiving yourself.
揭露两面派的欺骗性
Jiēlù liǎngmiànpài de qīpiànxìng
expose the duplicity of the double-dealers
产品保量不保质同样是欺骗消费者。
Chǎnpǐn bǎoliàng bùbǎozhì tóngyàng shì qīpiàn xiāofèizhě。
Quantity without quality should also be regarded as cheating consumers.
这些都是行货，不要欺骗我。
Zhèxiē dōushì hánghuò，búyào qīpiàn wǒ。
Don\'t try to cheat me, all these goods are roughly processed.
悔不该欺骗你，使你受到伤害。
Huǐ bùgāi qīpiàn nǐ，shǐ nǐ shòudào shānghài.
I regret my cheating you and making you suffer.
他千里寻踪，一定要找到欺骗他的人。
Tā qiānlǐ xúnzōng，yídìng yào zhǎodào qīpiàn tā de rén。
He travelled all this way because he\'s determined to find the person that had deceived him.
欺骗消费者就是砸自己的牌子。
Qīpiàn xiāofèizhě jiùshì zá zìjǐ de páizi。
Tricking consumers ruins a company\'s reputation.
他不想再欺骗别人，于是把整个事情搬到桌面儿上说清楚了。
Tā bùxiǎng zài qīpiàn biérén，yúshì bǎ zhěnggè shìqing bāndào zhuōmiànr shàng shuō qīngchu le。
He doesn\'t want to deceive others any more. Therefore, he put the whole incident on the table and made things clear to everybody.
这家公司借广告欺骗消费者。
Zhèjiā Gōngsī jiè guǎnggào qīpiàn xiāofèizhě.
The company uses advertising as a means of cheating consumers.
他不止一次欺骗我。
Tā bùzhǐ yícì qīpiàn wǒ。
He\'s deceived me on more than one occasion.
欺骗
编造理由，欺骗群众。
禁止用虚假广告欺骗人。
欺骗手法。
an easy mark
易受欺骗的人；容易上当的人，傻瓜
He didn\'t have it in him to cheat.
他不会欺骗。
to put a stop to cheating
努力制止欺骗行为
rank deceit
十足的欺骗行为
She played a really nasty trick on her ex-boyfriend and told him that she is pregnant!
她以各种无耻的手段欺骗前男友，告诉他自己怀孕了。
Tom tricked young girls, claiming that he would make them super models.
汤姆欺骗年轻女孩，声称自己可以让她们成为超级名模。
He\'s selling his girlfriend short.
他欺骗了自己的女朋友。
The embattled administration is facing a blanket indictment from the media for defrauding the public.
这个陷入窘境的政府部门将因欺骗公众而面临媒体铺天盖地的指控。
to take sb for a ride
[fig] 欺骗某人
Swindlers usually target elderly victims.
骗子一般将老年人作为欺骗目标。
I must confess it grieved me that I must be the instrument to abuse so honest a gentleman.
我必须承认， 想到我要做欺骗这个诚实君子的工具，心里的确很难过。
Furious at his deceit, she let fly at him with a stream of abuse.
他欺骗人, 气得她把他大骂了一顿。
His deceit has caused havoc in our lives.
Tā de qīpiàn gěi wǒmen de shēnghuó zàochéngle yánzhòng pòhuài。
他的欺骗给我们的生活造成了严重破坏。
He purposely deceived his friends and family.
Tā yǒuyì qīpiànle tā de péngyou hé jiārén。
他有意欺骗了他的朋友和家人。
He begged her to stop cheating on him.
Tā kěnqiú tā búyào zài qīpiàn tā le。
他恳求她不要再欺骗他了。
Seconds later he was on the phone again, bulling into the next prospect.
Jǐ miǎo zhōng zhī hòu，tā yòu kāishǐ dǎ diànhuà，jíqiè de qù qīpiàn xià yí wèi qiánzài kèhù。
几秒钟之后，他又开始打电话，急切地去欺骗下一位潜在客户。
He had a deceptively casual acting style that hid the effort he put into each role.
Tā yǒu yì zhǒng qīpiànxìng de zìrán suíyì de biǎoyǎn fāngshì，zhè yǎngàile tā zài měi gè juésè shàng fùchū de xīnxuè。
他有一种欺骗性的自然随意的表演方式，这掩盖了他在每个角色上付出的心血。
He was found out for breaking rules and cheating the system.
Tā bèi fāxiàn pòhuài guīzé bìng qīpiàn xìtǒng。
他被发现破坏规则并欺骗系统。
He rose to power through cunning and deceipt.
Tā tōngguò guǐjì hé qīpiàn huòdéle quánlì。
他通过诡计和欺骗获得了权力。
My friend of four years really screwed me over.
Xiāngchǔ sìnián de péngyou zhēn de qīpiànle wǒ。
相处四年的朋友真地欺骗了我。
I wished to protest against the shabby trick he had played on us.
Wǒ xīwàng duì tā qīpiàn wǒmen de bēibǐ xíngwéi jìnxíng kàngyì。
我希望对他欺骗我们的卑鄙行为进行抗议。
He was arrested in a police sting.
Tā yīnwèi qīpiàn jǐngchá ér bèibǔ。
他因为欺骗警察而被捕。
Her faith in man vanished after she saw her husband cheat on her.
Mùdǔle zhàngfu duì zìjǐ de qīpiàn zhīhòu，tā duì nánrén de xìnrèn chèdǐ xiāoshī le。
目睹了丈夫对自己的欺骗之后，她对男人的信任彻底消失了。
Youngsters are forbidden to lie, steal, cheat, and hurt others.
Niánqīngrén bù xǔ sāhuǎng、 tōuqiè、 qīpiàn yǐjí shānghài tārén。
年轻人不许撒谎、偷窃、欺骗以及伤害他人。
He was betrayed by his best friend over a girl.
Yīnwèi yí gè nǚhái， tā bèi zuì hǎo de péngyou qīpiàn。
因为一个女孩，他被最好的朋友欺骗。
I can\'t help but cheat on my girlfriend.
Wǒ bùdébù qīpiàn wǒ de nǚpéngyou。
我不得不欺骗我的女朋友。
He was done in by a woman pretending to be a poor old lady
Tā bèi yí wèi jiǎzhuāng chéng pínkǔ lǎotàitai de fùnǚ gěi qīpiàn le。
他被一位假装成贫苦老太太的妇女给欺骗了。
Some students are in the wrong level because they fake out the testers or get lucky.
Yǒuxiē tóngxué de chéngjì bìng bù zhēnshí，yīnwèi tāmen qīpiànle kǎoshì rényuán，huòzhě hěn xìngyùn。
有些同学的成绩并不真实，因为他们欺骗了考试人员，或者很幸运。
I hate his guts for cheating on me!
Yīnwèi qīpiàn wǒ， wǒ duì tā hènzhīrùgǔ。
因为欺骗我，我对他恨之入骨。
The thrower had used trickery to circumvent the criteria laid down in Law 15.

那个投手用欺骗的办法逃避了15号法令所规定的标准。
I hope you\'ll forgive the little tricks I\'ve practiced on you.
Wǒ xīwàng nǐ néng yuánliàng wǒ qīpiàn nǐ de xiǎoguǐjì。
我希望你能原谅我欺骗你的小诡计。
I \'ve just been sucked in by a con artist.
Wǒ gāng bèi yí wèi jiǎyìshùjiā qīpiàn le。
我刚被一位假艺术家欺骗了。
I was weary of the crook throwing dust in my eyes.
Wǒ yànjuànle zhège ègùn duì wǒ de qīpiàn。
我厌倦了这个恶棍对我的欺骗。
She was accused of worse things than cheating and lying.
Duì tā de zhǐkòng bǐ qīpiàn hé sāhuǎng háiyào yánzhòng。
对她的指控比欺骗和撒谎还要严重。
It was beneath his dignity to cheat.
Qīpiàn yǒu shī tā de shēnfèn。
欺骗有失他的身份。
Cheating is wrong.
Qīpiàn shì cuòwù de。
欺骗是错误的。

Wǒmen bèi tāmen de guǐjì qīpiàn le。
我们被他们的诡计欺骗了。
She cheats on her husband.
Tā qīpiàn tā zhàngfu。
她欺骗她丈夫。
He could equally well be trying to deceive us.
Tā tóngyàng hěn kěnéng qīpiàn wǒmen。
他同样很可能欺骗我们。

少给黑人报酬而多向他们索取是一种欺骗。
The gimmick would convince none but the most credulous.
Zhèyàng de huāzhāo zhǐnéng qīpiàn nàxiē zuì róngyì qīngxìn de rén。
这样的花招只能欺骗那些最容易轻信的人。

Nǐ shìfǒu céng bèi nàyàng de guǐjì suǒ qīpiàn？

He could see through the indirections of diplomats.
Tā nénggòu kànchuān wàijiāo qīpiàn。

他卷入了这起欺骗政府的阴谋。

他欺骗教授，使教授误认为他很熟悉这门学科。
She defrauded the customers who trusted her.
Tā qīpiànle xìnrèn tā de gùkè。
她欺骗了信任她的顾客。

受尽欺凌
I made a stand against the bullies at school.
Wǒ zài xuéxiào yǔ nàxiē qīlíng ruòxiǎo de rén zuò dòuzhēng。
我在学校与那些欺凌弱小的人做斗争。
`How could he possibly let a little innocent girl be bullied and tormented?\'
Tā zěnme kěnéng huì ràng yí gè chúnjié de xiǎonǚhái shòudào qīlíng hé zhémó ne ？
他怎么可能会让一个纯洁的小女孩受到欺凌和折磨呢？
Bullies feel the need to be popular, to fit in, and often go to extremes to do that.
Qīlíng ruòxiǎozhě juéde yǒu bìyào biàn de shòu huānyíng，yǔ rén xiāngchǔ róngqià，què wǎngwǎng wèicǐ ér zǒuxiàng jíduān。
欺凌弱小者觉得有必要变得受欢迎，与人相处融洽，却往往为此而走向极端。
开玩笑可以，欺负人可不行。
Kāi wánxiào kěyǐ，qīfu rén kě bùxíng。
To have a joke is all right, but to bully people just won\'t do.
大国不应当欺负小国。
Dàguó bùyīngdāngqīfu xiǎoguó。

任意欺负别人
rènyì qīfù biérén
bully people at will

他的大老婆人很恶毒，总是欺负手下的人。

His official wife is vicious, and always treats her servants high-handedly.
他是这边有名的混子，经常欺负人。

He is a well-known hoodlum in this neighborhood, always bullying others.
你过于宽让了，别人就会欺负你！

看你这副可怜兮兮的样子，到底谁欺负你了？

You look miserable, who bullied you?
你这个衣冠禽兽就知道欺负女人。

Some cadres\' children take advantage of their parents\' power to bully their classmates at school.
不管那女人怎么欺负我们，我们都不在乎。
Bùguǎn nànǚrén zěnme qīfu wǒmen，wǒmen dōubúzàihū。
No matter how that woman bullies us, we just don\'t care.
放心吧，没有谁敢欺负你。
Fàngxīn bā，méiyǒu shuí gǎn qīfu nǐ.
Relax – no one\'s going to dare to bully you.
我钱某人不是好欺负的。
他太欺负人了，我实在咽不下这口气！
大人怎么能欺负小孩呢！
他整天欺负人，有跟他算账的日子。

他是个懦夫,在单位谁都敢欺负他。
I got into trouble after I pulled about my younger brother.

我欺负了我弟弟，因此而惹上麻烦了。
It is wrong for the rich to take advantage of the poor.
Fùrén qīfu qióngrén shì bú dàodé de。
富人欺负穷人是不道德的。
There will always be a few people who, through macho perversity, gain satisfaction from bullying and terrorism.
Zǒng yǒu yìxiērén，tōngguò qīfu ruòxiǎo hé kǒnghè xíngwéi biǎoxiàn yìzhǒng bìngtài de nánzǐ qìgài，bìng yǐcǐ huòdé mǎnzú。
总有一些人，通过欺负弱小和恐吓行为表现一种病态的男子气概，并以此获得满足。
Who will be responsible for the impact of fraud?
谁对欺诈的后果负责？
完全是自欺欺人之谈
wánquán shì zìqīqīrén zhī tán

zhìzào huǎngyán qīpiàn gōngzhòng
fabricate lies to deceive the public

欺上蒙下
qī shàngmēngxià

qīpiàn shìjiè yúlùn

Jiēlù liǎngmiànpài de qīpiànxìng
expose the duplicity of the double-dealers
大家骂他不公平，欺软怕硬。
Dàjiā mà tā bùgōngpíng，qīruǎnpàyìng。
Everybody lashed out at his unfairness, calling him a cowardly bully.
那儿的人欺生，见了外地人特横。

The people there are apt to cheat strangers; they\'re particularly rough on nonnatives.
他们家那狗欺生，我一进院子它就叫。
Tāmen jiā nà gǒu qīshēng，wǒ yí jìn yuànzi tā jiù jiào。
Their dog is fierce towards strangers; he barks at me whenever I enter the courtyard.
这马欺生，我一靠近它就尥蹶子。

This horse refuses to behave for strangers; he kicks at me whenever I approach him.

The reviewer\'s criticism was unnecessarily insulting.
她让人欺侮得直哭。

qīyā rénmín

Běndì de chuánwáng yóuyú shèxián shāngyèqīzhà yǐ bèi fǎyuàn chuánhuàn。
The local shipping tycoon has been summoned to court because of suspected deceptive business practices.
这帮地痞整天到处瞎串游，看见老实人就欺负。
Zhèbāng dìpǐ zhěngtiān dàochù xiāchuànyóu，kànjiàn lǎoshirén jiù qīfù。
This gang of ruffians wanders around all day long and bullies any honest person they come across.
欺辱这些手无寸铁的平民，这些人真是丧尽天良。
Qīrǔ zhèxiē shǒuwú cùntiě de píngmín，zhèxiē rén zhēnshì sàngjìn tiānliáng。
They are utterly devoid of conscience, they even humiliated these defenseless civilians.
他的大老婆人很恶毒，总是欺负手下的人。
Tā de dà lǎopó rén hěnèdú，zǒng shì qīfù shǒuxià de rén。
His official wife is vicious, and always treats her servants high-handedly.
用这种手段获利，简直是欺世盗名。
Yòng zhèzhǒng shǒuduàn huòlì，jiǎnzhí shì qīshì dàomíng。
Profiting in this way is winning popularity by cheating the public.
这些都是行货，不要欺骗我。
Zhèxiē dōushì hánghuò，búyào qīpiàn wǒ。
Don\'t try to cheat me, all these goods are roughly processed.
悔不该欺骗你，使你受到伤害。
Huǐ bùgāi qīpiàn nǐ，shǐ nǐ shòudào shānghài.
I regret my cheating you and making you suffer.
他是这边有名的混子，经常欺负人。
Tā shì zhèbiān yǒumíng de hùnzi，jīngcháng qīfù rén。
He is a well-known hoodlum in this neighborhood, always bullying others.
就算你有了权力也不要借势欺人。
Jiùsuàn nǐ yǒu le quánlì yě búyào jièshì qīrén。
Even if you are in power, you can not bully others.
你过于宽让了，别人就会欺负你！
Nǐ guòyú kuān ràng le，biérén jiùhuì qīfù nǐ！
If you are too lenient, you will be bullied by others.
对于这种朋友间的欺诈行为，我们绝不能心慈面软。
Duìyú zhèzhǒng péngyou jiān de qīzhà xíngwéi，wǒmen jué bùnéng xīncí miànruǎn。
We should never show mercy to a fraud among friends.
在古代，农奴制使得大批农民世代为奴，受尽欺压。
Zài gǔdài，nóngnúzhì shǐdé dàpī nóngmín shìdài wéinú，shòujìn qīyā。
In ancient times, serfdom made large quantities of farmers slaves for generations and they suffered greatly from oppression.
即使是小孩子，我们也不该欺哄他。
Jíshǐ shì xiǎoháizi，wǒmen yě bùgāi qīhǒng tā。
Even if he is a kid, we shouldn\'t deceive him.
你不要用强力欺压弱者。
Nǐ búyào yòng qiánglì qīyā ruòzhě。
You mustn\'t use force to bully and oppress the weak.
这个权门弟子经常仗势欺人。
Zhège quánmén dìzǐ jīngcháng zhàngshì qīrén。
This man, who is from a family of an influential official, often takes advantage of his family to bully people.
我店的宗旨就是诚信经营，童叟无欺。
Wǒ diàn de zōngzhǐ jiùshì chéngxìn jīngyíng，tóngsǒu wúqī。
The aim of our shop is honest operation, and so neither the old nor the young will be cheated.
看你这副可怜兮兮的样子，到底谁欺负你了？
Kàn nǐ zhè fù kělián xīxī de yàngzi，dàodǐ shuí qīfu nǐ le？
You look miserable, who bullied you?
他千里寻踪，一定要找到欺骗他的人。
Tā qiānlǐ xúnzōng，yídìng yào zhǎodào qīpiàn tā de rén。
He travelled all this way because he\'s determined to find the person that had deceived him.
你这个衣冠禽兽就知道欺负女人。
Nǐ zhège yíguàn qínshòu jiù zhīdào qīfu nǚrén。
You are a beast in human attire, you always bully women.
中国古代欺君的官员往往会被判处夷族的重罪。
Zhōngguó gǔdài qījūn de guānyuán wǎngwǎng huì bèi pànchǔ yízú de zhòngzuì。
In ancient China, if an officials cheated the emperor, his entire family would be exterminated.
千万记住，任何时候都不要倚势欺人。
Qiānwàn jìzhù，rènhé shíhou dōu búyào yǐshì qīrén。
Be sure to bear this in mind: never rely on your position to bully others.
欺骗消费者就是砸自己的牌子。
Qīpiàn xiāofèizhě jiùshì zá zìjǐ de páizi。
Tricking consumers ruins a company\'s reputation.
他不想再欺骗别人，于是把整个事情搬到桌面儿上说清楚了。
Tā bùxiǎng zài qīpiàn biérén，yúshì bǎ zhěnggè shìqing bāndào zhuōmiànr shàng shuō qīngchu le。
He doesn\'t want to deceive others any more. Therefore, he put the whole incident on the table and made things clear to everybody.
不管那女人怎么欺负我们，我们都不在乎。
Bùguǎn nànǚrén zěnme qīfu wǒmen，wǒmen dōubúzàihū。
No matter how that woman bullies us, we just don\'t care.
这家公司借广告欺骗消费者。
Zhèjiā Gōngsī jiè guǎnggào qīpiàn xiāofèizhě.
The company uses advertising as a means of cheating consumers.

She cheats on her husband.
Tā qīpiàn tā zhàngfu。
她欺骗她丈夫。

Tā tóngyàng hěn kěnéng qīpiàn wǒmen。

少给黑人报酬而多向他们索取是一种欺骗。

He could see through the indirections of diplomats.
Tā nénggòu kànchuān wàijiāo qīpiàn。

Tā xùyì qīpiànle wǒ。

fājué gǔmù

盗掘古墓必将受法律严惩。
Dàojué gǔmù bìjiāng shòu fǎlǜ yánchéng。
People who rob graves must be severely punished by law.
考古学家在这座古墓中发现了三顶凤冠。
Kǎogǔxuéjiā zài zhèzuò gǔmù zhōng fāxiàn le sān dǐng fèngguān。
The archeologists found three phoenix coronets in this ancient tomb.
这座古墓已经有几百年的历史。
Zhèzuò gǔmù yǐjing yǒu jǐ bǎi nián de lìshǐ。
This ancient cemetery has a history of several hundred years.
那个新发现的汉代古墓，墓主人很可能是个郡守！
Nàge xīn fāxiàn de Hàndài gǔmù，mùzhǔrén hěnkěnéng shì gè jùnshǒu！
That newly found ancient cemetery of the Han Dynasty might have belonged to a county official.
从墓表看，这座明代古墓埋着一个名叫李东的人。
Cóng mùbiǎo kàn，zhè zuò Míngdài gǔmù mái zhe yígè míngjiào Lǐ Dōng de rén。
From the gravestone, a man named Li Dong was buried in the ancient tomb of the Ming dynasty.
这个古墓里出土了很多精美的随葬品。
Zhège gǔmù lǐ chūtǔ le hěnduō jīngměi de suízàngpǐn。
Many exquisite funerary objects were extracted from this grave.
在墓室中考古学家发现了一些用于书写的简牍。
Zài mùshì zhōng kǎogǔxuéjiā fāxiàn le yìxiē yòngyú shūxiě de jiǎndú。
In the exploration of the tomb, archaeologists found some bamboo writing slips.
考古人员在一座汉墓中发现一件金缕玉衣。
Kǎogǔ rényuán zài yízuò hànmù zhōng fāxiàn yíjiàn jīnlǚyùyī。
The archaeologist found a jade dress in a Han Dynasty tomb.
古墓被盗，文物残片撒落一地。
盗掘古墓。
古墓枯骨。
古墓中出土的殉葬品。
古墓四壁的彩绘依稀可见
发掘汉代古墓
古墓中有两具遗骸。
数这座墓最古
The treasure found int he ancient tomb was reposited in the museum.
Zài nà zuò gǔmù zhōng fāxiàn de cáibǎo dōu bǎocúnzài Bówùguǎn zhōng。
在那座古墓中发现的财宝都保存在博物馆中。
The Egyptian pyramids developed from the mastaba.
Āijí jīnzìtǎ shì cóng gǔ\'āijí mùshì fāzhǎn érláide。
埃及金字塔是从古埃及墓室发展而来的。
The old tombs in Upper Egypt need to be preserved from further deterioration.
Shàng Āijí dìqū de nàxiē gǔlǎo de fénmù xūyào bǎohù，fángzhǐ jìnyíbù èhuà。
上埃及地区的那些古老的坟墓需要保护，防止进一步恶化。
The archeologists found a ancient female corpse in an unattested mastaba.
考古学家在一个未经证实的墓里发现了一具古代女尸。
烈士公墓
The dead were buried in the cemetary.
Sǐzhě bèi máizài gōngmù lǐ。
死者被埋在公墓里。
He was buried at the cemetry in his local town.
Tā bèi zàngzài tāmen dāngdì Xiǎozhèn de gōngmù lǐ。
他被葬在他们当地小镇的公墓里。
少走弯路
shǎo zǒu wānlù 
avoid detours
由于缺少经验，我们工作走了弯路。
Yóuyú quēshǎo jīngyàn，wǒmen gōngzuò zǒu le wānlù。
Owing to lack of experience we took a roundabout course in our work.
由于科技力量落后，这个企业在发展上走了不少弯路。
Yóuyú kējì lìliang luòhòu，zhège qǐyè zài fāzhǎn shàng zǒu le bùshǎo wānlù。
Because of backwardness in science and technology, this enterprise has taken a roundabout route many times.
汽车走在盘陀路上，转弯处需要格外小心。
Qìchē zǒuzài pántuó lùshàng，zhuǎnwānchù xūyào géwài xiǎoxīn。
You are driving on a winding path, take care when you are passing through the turns.
早知道这个办法，就不会走弯路了。
缺乏经验，难免走弯路。
I hope that I\'ve given you enough to get you started on the right tracks.
Dànyuàn wǒ yǐ gěi nǐ zúgòu de dōngxi，ràng nǐ néng bù zǒu wānlù。
但愿我已给你足够的东西，让你能不走弯路。
She has always walked with a stoop.
Tā zǒngshì wānyāo zǒulù。
她总是弯腰走路。
高速转弯很危险。
Gāosù zhuǎnwān hěn wēixiǎn。
It\'s dangerous to turn a corner at high speed.
急转弯
jízhuǎnwān 
make a sharp turn
邮局一转弯儿就是。
Yóujú yì zhuǎnwānr jiù shì。
The post office is just round (or right around) the corner.
右转弯走！
Yòu zhuǎnwān zǒu！
(word of command) Right wheel! (to a rank) Right turn march! or Column right march! (to a column)
给他们一个转弯的余地
gěi tāmen yígè zhuǎnwān de yúdì 
give them some leeway
我们转弯抹角地走了好一会才找到那个地方。
Wǒmen zhuǎnwānmòjiǎo de zǒu le hǎo yíhuì cái zhǎodào nàge dìfang。
We had to take a tortuous route before we got to the place.
有什么意见就痛快说，别这么转弯抹角的。
Yǒu shénme yìjiàn jiù tòngkuài shuō，bié zhème zhuǎnwānmòjiǎo de。
Say what you have to say and don\'t beat about the bush.
左转弯
zuǒ zhuǎnwān 
turn to the left; turn left
他的伤口创面所在的位置是关节转弯处，容易感染，一定要小心处理。
Tā de shāngkǒu chuàngmiàn suǒzài de wèizhi shì guānjié zhuǎnwān chù，róngyì gǎnrǎn，yídìng yào xiǎoxīn chǔlǐ。
His wound is at the moving point of the joint, so it can easily get infected and requires careful treatment.
你到前面的丁字街口右转弯，就能看到那座大厦了。
Nǐ dào qiánmiàn de dīngzì jiēkǒu yòu zhuǎnwān，jiù néng kàndào nà zuò dàshà le。
Turn right at that T-junction ahead and you can see that building.
司机机灵地打了个急转弯才避免了一场车祸。
Sījī jīlíng de dǎ le gè jízhuǎnwān cái bìmiǎn le yìcháng chēhuò。
The driver smartly took a sharp turn, thus avoided an accident.
汽车走在盘陀路上，转弯处需要格外小心。
Qìchē zǒuzài pántuó lùshàng，zhuǎnwānchù xūyào géwài xiǎoxīn。
You are driving on a winding path, take care when you are passing through the turns.
转弯
Zhuǎnwān
turn a corner
三弯九转
sā nwān jiǔ zhuǎn
many twists and turns
转弯向北走20米就到了。
有话直说，别转弯。
他头脑灵活，转弯很快。
时代进步了，思想也要转弯子。
你就直接说吧，不要转弯子了。
脑子一时转不过弯儿来。
他是个死脑筋，转不过弯来。
He took that corner too fast.
他在转弯处转得太急。
a hairpin turn
U形急转弯
an indirect reply
转弯抹角的回答
turn left where the road jogs
在路急转弯的地方向左拐
to make a quick turn
急转弯
a quick turn
急转弯
a sharp turn
急转弯
a sudden turn in the road
路上的一处急转弯
I had an accident at that bend just one year ago.
就在一年前我在那个转弯处出了车祸。
They should do something for that bend, it\'s too dangerous.
那个转弯处太危险了，他们应该对此采取点儿措施。

在交通高峰时，他看到一辆车在马路上转弯，撞到消防栓。
I think we must have gone past the turn.
我想我们已经过了转弯处。
We were nearing the point where the lane curved round to the right.
我们在道路向右转弯这个位置附近。
turn sharp left
向左急转弯

着陆前朝向跑道的不协调转弯可能导致飞机发生意外旋冲。
Grasp the handle when the bus turns.
公车转弯时要抓紧把手。
It\'s dangerous to turn without using a signal.
不打信号就转弯是很危险的。
Don\'t forget to signal before making a left turn.

There was a jog in the river.
Hé zhōng yǒu yí gè jízhuǎnwān。
河中有一个急转弯。

Tā tūrán qīngxié zhuǎnwān，jiéguǒ lìng yī liàng chē chāole guòqù。
他突然倾斜转弯，结果另一辆车超了过去。
The fighter plane was in a bank when the missile struck.

高速转弯时，我都能感觉到车厢在倾斜。
The car made a sudden swerve to avoid the child.

There was a jog in the road.
Zhè tiáo lù shàng yǒu gè jízhuǎnwān。
这条路上有个急转弯。
He took the lead at the last turn.
Tā zài zuìhòu zhuǎnwānchù qǔdé lǐngxiān。

The road curved sharply.
Zhè tiáo lù zhuǎnwān hěn jí。
这条路转弯很急。
He angled his way into the room.
Tā zhuǎnwān zǒujìn Fángjiān。
他转弯走进房间。
The road twists sharply after the light.
Guòqù nàgè lùdēng，dàolù biàn jíjù zhuǎnwān。

The motorbike veered to the right.

他说话喜欢单刀直入，不绕弯子。

有话直说，别绕弯子。

She has always walked with a stoop.
Tā zǒngshì wānyāo zǒulù。
她总是弯腰走路。
Lucy leaned closer to the mirror, carefully wiping the black streak from her skin.
Lù sī wānyāo kàojìn jìngzi，xiǎoxīn de cāshìzhe tā pífū shàng de hēi wén。

He needed to bend over to tie his shoelaces.

Tā xiàowānle yāo。

Tā wānxià yāo，qīngpāi zhèxiē diànzǐ。

弯弯的月牙儿
wānwān de yuèyár 
a crescent moon
苹果把树枝坠得弯弯的。
Píngguǒ bǎ shùzhī zhuì de wānwān de。
The branches were bending down with the weight of the apples. or The apples weighed the branches down.
这条路弯弯拐拐的地方很多，因此开车时速度不能太快。

There are so many twists and turns on this road, one should not drive too fast here.
真是不知道他在想什么弯弯拐拐呢！
Zhēn shì bùzhīdào tā zài xiǎng shénme wānwānguǎiguǎi ne！
I really don\'t know what strange ideas he is thinking about!
你这人说起说话来怎么总喜欢弯弯绕？
Nǐzhèrén shuōqǐshuōhuàlái zěnme zǒng xǐhuan wānwānrào？
Why do you always beat around the bush while speaking?
他是个弯弯绕，没有一个人喜欢他。
Tā shì gè wānwānrào，méiyǒu yígèrén xǐhuan tā。
He always plays tricks on others, so no one likes him.
他生就一身傲骨，宁折不弯。
Tā shēngjiù yìshēn àogǔ，nìng zhé bùwān。
A man of unyielding character, he would rather break than bend.
他说话喜欢单刀直入，不绕弯子。

He likes to come straight to the point without beating about the bush.

高速转弯很危险。
Gāosù zhuǎnwān hěn wēixiǎn。

拐弯要慢行。
Guǎiwān yào màn xíng。

Tā sīxiǎngyì shí hái guǎi bu guò wān lái。

Shuōhuà búyào guǎiwānmòjiǎo。

他拐弯抹角地提到这件事。
Tā guǎiwānmòjiǎo de tídào zhèjiàn shì。

弯道缓行。
Wāndào huǎnxíng。

jízhuǎnwān

guǎi le gè jíwān 
made a sharp turn

三弯九转
sā nwān jiǔ zhuǎn

wānyāo qūbèi
with one\'s back bent

我出去绕个弯儿就回来。
Wǒ chūqù rào gè wānr jiù huílái。
I\'m going out for a walk and will be back soon.
有话直说，别绕弯子。
Yǒu huà zhíshuō，bié rào wānzi。

少走弯路
shǎo zǒu wānlù

Lěilěi de guǒshí bǎ shùzhī dōu yāwān le。

wān zhe yāo chāyāng

一条弯曲的山间小道

Zhang Youtian is forthright, and never beats about the bush.
邮局一转弯儿就是。
Yóujú yì zhuǎnwānr jiù shì。
The post office is just round (or right around) the corner.
右转弯走！
Yòu zhuǎnwān zǒu！
(word of command) Right wheel! (to a rank) Right turn march! or Column right march! (to a column)
给他们一个转弯的余地
gěi tāmen yígè zhuǎnwān de yúdì 
give them some leeway
我们转弯抹角地走了好一会才找到那个地方。
Wǒmen zhuǎnwānmòjiǎo de zǒu le hǎo yíhuì cái zhǎodào nàge dìfang。
We had to take a tortuous route before we got to the place.

Say what you have to say and don\'t beat about the bush.
左转弯
zuǒ zhuǎnwān 
turn to the left; turn left

Tā yīwēi zài àirén de bìwān lǐ，qīngqīng de chàng zhe gē。
She leans in her lover’s arms, and sings softly.

Wǒ de zìxíngchē chēfú yǐjing bèi yāwān le。

炽灼的太阳把庄稼晒得都弯了腰。
Chìzhuó de tàiyáng bǎ zhuāngjià shài de dōu wān le yāo。
The scorching sun has bent the crops.
他的伤口创面所在的位置是关节转弯处，容易感染，一定要小心处理。

His wound is at the moving point of the joint, so it can easily get infected and requires careful treatment.
他的性格粗憨，不会拐弯抹角。
Tā de xìnggé cūhān，búhuì guǎiwānmòjiǎo。
He is rough and straight-forward, and never beats about the bush.
他的腿不会打弯儿了。
Tā de tuǐ búhuì dǎwānr le。
He can not bend his legs.
你到前面的丁字街口右转弯，就能看到那座大厦了。
Nǐ dào qiánmiàn de dīngzì jiēkǒu yòu zhuǎnwān，jiù néng kàndào nà zuò dàshà le。
Turn right at that T-junction ahead and you can see that building.
这种钢丝背心可以矫正脊柱侧弯。
Zhèzhǒng gāngsī bèixīn kěyǐ jiǎozhèng jǐzhù cèwān。
This kind of steel wire vest can rectify scoliosis.
这孩子怎么总喜欢弯腰弓背？
Zhè háizi zěnme zǒng xǐhuan wānyāo gōngbèi？
Why does the kid like to bend his back all the time?
司机机灵地打了个急转弯才避免了一场车祸。
Sījī jīlíng de dǎ le gè jízhuǎnwān cái bìmiǎn le yìcháng chēhuò。
The driver smartly took a sharp turn, thus avoided an accident.
在拐弯处司机减慢了车速，这种做法很正确。
Zài guǎiwānchù sījī jiǎnmàn le chēsù，zhèzhǒng zuòfǎ hěnzhèngquè。
It is laudable that the driver slows down when he making a turn at the corner.
别拐弯抹角的了，说亮话吧。
Bié guǎiwānmòjiǎo de le，shuō liànghuà ba。
Don\'t talk in a roundabout way. Be frank and straight forward.
她长了一双柳叶弯眉，十分好看。
Tā zhǎng le yì shuāng liǔyè wānméi，shífēn hǎokàn。
Her long and slender eyebrows are very beautiful.
晚饭后，我习惯和爸爸妈妈去遛弯儿。
Wǎnfàn hòu，wǒ xíguàn hé bàba māma qù liùwānr。
I am used to taking a walk with my parents after supper.
他蹓弯儿时捡了一个书包。
Tā liùwānr shí jiǎn le yígè shūbāo。
He picked up a bag when he went for a walk.
汽车走在盘陀路上，转弯处需要格外小心。

juéwàng de zhēngzhá
desperate struggle

sǐmìng zhēngzhá

struggle for existence on the verge of death
挣扎着坐起来
zhèngzhá zhe zuò qǐ lái 
struggle to a sitting position
中枪的野猪挣扎了一会后就僵卧在地上，一动不动了。
Zhòngqiāng de yězhū zhēngzā le yíhuì hòu jiù jiāngwòzàidìshàng，yídòng búdòng le。
The wild boar lay stiff and rigid after being shot.
这个国家还有好多老百姓在温饱线以下挣扎。
Zhège guójiā háiyǒu hǎoduō lǎobǎixìng zài wēnbǎoxiàn yǐxià zhēngzhá。
Many people live under the poverty line in this country.

挣扎着坐起来。
从厄运中挣扎过来。
垂死挣扎。
老太太扎挣着挪了两步。
to struggle through a thicket
挣扎着走出树丛
The organization is helping people that are dying of hunger.
该组织正在帮助挣扎于饥饿之中的人们。
Emma is struggling in an ocean of debt.
艾玛在无尽的债务中挣扎。
He struggles to his feet, his exposed skin now completely blackened by a chemical reaction
Tā fènlì zhēngzhá，tā luǒlù de pífū yǐjīng bèi huàxué fǎnyìng wánquán shāohēi。
他奋力挣扎，他裸露的皮肤已经被化学反应完全烧黑。
He was brought through from struggle and strife.
Tā yǐjīng dùguòle zhēngzhá fèndòu de jiēduàn。
他已经度过了挣扎奋斗的阶段。
We may find ourselves struggling to decide whether to intervene between two warring factions.
Wǒmen kěnéng huì kǔkǔ zhēngzhá， juédìng shìfǒu zài jiāozhàn shuāngfāng zhījiān jìnxíng tiáotíng。
我们可能会苦苦挣扎，决定是否在交战双方之间进行调停。
The economic is still struggling along.
Jīngjì réngrán zài zhēngzházhe qiánxíng。
经济仍然在挣扎着前行。
He struggled along the deep river.
Tā zhēngzházhe zài shēnhé lǐ qiánjìn。
他挣扎着在深河里前进。
Many people struggle on with their lives.
Xǔduō rén dōu zài wèi jìxù shēngcún ér zhēngzhá。
许多人都在为继续生存而挣扎。
He struggled to his feet, then was caught at his own sword.
Tā zhēngzházhe zhànle qǐlái， què bèi tā zìjǐ de jiàn jīzhòng。
他挣扎着站了起来，却被他自己的剑击中。
Beethoven\'s manuscript looks like a bloody record of a tremendous inner battle.
Bèiduōfēn de shǒugǎo kàn qǐlái xiàngshì duì jùdà de nèixīn zhēngzhá de diéxuè jìlù。
贝多芬的手稿看起来像是对巨大的内心挣扎的喋血记录。
A series of death struggles with small time in between.
Yíxìliè liánxù-búduàn de chuísǐ zhēngzhá。
一系列连续不断的垂死挣扎。
She struggled for years to survive without welfare.
Xǔduōnián lái，tā yìzhí zài zhēngzhá，shìtú zài méiyǒu shèhuìfúlì de tiáojiàn xià shēngcún xiàlái。
许多年来，她一直在挣扎，试图在没有社会福利的条件下生存下来。
He struggled to get free from the rope.
Tā zhēngzházhe cóng shéngzi zhōng jiětuō。
他挣扎着从绳子中解脱。
The shipwrecked survivors weltered in the sea for hours.
Shīshì chuánzhī de xìngcúnzhě zài hǎishuǐ zhōng zhēngzhále hǎo jǐ gè xiǎoshí。
失事船只的幸存者在海水中挣扎了好几个小时。
She fought tooth and nail.
Tā pīnmìng de zhēngzhá fǎnkàng。
她拼命地挣扎反抗。
She is floundering in college.
Tā zài Dàxué zhōng zhēngzházhe。
她在大学中挣扎着。
你估量他挣多少？
Nǐ gūliángtā zhèngduōshao?
How much do you reckon he earns?
拉纤的船夫在河岸上一步步挣扎着前进，一面有节奏地齐声哼着“杭育！杭育！”
Lāqiàn de chuánfū zài hé\'àn shàngyíbù bùzhēngzhá zhe qiánjìn，yí miàn yǒu jiézòu de qíshēngheng zhe “hángyù！hángyù！”
As they inched forward, step by step, on the banks of the river, the boat-pullers kept up a constant rhythmical &quot;Heave ho! Heave ho!&quot;

她觉得自己挣的钱用着硬气。
Tā jué de zìjǐ zhèng de qián yòng zhe yìngqì。
She had no qualms about spending money she\'d earned herself.
他在这家餐厅干杂活儿挣点钱。
Tā zài zhè jiā cāntīnggàn záhuór zhèngdiǎn qián。
He earns some money by doing odd jobs at the restaurant.

He wrenched himself free from his bonds.

zhèngfàn chī

zhènggōngzī de 
wage earner

She earns a high salary.
挣钱糊口
zhèngqián húkǒu 
earn a living
他挣的不多，但足以应付生活所需。
Tā zhèng de bùduō，dàn zúyǐ yìngfù shēnghuó suǒxū。
He does not earn a large salary but it is adequate for his needs.
出徒以后就能自己挣钱了，小伙计心里想着就高兴。
Chūtú yǐhòu jiùnéng zìjǐ zhèngqián le，xiǎohuǒjì xīnlǐ xiǎng zhe jiù gāoxìng。
The apprentice was very happy when he thought of being able to make money on his own upon the conclusion of his apprenticeship.
我粗粗一算，今天将近挣了一千块钱。
Wǒ cūcū yísuàn，jīntiān jiāngjìn zhèng le yìqiān kuài qián。
After a rough count, I found that today I have made nearly 1,000 yuan.
这几年出去打工，没挣什么大钱。
Zhè jǐnián chūqù dǎgōng，méi zhèng shénme dàqián。
I haven\'t earned a significant amount of money this year after leaving my hometown for work.
中枪的野猪挣扎了一会后就僵卧在地上，一动不动了。
Zhòngqiāng de yězhū zhēngzā le yíhuì hòu jiù jiāngwòzàidìshàng，yídòng búdòng le。
The wild boar lay stiff and rigid after being shot.
她拼命地揽工是为了给家里的妹妹挣学费。
Tā pīnmìng de lǎngōng shì wèi le gěi jiā lǐ de mèimei zhèng xuéfèi。
She slaves away in order to pay her sister\'s tuition.
为了让全家大小都能暖肚，他只能不断地挣钱。
Wèile ràng quánjiā dàxiǎo dōu néng nuǎndù，tā zhǐnéng búduàn de zhèngqián。
To fill all the family members\' bellies, he has to make money ceaselessly.
他拼死拼活地挣钱，就是为了全家能过上好日子。
Tā pīnsǐ pīnhuó de zhèngqián，jiùshì wèi le quánjiā néng guòshàng hǎo rìzi。
He slaves away to make money so that his family can live a happy life.
他最热衷的事情就是不断地挣钱。
Tā zuì rè zhōng de shìqing jiùshì búduàn de zhèngqián。
He hankers after making money ceaselessly.
我不想和他睡在一起，他睡着以后经常撒呓挣。
Wǒ bùxiǎng hé tā shuì zài yīqǐ，tā shuìzháo yǐhòu jīngcháng sāyìzhèng。
I don\'t want to sleep with him. He always talks, or acts in his sleep.
每个月挣这么少的薪水，还奢谈什么买别墅呀！
Měigè yuè zhèng zhème shǎo de xīnshui，hái shētán shénme mǎi biéshù ya ！
How can you talk about buying a villa with so little salary every month?
这种交易虽然不会挣来多少实益，却能为我们换得良好声誉。
Zhèzhǒng jiāoyì suīrán búhuì zhènglái duōshǎo shíyì，què néng wèi wǒmen huàndé liánghǎo shēngyù。
Such trade fairs can\'t bring us too many practical benefits, but they can earn us a good name.
庶几能够找个工作，就可以挣钱自立了。
Shùjǐ nénggòu zhǎo gè gōngzuò，jiù kěyǐ zhèngqián zìlì le。
I hope that I can find a job, then I can earn money and be independent.
你别说梦话了，100万元钱能那么好挣吗？
Nǐ bié shuō mènghuà le，yìbǎiwàn yuánqián néng nàme hǎo zhèng ma？
Stop talking nonsense, could it be so easy to earn 1 million yuan?
他开了一家糖业公司，挣了不少钱。
Tā kāi le yìjiā tángyè gōngsī，zhèng le bùshǎo qián。
He started up a sugar manufacturing company, and has made quite a lot of money so far.
这匹烈马挣断了我的套马杆狂奔起来。
Zhè pǐ lièmǎ zhēngduàn le wǒ de tàomǎgān kuángbēn qǐlái。
The horse broke away from my horse pole and ran wild.
做这个买卖不但不挣钱，我还得贴钱呢。
Zuò zhège mǎimai búdàn bú zhèngqián，wǒ hái děi tiēqián ne。
I not only fail to make profits out of the business, but have to run it at a loss.
我想利用业余时间找份外活儿干干，也好多挣点儿钱嘛。
Wǒ xiǎng lìyòng yèyú shíjiān zhǎo fèn wàihuór gàngàn，yě hǎo duō zhèng diǎnr qián ma。
I want to moonlight in my leisure time, as it can bring me more money.
这个国家还有好多老百姓在温饱线以下挣扎。
Zhège guójiā háiyǒu hǎoduō lǎobǎixìng zài wēnbǎoxiàn yǐxià zhēngzhá。
Many people live under the poverty line in this country.
为了挣钱供两个弟弟读书，小陈做了一名舞姬。
Wèile zhèngqián gōng liǎnggè dìdi dúshū，Xiǎo Chén zuò le yìmíng wǔjī。
Xiao Chen went to work as a dancing girl to support her two brothers schooling.
他要挣脱心灵的枷锁，向着自由展翅翱翔。
Tā yào zhēngtuō xīnlíng de jiāsuǒ，xiàng zhe zìyóu zhǎnchì áoxiáng。
He wants to throw off the shackles in his heart, and pursue his freedom.
他挣的钱勉强够自己花。
Tā zhèng de qián miǎnqiǎng gòu zìjǐ huā.
The money he earned was barely enough to support himself.
他挣得不多，日子难过。
Tā zhèngde bù duō，rìzi nánguò.
He doesn\'t earn much – he has a hard time of it.
他为了给父亲治病拼命挣钱。
Tā wèile gěi fùqīn zhìbìng pīnmìng zhèngqián.
He went all out to earn the money to cure his father.

我们不能昧着良心挣钱。

The thing is too make more than you spend.

I barbered to make a few bucks in school.

I need a job so I can make some cabbage.

You would earn more than you are now.
Nǐ kěyǐ zhèngde bǐ xiànzài duō。
你可以挣得比现在多。
As long as proper written accounts are maintained, everyone can be paid back when the band begins to make money.

He\'s dreaming up new ways of making quick money.
Tā zài kōngxiǎng kuàisù zhèngqián de xīn tújìng。
他在空想快速挣钱的新途径。
Once you see how the pieces fit together，you will be able to take the right steps to make the most of your money.
Yídàn nǐ zhīdào bùfen rúhé gòuchéng zhěngtǐ，nǐ jiù néng zhǎojiàn zhèngqián de zhèngquè fāngfǎ。
一旦你知道部分如何构成整体，你就能找见挣钱的正确方法。
We may find ourselves struggling to decide whether to intervene between two warring factions.

我家并不富裕，生活只是挣一点吃一点。
We \'ll make money on it with no sweat.
Wǒmen bú fèilì jiù zhèngdàole qián。
我们不费力就挣到了钱。
Many of these people are paid on commission.
Zhèxiē rén zhōng de xǔduō rén zhèng de shì yòngjīn。
这些人中的许多人挣的是佣金。
I will plough back what I earn into my company.

She struggled for years to survive without welfare.

许多年来，她一直在挣扎，试图在没有社会福利的条件下生存下来。
He struggled to get free from the rope.
Tā zhēngzházhe cóng shéngzi zhōng jiětuō。
他挣扎着从绳子中解脱。
Altogether he earns close to a million dollars.
Tā zhèng de qián jiā qǐlái kuài yǒu yībǎiwàn Měiyuán le。
他挣的钱加起来快有一百万美元了。
He clears $5,000 each month.
Tā měiyuè zhèng wǔqiān měiyuán。
他每月挣5000美元。
I imagine she earned a lot of money with her new novel.
Wǒ xiǎng tā de xīn xiǎoshuō yídìng wèi tā zhèngle bù shǎo qián。
我想她的新小说一定为她挣了不少钱。
The shipwrecked survivors weltered in the sea for hours.

失事船只的幸存者在海水中挣扎了好几个小时。
He had made some money on the side.
Tā jiānzhí zhèngle xiē qián。
他兼职挣了些钱。
The child tried to wriggle free from his aunt\'s embrace.
Zhè háizi niǔdòngzhe shēntǐ，shìtú cóng tā gūgu de huáibào zhōng zhèngtuō chūlái。
这孩子扭动着身体，试图从他姑姑的怀抱中挣脱出来。
He earned $100, 000 per annum.
Tā měi nián zhèng 10 wàn měiyuán。
他每年挣10万美元。
She earned a surprising amount of money.
Tā zhèng de qián duō de jīngrén。
她挣的钱多的惊人。
She fought tooth and nail.
Tā pīnmìng de zhēngzhá fǎnkàng。
她拼命地挣扎反抗。
She is floundering in college.
Tā zài Dàxué zhōng zhēngzházhe。
她在大学中挣扎着。

dīyīn tíqín
double bass

dà gāngqín
grand piano

The young girls are in a state of possession--blind and deaf and anesthetic.

这些年轻女孩正处在一种着魔状态——看不清，听不见，毫无知觉。
Girls will soon be able to change the color of their nails at the click of a switch thanks to a bit of electronic wizardry.
女孩们不久以后就可以凭着电子魔术的帮助，像触动开关发出咔嗒一声那样简单，随意变换自己的指甲颜色。

Tā chùmōzhe xiàngliàn，fǎngfú tā shì yí gè néng shǒuhù tā de mófǎ hùshēnfú。
她触摸着项链，仿佛它是一个能守护她的魔法护身符。
She charmed him with a magic potion hidden in his food.
Tā zài tā de shíwù zhōng jiāle jùyǒu mólì de yàoshuǐ，cóng\'ér míhuòle tā。
她在他的食物中加了具有魔力的药水，从而迷惑了他。
The house was charmed, so they would be safe there.
Zhè suǒ fángzi yǒu mózhòu bǎohù，suǒyǐ tāmen zài nàlǐ shì ānquán de。
这所房子有魔咒保护，所以他们在那里是安全的。
He loves performing magic tricks for the designers in their studios.
Tā xǐhuan gěi tāmen gōngzuòshì de shèjìshīmen biǎoyǎn móshù。
他喜欢给他们工作室的设计师们表演魔术。
World leaders marveled at the spell he cast over the crowds.
Shìjiè lǐngxiù men dōu jīngqí yú tā duì zhòngrén de mólì。
世界领袖们都惊奇于他对众人的魔力。
She was under the spell of his voice and his eyes.
Tā duì tā de yǎnjing hé shēngyīn zháo le mó。
她对他的眼睛和声音着了魔。
Seconds later they were engulfed in a seething torrent of water that appeared as though by magic.
Jǐ miǎozhōng hòu tāmen bèi bēnténg de jíliú tūnmò，rútóng mófǎ yìbān。
几秒钟后它们被奔腾的急流吞没，如同魔法一般。
I trust in the power and magic of the universe.
Wǒ xiāngxìn yǔzhòu zhōng de néngliàng hé mólì。
我相信宇宙中的能量和魔力。
In addition to stage magic, audiences were also diverted by a series of animal acts.
Chúle wǔtái móshù，guānzhòngmen duì yì xiēliè dòngwù biǎoyǎn shífēn gǎnxìngqù。
除了舞台魔术，观众们对一些列动物表演十分感兴趣。
They seek the evil magic within the Great Tower.
Tāmen zài jù ǎ lǐmiàn xúnqiú xié\'è mófǎ。
他们在巨塔里面寻求邪恶魔法。
He loves performing magic tricks for the designers in their studios.
Tā àihào zài tāmen de gōngzuòshì zhōng wèi shèjìshīmen biǎoyǎn móshù bǎxì。
他爱好在他们的工作室中为设计师们表演魔术把戏。
The evil witch enchanted the naïve prince with a spell.
Xié\'è de wūpó jiāng mózhòu shīyú tiānzhēn de wángzǐ Shēnshàng。
邪恶的巫婆将魔咒施于天真的王子身上。
I was left a little uninspired with his overall display although his flicks were magical.
Suīrán tā de diànyǐng chōngmǎn móshùbān de biànhuàn，dàn wǒ rènwéi tā de zǒngtǐ biǎoyǎn quēfá chuàngyì。
虽然他的电影充满魔术般的变幻，但我认为他的总体表演缺乏创意。
Roy was gripped a terrifying thought.
Luóyī duì yí gè kěpà de xiǎngfǎ zháole mó。
罗伊对一个可怕的想法着了魔。
The devil has been cast out.
Móguǐ yǐ bèi qūchú。
魔鬼已被驱除。

John will come on the stage to perform a magic act.

She says they fly by sprinkling magic dust on their antlers.
Tā shuō，tāmen bǎ móchén sǎdào tāmen de jiǎoshàng，jiù kěyǐ fēi le。
她说，它们把魔尘洒到它们的角上，就可以飞了。
The purpose of many of the festivities is to frighten away bad spirits.

很多这样的庆祝仪式都是为了吓走妖魔鬼怪。

I went there to lay a ghost.
Wǒ qù nàlǐ qūmó。
我去那里驱魔。
Temptation comes from the devil who tries to lead us astray.

Talismans are a form of contagious magic, carried on the person.

护身符就像是一种流行的魔法，携带在人的身上。
The magician pulled a rabbit out of a hat.

魔法师随意挑选了一只兔子。
The magician always pays a price for his power.

魔法师总会为他们的力量付出代价。
He has set his heart on being a magician.
Tā juéxīn yào zuò yí wèi móshùshī。
他决心要做一位魔术师。
Everything is asleep, under a spell of enchantment.

在一阵魔咒声中，一切都沉睡了。
The magician will perform unbelievable feats before your very eyes.
Zhège móshùshī huì zài nǐ de miànqián biǎoyǎn bùkěsīyì de jìyì。
这个魔术师会在你的面前表演不可思议的技艺。
The villagers prayed in hopes of warding off evil spirits.
Cūnmín wèi bìmiǎn èmó de chūxiàn ér qídǎo。

医生快要绝望的时候，是瑞恩的意志力让他战胜了病魔。
The sides with the same material can be joined with velcro.
Tóng zhǒng cáizhì de cèmiàn kě yòng móshùtiē zhān qǐlái。
同种材质的侧面可用魔术贴粘起来。
For them demons were as much a part of reality as trees were.

The young girls are in a state of possession--blind and deaf and anesthetic.

Tā móhuàn bān de xiāoshī le。

bìngmó chán shēn 
be possessed by the demon of disease—be afflicted with a lingering disease

yōushēn de xiágǔ 
a deep gorge
幽深

(of forests, palaces, etc.) deep and serene; deep and quiet

yōulín 
a secluded wood
幽暗的角落
yōuàn de jiǎoluò 
a dark corner
幽暗的山谷
yōuàn de shāngǔ 
a deep and gloomy valley

yōuměi de tíngyuàn 
a secluded and beautiful courtyard

fā sīgǔ zhī yōuqíng

yōushēn de xiágǔ 
a deep gorge

幽怨
yōuyuàn
hidden bitterness (of a young woman thwarted in love)

yōuhuì
a secret meeting of lovers; a lovers\' rendezvous; tryst
幽深
yōushēn
(of forests, palaces, etc.) deep and serene; deep and quiet
幽囚
yōuqiú
imprison; put in jail; keep in captivity
