He reacted rather humorlessly to these rumors.
Tā duì zhèxiē liúyán de fǎnyìng yìběnzhèngjīng，yìdiǎnr yōumògǎn dōu méiyǒu。
他对这些流言的反映一本正经，一点儿幽默感都没有。
I admired his buoyancy and persistent good humor.
Wǒ hěn xīnshǎng tā qīngsōng kuàilè de yàngzi yǐjí yíguàn de yōumò zuòfēng。
我很欣赏他轻松快乐的样子以及一贯的幽默作风。
Dickens had humorously suggested a special service of intercession at St. Paul\'s cathedral.
Dígēngsī yōumò de jiànyì zài Shèngbǎoluó dàjiàotáng tígōng yìzhǒng tèshū fúwù —— dàidǎo。
狄更斯幽默地建议在圣保罗大教堂提供一种特殊服务——代祷。
It was a humorless wink; a wink of warning.
Zhè búshì yōumò de zhǎyǎn；zhè shì jǐnggào de zhǎyǎn。
这不是幽默的眨眼；这是警告的眨眼。
His sermons benefited from a leavening of humor.
Tā de bùdào déyì yú yōumò de yǐngxiǎng。
他的布道得益于幽默的影响。
It was immediately and indubitably apparent that I had interrupted a scene of lovers.
Hěn míngxiǎn，wǒ dǎrǎole qíngrén de yōuhuì。
很明显，我打扰了情人的幽会。
步入园中，使人顿感清幽雅静。
Bùrù yuánzhōng，shǐ rén dùngǎn qīngyōu yǎjìng。

九华山树木蓊郁，环境清幽，是个旅游圣地。

The Jiuhua Mountain is surrounded by trees, and is a tourist resort.
公园的小径两旁长满了参天大树，让人感觉很清幽。

这里环境清幽。

我哥哥说话清楚，并且常常很幽默。

He couldn\'t stand his wife\'s pillow talk, and finally agreed to make his brother-in-law the president.
小舅子。
每天傍晚舅父都会陪着舅母在海边闲步。
Měitiān bàngwǎn jiùfù dōuhuì péi zhe jiùmǔ zài hǎibiān xiánbù。
My uncle goes to walk with my aunt by the sea in the dusk every day.
舅舅是母系亲属。
舅舅和舅妈今天要来我家做客。
Jiùjiù hé jiùmā jīntiān yào lái wǒjiā zuòkè。
My uncle and aunt came to visit us today.
舅舅做寿，我们要是不去，人家会怪我们失礼的。

这家公司的后台老板是我舅舅，想不到吧。

bānyùn gōngrén 
porter (at a railway station); docker (at a seaport)

bānyùnfèi 
transportation charges

The porter walked ahead，Corbett and Ranulf strolled behind.

机械地搬用外国的东西是要吃大亏的。
Jīxiè de bānyòngwàiguó de dōngxi shì yào chī dàkūi de。
Mechanical copying of things foreign would be disastrous.
不要生吞活剥地搬用外国的经验。
Búyào shēngtūn huóbō de bānyòng wàiguó de jīngyàn。
It\'s no good taking over the experience of foreign countries uncritically.
搬用别人的经验，也要考虑自身的实际情况。
Bānyòng biérén de jīngyàn，yěyào kǎolǜ zìshēn de shíjì qíngkuàng。
One should consider one\'s own reality, before applying the experience of others.
我家曾经使用老虎灶多年，自打搬进新家以后就没再用了。

My family had been using a huge kitchen range to boil water for many years before we moved into the new house.
搬重东西要用猛劲儿。
Bān zhòngdōngxi yào yòng měngjìnr。
To lift heavy things, you need to use a sudden jerk of strength.
大家一齐用劲，把大石头搬开了。

这些果树将用上几年的时间分阶段搬迁进来。
他天天加班，就像是把家搬移到了办公室。

He works overtime daily, just like he has moved his home to the office.

搬弄是非的人
bānnòngshìfēi de rén 
a talebearer
搬弄是非
bānnòngshìfēi
make mischief
这个人好搬弄是非
搬弄是非。

别搬弄这些是是非非，我嫌烦。

他们杀掉他的理由是死人不会搬弄是非。
She won\'t dish the dirt.

她从不搬弄是非。

搬家公司
bānjiā gōngsī 
moving company

Ants are moving busily, it is going to rain.
老鼠搬家，牛羊狂躁，有可能是地震噩兆。

搬家
bānjiā
move house

A new family moved into our neighborhood, they seem to be easy to get along with.
只要大家一起搬石头，就没有解决不了的难题。

他想骗人，却先被人家骗了，真是搬起石头砸自己的脚。

搬家后10天内，请报告地址的变动情况。

他搬了新家，到商场买一部子母钟放在客厅显要的位置。

为了便于指挥，指挥部搬移到工地现场。

他得自己把树搬回到木工场地。
The new employee dislodged her by moving into her office space.

这名新员工占据了她的办公场所，她只好搬出来了。
They say that three moves equal one fire.
Tāmen shuō bān sān cì jiā jiùxiàng shīle yì chǎng huǒ。
他们说搬三次家就像失了一场火。
He spent part of his life on his parents farm before a move to the big city.

shēngbānyìngtào

他现在搬进城里住了，也是吃商品粮的人了。

The new employee dislodged her by moving into her office space.
Zhè míng xīn yuángōng zhànjùle tā de bàngōng chǎngsuǒ，tā zhǐhǎo bān chūlái le。
这名新员工占据了她的办公场所，她只好搬出来了。
Too frequent transplanting is not good for families.
Guòyú pínfán de bānqiān duì jiātíng bú lì。

The porters singsonged the travellers\' luggage up the mountain.
Bānyùngōng dāndiào de kángzhe lǚxíngzhě de xíngli shàngshān le。
搬运工单调地扛着旅行者的行李上山了。
The movers reloaded the truck.
Bānyùngōng yòu bǎ kǎchē zhuāngmǎn le。
搬运工又把卡车装满了。
She won\'t dish the dirt.
Tā cóngbù bānnòngshìfēi。
她从不搬弄是非。

Nǐ néng bǎ zhè yí dài tǔdòu bānshànglóu ma？

搬家工人非常小心的对待那个三角钢琴。

I\'m going to run him in the New Year Chase.

抓捕逃犯
zhuābǔ táofàn 
arrest an escaped prisoner
为了方便抓捕和寄押犯罪嫌疑人，警方采取了有效的措施。
Wèile fāngbiàn zhuābǔ hé jìyā fànzuì xiányírén，jǐngfāng cǎiqǔ le yǒuxiào de cuòshī。
In order to arrest and temporarily imprison criminal suspects, the police have taken effective measures.
抓捕这样的流窜犯，有相当大的难度。

It is quite difficult to capture a criminal on the run.
民警们毫不畏惧，勇敢地抓捕凶顽。

The policemen had no fear, courageously running after the gangsters.

According to the news in the paper, the criminal suspect has been arrested.

After a search lasting three days, the suspect was finally arrested.

go fishing on the sea

Měinián zuòwéi fùyúhuòwù ér bèi bǔshā de jīng、hǎitún hé hǎitúnkē dòngwù dōuhuì dádào shù qiān tóu。
每年作为副渔获物而被捕杀的鲸、海豚和海豚科动物都会达到数千头。
There are a large body of people against hunting and fishing
很多人反对猎杀和捕鱼。
He hounded down the killer in South Africa.
Tā zài Nánbù zhuībǔ dào nàgè shārénfàn。
他在南部追捕到那个杀人犯。
Hundreds of thousands of communists were killed or sent to prison.
Wúshù de gòngchǎnzhǔyì zhànshì huòshì bèi shā，huòshì bèibǔ。
无数的共产主义战士或是被杀，或是被捕。
to be arrested on suspicion of murder
因谋杀嫌疑被逮捕
Police were sent to arrest him on a charge of attempted murder.
Jǐngchá yǐ móushāwèisuì de zuìmíng dàibǔ tā。
警察以谋杀未遂的罪名逮捕他。
The captured soldier was to be tormented and killed.
Bèibǔ de shìbīng bèishòu zhémó，zuìhòu bèi shāhài。
被捕的士兵备受折磨，最后被杀害。

The take was a few this season.
这个季节的捕获量较少。
The catch was landed at Liverpool.
捕获物在利物浦卸上岸。
The nucleus was unable to capture neutrons.
Hézǐ wúfǎ bǔhuò zhōngzǐ。
核子无法捕获中子。
He bagged a few deers on the hunting trip.
Tā zài dǎliè zhōng bǔhuòle jǐ zhī yělù。
他在打猎中捕获了几只野鹿。
The fishermen are celebrating after landing a huge catch of fish today.
Cóng chuánshàng xièxià yú hòu，yúmínmen zhèngzài qìngzhù jīntiān bǔhuòle rúcǐ duō de yú。
从船上卸下鱼后，渔民们正在庆祝今天捕获了如此多的鱼。
His eyes caught many girls\' hearts.
Tā de yǎnjing bǔhuòle hěn duō nǚhái de fāngxīn。
他的眼睛捕获了很多女孩的芳心。
They are seemingly helpless creatures, apparently easy prey for fish.
Tāmen kàn shàngqù shì ruòxiǎo de shēngwù，xiǎnrán hěn róngyì bèi yúqún bǔhuò。
他们看上去是弱小的生物，显然很容易被鱼群捕获。
The star captured a comet.
Nà kē héngxīng bǔhuòle yì kē huìxīng。
那颗恒星捕获了一颗彗星。
Carnivorous plants are capable of trapping and digesting small animals especially insects.
Shíròuxìng zhíwù nénggòu bǔhuò yóuqí shì kūnchóng zhèyàng de xiǎo dòngwù bìng xiāohuà tāmen。
食肉性植物能够捕获尤其是昆虫这样的小动物并消化它们。
Thousands of dolphins and porpoises and whales are killed as part of the by-catch each year.

The anti-terrorist squad arrested suspects and seized explosives over last weekend.
反恐怖部队上周末逮捕了嫌疑犯并缴获了炸药。
I\'m going to run him in the New Year Chase.
Zài xīn yì nián de zhuībǔ zhōng，wǒ huì bǎ tā zhuāhuò。
在新一年的追捕中，我会把他抓获。
经过三天拉网式搜捕，疑凶终于被抓捕归案。
Jīngguò sāntiān lāwǎngshì sōubǔ，yíxiōng zhōng yú bèi zhuābǔ guīàn。
After a search lasting three days, the suspect was finally arrested.

bǔhuò
catch; capture; seize
在机场，一名逃犯当场被捕。
Zài jīchǎng，yì míng táofàn dāngchǎng bèibǔ。

The police organized a network to hunt the suspect.
他因参赌而被捕。
Tā yīn cān dǔ ér bèibǔ。
He was arrested for gambling.
警方拘捕了这些聚众闹事的刁棍。
Jǐngfāng jūbǔ le zhèxiē jùzhòng nàoshì de diāogùn。
The police have arrested these artful rascals who gathered together to make trouble.
狮子蹲伏在草丛里，耐心等待着捕猎时机。
Shīzi dūnfú zài cǎocóng lǐ，nàixīn děngdài zhe bǔliè shíjī。
Squatting down in the thick grass, the lion waited patiently for a hunt.
这名惯贼多次被捕入狱。
Zhè míng guànzéi duō cì bèibǔ rùyù。
This hardened thief has been in jail many times.
为了方便抓捕和寄押犯罪嫌疑人，警方采取了有效的措施。
Wèile fāngbiàn zhuābǔ hé jìyā fànzuì xiányírén，jǐngfāng cǎiqǔ le yǒuxiào de cuòshī。
In order to arrest and temporarily imprison criminal suspects, the police have taken effective measures.
出海捕鱼前我要在船上绑几个救生圈。
Chūhǎi bǔyú qián wǒ yào zài chuánshàng bǎng jǐgè jiùshēngquān。
I tie several rubber tires to the boat before I go to the sea to fish.
滥捕滥杀野生鸟类是违法行为！
Lànbǔ lànshā yěshēng niǎolèi shì wéifǎ xíngwéi！
Excessive capturing and slaughtering of wild birds constitutes unlawful behavior.
狼的利齿有助于他捕杀猎物。
Láng de lìchǐ yǒuzhùyú tā bǔshā lièwù。
The sharp teeth of the wolf is helpful for him to hunt quarries.
这种陷阱可以猎捕到小型的野兽。
Zhèzhǒng xiànjǐng kěyǐ lièbǔ dào xiǎoxíng de yěshòu。
The trap can captue small wild animals.
抓捕这样的流窜犯，有相当大的难度。
Zhuābǔ zhèyàng de liúcuànfàn，yǒu xiāngdāng dà de nándù。
It is quite difficult to capture a criminal on the run.
警方为了围捕逃犯，设置了路卡。
Jǐngfāng wèi le wéibǔ táofàn，shèzhì le lùkǎ。
In order to round up the escaped prisoner, the police set many road booths.
警方设计了一条秘计才顺利地把他逮捕。
Jǐngfāng shèjì le yìtiáo mìjì cái shùnlì de bǎ tā dǎibǔ。
The police finally arrested him by designing a secret plot.
爷爷时常架着这条木船在江上捕鱼。
Yéye shícháng jià zhe zhètiáo mùchuán zài jiāng shàng bǔyú。
Grandpa always goes fishing with this wooden boat.

In the white slavery case cracked recently, we captured six people who kidnapped children using knockout drops.
那个人因为嫖妓而被公安机关逮捕了。
Nàge rén yīnwèi piáojì ér bèi gōng\'ān jīguān dǎibǔ le。
That man was arrested by the police for soliciting prostitutes.
那个戴着箬笠在雨中捕鱼的人是我叔叔。
Nàgè dài zhe ruòlì zài yǔ zhōng bǔyú de rén shì wǒ shūshū。
The man wearing a bamboo hat, and fishing in the rain was my uncle.
小偷刚刚把钱包偷到手就被警察逮住了，真是螳螂捕蝉，黄雀在后呀！
Xiǎotōu gānggāng bǎ qiánbāo tōu dàoshǒu jiù bèi jǐngchá dǎizhù le，zhēnshì tángláng bǔchán，huángquè zàihòu ya！
No sooner had the thief stolen the wallet, than he was caught by the police. As the saying goes: coveting the gains ahead, unaware of danger behind.
警方一举拘捕了一名主犯和两名同案犯。
Jǐngfāng yìjǔ jūbǔ le yìmíng zhǔfàn hé liǎngmíng tóngànfàn。
The police arrested one principal criminal and two accomplices.
民警们毫不畏惧，勇敢地抓捕凶顽。
Mínjǐngmen háobú wèijù，yǒnggǎn de zhuābǔ xiōngwán。
The policemen had no fear, courageously running after the gangsters.
根据报纸上的消息，凶嫌已经被抓捕归案了。
Gēnjù bàozhǐ shàng de xiāoxi，xiōngxián yǐjing bèi zhuābǔ guīàn le。
According to the news in the paper, the criminal suspect has been arrested.
雄狮虽然是狮群的核心，却不用亲自猎捕食物。
Xióngshī suīrán shì shīqún de héxīn，què búyòng qīnzì lièbǔ shíwù。
Though the male lion is the leader of the pride, it doesn\'t have to hunt food by itself.
巡捕逃犯是他的职责，他一直很敬业。
Xúnbǔ táofàn shì tā de zhízé，tā yìzhí hěn jìngyè。
He always carries out his duty whole-heartedly, which is to go after and arrest criminals at large.
听老人说在古代他家出过巡捕。
Tīng lǎorén shuō zài gǔdài tā jiā chūguò xúnbǔ。
Elder people say that someone from his family was a policeman at ancient times.
在旧社会他做过巡捕，相当于现代的警察。
Zài jiù shèhuì tā zuòguò xúnbǔ，xiāngdāngyú xiàndài de jǐngchá。
What he did in the old society is something like the policeman at modern times.
他在巡捕房当过差，不过没做过什么坏事。
Tā zài xúnbǔfáng dāng guò chāi，búguò méi zuòguò shénme huàishì。
He worked in the police station in the former foreign concessions, but he didn\'t do anything wrong.
青蛙能捕捉大量害虫，是一种益兽。
Qīngwā néng bǔzhuō dàliàng hàichóng，shì yìzhǒng yìshòu。
Frogs are able to capture a great deal of insects, they are a kind of beneficial animal.

Táofàn zhōng jiāng huì bèi dàibǔ guīàn。
The escaped criminal would finally be caught by the police.

After their leader was caught, the underground gang soon fell apart.

The take was a few this season.
这个季节的捕获量较少。
They hunted huge creatures like the mastodon, which were similar to the modern elephant.
他们的捕食对象都是些庞然大物，比如跟现在的大象体型相似的乳齿象。
The battle against hunting keeps going on.
反对捕猎之战还在持续进行中。
Every year more than 500 bears die because of hunting.
每年都有500多只熊被捕杀。
The police are still after him.
警察仍在追捕他。
Pelicans wait for the fishes to come up for air to capture them.
鹈鹕会等鱼浮出水面换气时将其捕食。
I love animals that it\'s the reason why I\'m against hunting.
我喜爱动物，这就是我反对捕猎的原因。
What do hunters find so attractive in bagging innocent birds?!
狩猎者捕杀这些无辜的鸟能得到什么乐趣呢？！
He should be arrested straight off.
应该立即逮捕他。
The madam was arrested for having underage girls working for her.
这个老鸨因其手下有未成年少女而被捕。
Where can I buy a butterfly net?
哪里可以买到捕蝴蝶的网？
He netted four fish at the lake.
他在湖里捕到了四条鱼。
A pack of wolves hunt only what it needs to eat.
狼群只捕食自己需要的猎物。
The anti-terrorist squad arrested suspects and seized explosives over last weekend.
反恐怖部队上周末逮捕了嫌疑犯并缴获了炸药。
He brought shame into his family when he was arrested last June.
去年6月他被捕了，这让他的家人蒙羞。
The policeman was badly wounded last night while making an arrest.
这个警察昨晚在实施抓捕的时候受了重伤。
There was a pick up by the FBI in Florida.
联邦调查局在佛罗里达展开了一次逮捕行动。
A policeman ran after the young man and arrested him.
警察追踪这个年轻人，并逮捕了他。
The police pulled him in to the prison.
警方将他逮捕入狱。
They caught him and put him away for 15 years.
他们逮捕了他，并将其监禁了15年。
He was caught by the police and ended up in prison.
他被警察逮捕，落了个锒铛入狱的下场。
She bought a hobby to increase her small birds collection.
她买了只燕隼，以便能够捕到更多的小鸟做成标本。
The police collared him near the bank.
警方在银行附近逮捕了他。
He was caught using false identification at customs.
他在海关因使用假证件被捕。
Fox hunting used to be popular in Britain.
猎捕狐狸在英国曾经很流行。
There are a large body of people against hunting and fishing
很多人反对猎杀和捕鱼。
After being arrested by police officers, they put him directly in the can.
被警察逮捕后，他直接入狱了。

被捕
bèibǔ 
be arrested; be under arrest
他做地下工作时，曾因叛徒告密而被捕。
Tā zuò dìxià gōngzuò shí，céng yīn pàntú gàomì ér bèibǔ。
When he was doing underground work he was arrested because a renegade informed against him.
作案时被捕
zuò\'àn shí bèi bǔ 
be caught in the act; be caught red-handed
在机场，一名逃犯当场被捕。
Zài jīchǎng，yì míng táofàn dāngchǎng bèibǔ。
A criminal was arrested on the spot at the airport.
他因参赌而被捕。
Tā yīn cān dǔ ér bèibǔ。
He was arrested for gambling.
这名惯贼多次被捕入狱。
Zhè míng guànzéi duō cì bèibǔ rùyù。
This hardened thief has been in jail many times.
头子被捕后，这个黑社会集团很快就冰消瓦解了。
Tóuzi bèibǔhòu，zhège hēishèhuìjítuán hěnkuàijiù bīngxiāowǎjiěle。
After their leader was caught, the underground gang soon fell apart.
经过三天拉网式搜捕，疑凶终于被抓捕归案。
Jīngguò sāntiān lāwǎngshì sōubǔ，yíxiōng zhōng yú bèi zhuābǔ guīàn。
After a search lasting three days, the suspect was finally arrested.
你被逮捕了。
Nǐ bèi dàibǔ le。
You are under arrest.
根据报纸上的消息，凶嫌已经被抓捕归案了。

According to the news in the paper, the criminal suspect has been arrested.
逃犯终将会被逮捕归案。
Táofàn zhōng jiāng huì bèi dàibǔ guīàn。
The escaped criminal would finally be caught by the police.
他因涉嫌贪污被逮捕。
Tā yīn shèxián tānwū bèi dàibǔ。
He was arrested on suspicion of corruption.
那个人因为嫖妓而被公安机关逮捕了。

The Theatre is crowded with people who learned that The Legend of the White Snake is going to be put on the stage.
敌人不知道躲哪里去了，团长想出了一个引蛇出洞的办法。

对文达人来说，蛇不是邪恶的灵魂。

那个岛上没人住，因为有太多的虫子和蛇。

如果看到蛇，而且怀疑它有毒，就要找专业人士来处理了。

as vicious as a viper

银环蛇有巨毒，大家看到了可千万不要随便捉。

赤链蛇并没有毒，被咬伤也不用太担心。

听说要演《白蛇传》了，戏楼前挤满了人。
Tīngshuō yào yǎn《Báishézhuàn》 le，xìlóu qián jǐmǎn le rén。
The Theatre is crowded with people who learned that The Legend of the White Snake is going to be put on the stage.

他宁愿饿着肚子也不出来要饭，真是个穷棒子。

He prefers to be hungry rather than beg for food, he is really a poor person with high aspirations.
我们都饿坏了，得尽先解决吃饭问题。
